row.Name: Description
row.Value: The Siebel Offering speeds up the deployment of Siebel applications. It also reduces downtime and increases agility of Siebel environments.

HEADER.Title: List of all available Configuration Objects

DOCU_Docu.DOC:
About Automic's Siebel Package ==============================
The Siebel Offering speeds up the deployment of Siebel applications. It also reduces downtime and increases agility of Siebel environments.
A Siebel solution is tailored to a customer's business and eBusiness strategies and processes. Therefore you will find numerous configurations within Siebel and integrations with other systems.
When you want to bring a Siebel application from one environment to another, this Automic Offering comes in and helps you to move forward efficiently.
Our templates full of helpful actions cure the deployment pains as we automate manual operation steps. The Siebel specific actions use Siebel's own tools and their API (DataBeans) to interact with various Siebel components.

= RB name = PCK.AUTOMIC_SIEBEL.PUB.ACTION.ACTIVATE_TASKS
= General description = This Action is designed to activate tasks
= Inputs = * Siebel Server Url: siebel Server host * Siebel Server Port: port Siebel is listening on. * Siebel Enterprise: Enterprise that the databean should connect to. * Object Manager: The Objectmanagers to connect with the Databean to check if Siebel is running. (No Spaces!!) * Siebel Username: The Siebel user to connect. * Siebel Password: The Password to connect with the Siebel user. * Task filter: Comma separated list of names that will be activated or empty to activate all tasks
= Behavior = This action can run on every host that has the appropriate Java version installed and can connect to to the Target Siebel server. Activates task defined by a naming pattern. Tasks that are activated have to be imported and published before the activation.
= Outputs = * Return code is 0 if success * Return code is 4 if not success.
= Rollback = (none)
= Logging = (none)
= Example = (none)

SCRIPT.MSCRI:
:INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SIEBEL.PRV.INCLUDE.ATTACH_RESOURCES :DEFINE &STRING_ARR#, string, 30
:INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_HEADER_PARAM_VALIDATION
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Siebel Server Url" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_SIEBEL_SERVER_URL#
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Siebel Server Port" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_SIEBEL_PORT#
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Siebel Enterprise" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_SIEBEL_ENTERPRISE#
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Object Manager" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_SIEBEL_OBJECT_MANAGER#
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Siebel Username" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_SIEBEL_USER#
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Task filter" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_SIEBEL_FILTER#
:INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_HEADER_EXECUTION !Begin my code ! apply sudo :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.SUDOERS_HEADER :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SIEBEL.PRV.INCLUDE.SET_SIEBEL_PROPERTIES :SET &COMMAND# = "java -jar '&SIEBEL_TOOL_JAR#' siebel ActivateTasks" :SET &COMMAND# = STR_CAT(&COMMAND#, ' -h &UC4RB_SIEBEL_SERVER_URL# -pt &UC4RB_SIEBEL_PORT#') :SET &COMMAND# = STR_CAT(&COMMAND#, " -su &UC4RB_SIEBEL_USER# -sp '&UC4RB_SIEBEL_PASSWORD#'") :SET &COMMAND# = STR_CAT(&COMMAND#, ' -e "&UC4RB_SIEBEL_ENTERPRISE#" -om &UC4RB_SIEBEL_OBJECT_MANAGER#')
:IF &UC4RB_SIEBEL_FILTER# NE "" !: INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.ESCAPE_UNIX_CHARS &UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING# = "&UC4RB_SIEBEL_FILTER#" : SET &UC4RB_SIEBEL_FILTER# = STR_SUBSTITUTE (&UC4RB_SIEBEL_FILTER#, "'", "'\''") : SET &COMMAND# = STR_CAT(&COMMAND#, " -ft '&UC4RB_SIEBEL_FILTER#'") :ENDIF :SET &COMMAND# = STR_CAT(&COMMAND#, "&SIEBEL_PROPERTIES#") :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.CHANGE_FOLDER_TO_AGENT_BIN &COMMAND# :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.CHECK_RETURN_CODE_UNIX_SHELL ! apply sudo :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.SUDOERS_FOOTER
!End my code

POST_SCRIPT.OSCRI:
:SET &UC4RB_OUT_NUM_ACTIVATED_TASKS# = "0"
:SET &hnd# = PREP_PROCESS_REPORT(,, "REP", "*Number of task activated: *") :PROCESS &hnd# : SET &line# = GET_PROCESS_LINE(&hnd#,1) : SET &LENGTH# = STR_FIND(&line#, "activated: ") : SET &LENGTH# = &LENGTH# + 11 : SET &UC4RB_OUT_NUM_ACTIVATED_TASKS# = STR_CUT(&line#, &LENGTH#) :ENDPROCESS
:PUB &UC4RB_OUT_NUM_ACTIVATED_TASKS#,,TOP

SCRIPT.MSCRI:
:INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SIEBEL.PRV.INCLUDE.ATTACH_RESOURCES @echo off setlocal enabledelayedexpansion :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_HEADER_PARAM_VALIDATION
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Siebel Server Url" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_SIEBEL_SERVER_URL#
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Siebel Server Port" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_SIEBEL_PORT#
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Siebel Enterprise" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_SIEBEL_ENTERPRISE#
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Object Manager" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_SIEBEL_OBJECT_MANAGER#
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Siebel Username" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_SIEBEL_USER#
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Siebel Password" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_SIEBEL_PASSWORD#
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Task filter" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_SIEBEL_FILTER#
set /a errors=0 > nul if %errors% GTR 0 ( set retcode=%errors% goto :retcode ) :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_HEADER_EXECUTION !Begin my code :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SIEBEL.PRV.INCLUDE.SET_SIEBEL_PROPERTIES :SET &COMMAND# = "java -jar ""&SIEBEL_TOOL_JAR#"" siebel ActivateTasks" :SET &COMMAND# = STR_CAT(&COMMAND#, ' -h &UC4RB_SIEBEL_SERVER_URL# -pt &UC4RB_SIEBEL_PORT#') :SET &COMMAND# = STR_CAT(&COMMAND#, ' -su &UC4RB_SIEBEL_USER# -sp &UC4RB_SIEBEL_PASSWORD#') :SET &COMMAND# = STR_CAT(&COMMAND#, ' -e "&UC4RB_SIEBEL_ENTERPRISE#" -om &UC4RB_SIEBEL_OBJECT_MANAGER#')
:IF &UC4RB_SIEBEL_FILTER# NE "" : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.ESCAPE_WINDOWS_CHARS &UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING# = "&UC4RB_SIEBEL_FILTER#" : SET &COMMAND# = STR_CAT(&COMMAND#, ' -ft "&UC4RB_SIEBEL_FILTER#"') :ENDIF :SET &COMMAND# = STR_CAT(&COMMAND#, "&SIEBEL_PROPERTIES#") :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.CHANGE_FOLDER_TO_AGENT_BIN &COMMAND#
:INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.CHECK_RETURN_CODE_WINDOWS_CONSOLE !End my code

POST_SCRIPT.OSCRI:
:SET &UC4RB_OUT_NUM_ACTIVATED_TASKS# = "0"
:SET &hnd# = PREP_PROCESS_REPORT(,, "REP", "*Number of task activated: *") :PROCESS &hnd# : SET &line# = GET_PROCESS_LINE(&hnd#,1) : SET &LENGTH# = STR_FIND(&line#, "activated: ") : SET &LENGTH# = &LENGTH# + 11 : SET &UC4RB_OUT_NUM_ACTIVATED_TASKS# = STR_CUT(&line#, &LENGTH#) :ENDPROCESS
:PUB &UC4RB_OUT_NUM_ACTIVATED_TASKS#,,TOP

PROMPTSETDATA.DATAEDITOR: <PRPTS ontop="1"><PRPTBOX><UC4RB_SIEBEL_SERVER_URLs.00 haslist="0" msgnr="-1" msginsert="" altview="0" promptname="UC4RB_SIEBEL_SERVER_URL#" ReadFromTable="OPSE">&ENV#?SIEBEL_URL</UC4RB_SIEBEL_SERVER_URLs.00><UC4RB_SIEBEL_PORTs.00 haslist="0" msgnr="-1" msginsert="" altview="0" promptname="UC4RB_SIEBEL_PORT#" ReadFromTable="OPSE">2321</UC4RB_SIEBEL_PORTs.00><UC4RB_SIEBEL_ENTERPRISEs.00 haslist="0" msgnr="-1" msginsert="" altview="0" promptname="UC4RB_SIEBEL_ENTERPRISE#" ReadFromTable="OPSE">&ENV#?SIEBEL_ENTRPR_SERVER</UC4RB_SIEBEL_ENTERPRISEs.00><UC4RB_SIEBEL_OBJECT_MANAGERs.00 haslist="0" msgnr="-1" msginsert="" altview="0" promptname="UC4RB_SIEBEL_OBJECT_MANAGER#" ReadFromTable="OPSE">UCMObjMgr_enu</UC4RB_SIEBEL_OBJECT_MANAGERs.00><UC4RB_SIEBEL_USERs.00 haslist="0" msgnr="-1" msginsert="" altview="0" promptname="UC4RB_SIEBEL_USER#" ReadFromTable="OPSE">sadmin</UC4RB_SIEBEL_USERs.00><UC4RB_SIEBEL_PASSWORDs.00 haslist="0" msgnr="-1" msginsert="" altview="0" promptname="UC4RB_SIEBEL_PASSWORD#" ReadFromTable="OPSE">--1048AD5CD13D828E58</UC4RB_SIEBEL_PASSWORDs.00><UC4RB_SIEBEL_FILTERs.00 haslist="0" msgnr="-1" msginsert="" altview="0" promptname="UC4RB_SIEBEL_FILTER#" ReadFromTable="OPSE"></UC4RB_SIEBEL_FILTERs.00></PRPTBOX></PRPTS>

DOCU_Docu.DOC: = RB name = PCK.AUTOMIC_SIEBEL.PUB.ACTIVE_WORKFLOW = General description = Activates workflows defined by a naming pattern. Workflows that are activated have to be imported before the activation. = Inputs = * Siebel Server Url: The host name of the Siebel Server * Siebel Server Port: The port Siebel is listening on * Siebel Enterprise: The Enterprise that the databean should connect to * Object Manager: The ObjectManagers to connect with the DataBean to check if Siebel is running * Siebel Username: The Siebel user to connect * Siebel Password: The Password to connect with the Siebel user * Workflow Naming Query: The query string to filter the workflows to activate = Outputs = * Number of Activated Workflows: The number of workflow processes that Siebel CRM activated. = Behavior = (see general description) = Return value= * Return code is 0 if success * Return code is 4 if not success. = Rollback = (none) = Logging = (none) = Example = (none)

SCRIPT.MSCRI:
:DEFINE &STRING_ARR#, string, 30 :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SIEBEL.PRV.INCLUDE.ATTACH_RESOURCES
:INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_HEADER_PARAM_VALIDATION
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Siebel Server Url" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_SIEBEL_SERVER_URL#
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Siebel Server Port" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_SIEBEL_PORT#
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Siebel Enterprise" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_SIEBEL_ENTERPRISE#
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Object Manager" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_SIEBEL_OBJECT_MANAGER#
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Siebel Username" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_SIEBEL_USER#
:SET &UC4RB_SIEBEL_FLOWSEARCH_TMP# = STR_SUB(&UC4RB_WF_QUERY#,"'","'\''")
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Workflow Naming Query" echo 'PARAM: &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = &UC4RB_SIEBEL_FLOWSEARCH_TMP#'
:INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_HEADER_EXECUTION !Begin my code !apply sudo :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.SUDOERS_HEADER :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SIEBEL.PRV.INCLUDE.SET_SIEBEL_PROPERTIES :SET &COMMAND# = "java -jar '&SIEBEL_TOOL_JAR#' siebel ActivateWorkflow" :SET &COMMAND# = STR_CAT(&COMMAND#, ' -h &UC4RB_SIEBEL_SERVER_URL# -pt &UC4RB_SIEBEL_PORT#') :SET &COMMAND# = STR_CAT(&COMMAND#, ' -su &UC4RB_SIEBEL_USER# -sp &UC4RB_SIEBEL_PASSWORD#') :SET &COMMAND# = STR_CAT(&COMMAND#, ' -e "&UC4RB_SIEBEL_ENTERPRISE#" -om &UC4RB_SIEBEL_OBJECT_MANAGER#') :SET &COMMAND# = STR_CAT(&COMMAND#, " -s '&UC4RB_SIEBEL_FLOWSEARCH_TMP#'") :SET &COMMAND# = STR_CAT(&COMMAND#, "&SIEBEL_PROPERTIES#")
:INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.CHANGE_FOLDER_TO_AGENT_BIN &COMMAND# :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.CHECK_RETURN_CODE_UNIX_SHELL ! apply sudo :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.SUDOERS_FOOTER !End my code

POST_SCRIPT.OSCRI:
:SET &UC4RB_OUT_NUM_ACTIVATED_WF# = "0"
:SET &hnd# = PREP_PROCESS_REPORT(,, "REP", "*Number of workflow activated: *") :PROCESS &hnd# : SET &line# = GET_PROCESS_LINE(&hnd#,1) : SET &LENGTH# = STR_FIND(&line#, "activated: ") : SET &LENGTH# = &LENGTH# + 11 : SET &UC4RB_OUT_NUM_ACTIVATED_WF# = STR_CUT(&line#, &LENGTH#) :ENDPROCESS
:PUB &UC4RB_OUT_NUM_ACTIVATED_WF#,,TOP

SCRIPT.MSCRI:
:INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SIEBEL.PRV.INCLUDE.ATTACH_RESOURCES @echo off :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_HEADER_PARAM_VALIDATION
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Siebel Server Url" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_SIEBEL_SERVER_URL#
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Siebel Server Port" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_SIEBEL_PORT#
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Siebel Enterprise" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_SIEBEL_ENTERPRISE#
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Object Manager" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_SIEBEL_OBJECT_MANAGER#
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Siebel Username" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_SIEBEL_USER#
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Workflow Naming Query" echo "PARAM: &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = &UC4RB_WF_QUERY#"
:INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_HEADER_EXECUTION !Begin my code
:INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SIEBEL.PRV.INCLUDE.SET_SIEBEL_PROPERTIES :SET &COMMAND# = "java -jar ""&SIEBEL_TOOL_JAR#"" siebel ActivateWorkflow" :SET &COMMAND# = STR_CAT(&COMMAND#, ' -h &UC4RB_SIEBEL_SERVER_URL# -pt &UC4RB_SIEBEL_PORT#') :SET &COMMAND# = STR_CAT(&COMMAND#, ' -su &UC4RB_SIEBEL_USER# -sp &UC4RB_SIEBEL_PASSWORD#') :SET &COMMAND# = STR_CAT(&COMMAND#, ' -e "&UC4RB_SIEBEL_ENTERPRISE#" -om &UC4RB_SIEBEL_OBJECT_MANAGER#') :SET &UC4RB_SIEBEL_FLOWSEARCH_TMP# = STR_SUB(&UC4RB_WF_QUERY#,'"','\"') :SET &COMMAND# = STR_CAT(&COMMAND#, ' -s "&UC4RB_SIEBEL_FLOWSEARCH_TMP#"') :SET &COMMAND# = STR_CAT(&COMMAND#, "&SIEBEL_PROPERTIES#")
:INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.CHANGE_FOLDER_TO_AGENT_BIN &COMMAND# :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.CHECK_RETURN_CODE_WINDOWS_CONSOLE !End my code

POST_SCRIPT.OSCRI:
:SET &UC4RB_OUT_NUM_ACTIVATED_WF# = "0"
:SET &hnd# = PREP_PROCESS_REPORT(,, "REP", "*Number of workflow activated: *") :PROCESS &hnd# : SET &line# = GET_PROCESS_LINE(&hnd#,1) : SET &LENGTH# = STR_FIND(&line#, "activated: ") : SET &LENGTH# = &LENGTH# + 11 : SET &UC4RB_OUT_NUM_ACTIVATED_WF# = STR_CUT(&line#, &LENGTH#) :ENDPROCESS
:PUB &UC4RB_OUT_NUM_ACTIVATED_WF#,,TOP

DOCU_Docu.DOC:
= RB name = PCK.AUTOMIC_SIEBEL.PUB.ACTION.CHECK_AVAILABILITY
= General Description = This Action runs on the Siebel Server. Checks if Siebel is up and Running. This Action is checking one or more Object Managers if they are up and running. Only when all defined Object Managers are up and running, the action terminates with ok. The underlying assumption is, that if the specified Object Managers are available, the Siebel system is ready to be used for the specified actions.
= Inputs = * Siebel Server: The name of the siebel Server. * Siebel Port: The port Siebel is listening on. * Siebel Enterprise name: The Enterprise that the databean should connect to. * Username: The Siebel user to connect. * Password: The Password to connect with the Siebeluser. * Object Managers: The Objectmanagers to connect with the Databean to check if Siebel is running. (No Spaces!!) * Maximum reties: The maximum retries before the action reaches an error state. * Delay time: The delay between the retries in seconds. * Encoding: The Encoding, that is used for Siebel
= Behavior = (see general description)
= Outputs = * Return code is 0 if success. * Return code is 1 if not success.
= Rollback =
= Logging =
= Example =

SCRIPT.MSCRI: :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SIEBEL.PRV.INCLUDE.SET_SIEBEL_PROPERTIES :JCL_CONCAT_CHAR "?" java -jar -Dfile.encoding=&UC4RB_SIEBEL_ENCODING# ? "&$AGENT_RESOURCES_CLIENT#siebeltool.jar" siebel CheckAvailability ? -h "&UC4RB_SIEBEL_SERVER_URL#" ? -pt &UC4RB_SIEBEL_PORT# ? -e "&UC4RB_SIEBEL_ENTERPRISE#" ? -su "&UC4RB_SIEBEL_USER#" ? -sp &UC4RB_SIEBEL_PASSWORD# ? --oms "&UC4RB_SIEBEL_OBJECT_MANAGERS#" ? -mr &UC4RB_SIEBEL_MAXIMUM_RETRIES# ? -d &UC4RB_SIEBEL_DELAY_IN_SECONDS# &SIEBEL_PROPERTIES# :JCL_CONCAT_CHAR

:INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SIEBEL.PRV.INCLUDE.ATTACH_RESOURCES :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_HEADER_PARAM_VALIDATION
:DEFINE &STRING_ARR#, string, 30 :SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Hostname of Siebel Server" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_SIEBEL_SERVER_URL# :SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Port of Siebel server" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_SIEBEL_PORT# :SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Siebel object manager" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_SIEBEL_OBJECT_MANAGERS# :SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Siebel administrator username" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_SIEBEL_USER# :SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Siebel Enterprise name" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_SIEBEL_ENTERPRISE#
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Number of seconds to wait between the retries" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_SIEBEL_DELAY_IN_SECONDS#
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Maximum number of retries" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_SIEBEL_MAXIMUM_RETRIES#
:INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_HEADER_EXECUTION :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.SUDOERS_HEADER :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.CHANGE_FOLDER_TO_AGENT_BIN :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.CHECK_RETURN_CODE_UNIX_SHELL :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SIEBEL.PRV.INCLUDE.CHECK_AVAILABILITY :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.CHECK_RETURN_CODE_UNIX_SHELL :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.SUDOERS_FOOTER

:INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SIEBEL.PRV.INCLUDE.ATTACH_RESOURCES ! check availability of siebel @echo off :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_HEADER_PARAM_VALIDATION
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Hostname of Siebel Server" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_SIEBEL_SERVER_URL# :SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Port of Siebel server" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_SIEBEL_PORT# :SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Siebel object manager" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_SIEBEL_OBJECT_MANAGERS# :SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Siebel administrator username" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_SIEBEL_USER# :SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Siebel Enterprise name" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_SIEBEL_ENTERPRISE#
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Number of seconds to wait between the retries" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_SIEBEL_DELAY_IN_SECONDS#
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Maximum number of retries" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_SIEBEL_MAXIMUM_RETRIES#
:INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_HEADER_EXECUTION
:INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.CHANGE_FOLDER_TO_AGENT_BIN :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.CHECK_RETURN_CODE_WINDOWS_CONSOLE :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SIEBEL.PRV.INCLUDE.CHECK_AVAILABILITY :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.CHECK_RETURN_CODE_WINDOWS_CONSOLE

DOCU_Docu.DOC:
= RB name = PCK.AUTOMIC_SIEBEL.PUB.ACTION.CHECK_SRF
= General description = Analyze the Generate Browser Script CMD output. It is ok when "Successfully created" appears. That also means the SRF Creation was fine. The action should run through if the line is found. If not the workflow should block. The line where you should find it looks like: Successfully created 8 files in "c:\adm1\BrowserScripts\srf1387467768_444\bscripts\all".
= Inputs = * Siebel SRF Output Directory: The Path where the SRF should be exported to. * Siebel SRF file name: File name of the SRF that is produced. * Siebel languages: Comma sepperated list of the installed languages * Generate Browser Script log directory: The Directory of the Siebel Log File output
= Behavior = (see general description)
= Outputs = * Return code is 0 if success. * Return code is 1 if not success.
= Rollback = (none)
= Logging = (none)
= Example = Siebel SRF Output Directory: C:\export Siebel SRF file name: SIEBEL_SIA.srf Siebel languages: ENU, NLD, HEBR Generate Browser Script log directory: C:\export

SCRIPT.MSCRI:
:INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SIEBEL.PRV.INCLUDE.ATTACH_RESOURCES @echo off setlocal enabledelayedexpansion
:INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_HEADER_PARAM_VALIDATION
:DEFINE &STRING_ARR#, string, 30 :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.NORMALIZE_PATH "UC4RB_CONVERTED_STRING" = "UC4RB_SIEBEL_EXPORT_FILE_PATH" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.NORMALIZE_PATH "UC4RB_CONVERTED_STRING" = "UC4RB_SIEBEL_OUTPUT_DIR"
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Siebel SRF Output Directory" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_SIEBEL_EXPORT_FILE_PATH# :SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Siebel SRF file name" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_SIEBEL_SRF_NAME# :SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Siebel languages" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_SIEBEL_LANGUAGES# :SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Generate Browser Script log directory" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_SIEBEL_OUTPUT_DIR#
set /a errors=0 > nul
! Check if SRF export directory exists :SET &UC4RB_CHECKME# = &UC4RB_SIEBEL_EXPORT_FILE_PATH# :INCLUDE PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.CHECK_WINDOWS_CONSOLE_FILE_EXISTS
if %EXIST% == 0 ( : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Siebel SRF Output Directory" : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_ERROR# = "Directory &UC4RB_SIEBEL_EXPORT_FILE_PATH# does not exist" : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_ERROR_PARAMETER set /a errors=1 > nul ) else ( if %ISDIR% == 0 ( : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Siebel SRF Output Directory" : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_ERROR# = "&UC4RB_SIEBEL_EXPORT_FILE_PATH# exists but is not a directory " : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_ERROR_PARAMETER set /a errors=2 > nul ) )
! Check if Browser Script output directory exist :SET &UC4RB_CHECKME# = &UC4RB_SIEBEL_OUTPUT_DIR# :INCLUDE PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.CHECK_WINDOWS_CONSOLE_FILE_EXISTS
if %EXIST% == 0 ( : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Generate Browser Script log directory" : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_ERROR# = "Directory &UC4RB_SIEBEL_OUTPUT_DIR# does not exist" : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_ERROR_PARAMETER set /a errors=1 > nul ) else ( if %ISDIR% == 0 ( : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Generate Browser Script log directory" : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_ERROR# = "&UC4RB_SIEBEL_OUTPUT_DIR# exists but is not a directory " : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_ERROR_PARAMETER set /a errors=2 > nul ) )
:DEFINE &ARRAY#, string, 20 :FILL &ARRAY#[] = STR_SPLIT(&UC4RB_SIEBEL_LANGUAGES#, ",") :SET &VAR# = 1 :SET &LEN# = LENGTH(&ARRAY#[], SIZE) :IF &LEN# LT 1 : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Siebel languages" : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_ERROR# = "Siebel languages parameter &UC4RB_SIEBEL_LANGUAGES# is invalid" : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_ERROR_PARAMETER set /a errors=1 > nul :ENDIF :WHILE &VAR# LE &LEN# : SET &UC4RB_SIEBEL_LANGUAGE# = &ARRAY#[&VAR#] ! Check if SRF file exists : SET &UC4RB_CHECKME# = &UC4RB_SIEBEL_EXPORT_FILE_PATH#\&UC4RB_SIEBEL_LANGUAGE#\&UC4RB_SIEBEL_SRF_NAME# : INCLUDE PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.CHECK_WINDOWS_CONSOLE_FILE_EXISTS
if %EXIST% == 0 ( : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Siebel SRF file name" : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_ERROR# = "SRF file &UC4RB_CHECKME# does not exist" : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_ERROR_PARAMETER set /a errors=1 > nul ) else ( if %ISFILE% == 0 ( : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Siebel SRF file name" : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_ERROR# = "&UC4RB_CHECKME# exists but is not a file " : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_ERROR_PARAMETER set /a errors=2 > nul ) ) ! Check if Browser script output file exists : SET &UC4RB_CHECKME# = &UC4RB_SIEBEL_OUTPUT_DIR#\&UC4RB_SIEBEL_LANGUAGE#\log.txt : INCLUDE PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.CHECK_WINDOWS_CONSOLE_FILE_EXISTS
if %EXIST% == 0 ( : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Generate Browser Script output file" : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_ERROR# = "Output file &UC4RB_CHECKME# does not exist" : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_ERROR_PARAMETER set /a errors=1 > nul ) else ( if %ISFILE% == 0 ( : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Generate Browser Script output file" : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_ERROR# = "&UC4RB_CHECKME# exists but is not a file " : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_ERROR_PARAMETER set /a errors=2 > nul ) ) : SET &VAR# = &VAR# + 1 :ENDWHILE
if %errors% GTR 0 ( set retcode=%errors% goto :retcode )
:INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_HEADER_EXECUTION :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.ESCAPE_WINDOWS_CHARS "UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING" = "UC4RB_SIEBEL_OUTPUT_DIR" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.ESCAPE_WINDOWS_CHARS "UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING" = "UC4RB_SIEBEL_EXPORT_FILE_PATH"
cd /d "&UC4RB_SIEBEL_OUTPUT_DIR#\" :FILL &ARRAY#[] = STR_SPLIT(&UC4RB_SIEBEL_LANGUAGES#, ",") :SET &VAR# = 1 :SET &LEN# = LENGTH(&ARRAY#[], SIZE) set /a errors=0 > nul :WHILE &VAR# LE &LEN# : SET &UC4RB_SIEBEL_LANGUAGE# = &ARRAY#[&VAR#] ! Check SRF file size > 30 Mb : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_INFO# = "Checking file size of SRF file &UC4RB_SIEBEL_EXPORT_FILE_PATH#\&UC4RB_SIEBEL_LANGUAGE#\&UC4RB_SIEBEL_SRF_NAME#..." : INCLUDE PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_INFO !for command fails to get file size if the path contains special characters, need to call "cd" first
cd /d "&UC4RB_SIEBEL_EXPORT_FILE_PATH#\&UC4RB_SIEBEL_LANGUAGE#" for /f "usebackq tokens=*" %%I in ('&UC4RB_SIEBEL_SRF_NAME#') do @set size=%%~zI echo "SRF file size is %size%KB" if %size% LEQ 31457280 ( : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_ERROR# = "SRF file &UC4RB_SIEBEL_EXPORT_FILE_PATH#\&UC4RB_SIEBEL_LANGUAGE#\&UC4RB_SIEBEL_SRF_NAME# is less than 30Mb" : INCLUDE PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_ERROR set /a errors=1 > nul )
! Check the last line in CMD line output contain "Successfully created" text : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_INFO# = "Checking Generate browser script output at &UC4RB_SIEBEL_OUTPUT_DIR#\&UC4RB_SIEBEL_LANGUAGE#\log.txt..." : INCLUDE PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_INFO find "Successfully created" "&UC4RB_SIEBEL_OUTPUT_DIR#\&UC4RB_SIEBEL_LANGUAGE#\log.txt" set /a finderror=%ERRORLEVEL% > nul cmd /c exit 0 > nul if NOT %finderror% == 0 ( set /a errors=%finderror% > nul : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_ERROR# = "Failed to generate browser script, please check log file &UC4RB_SIEBEL_OUTPUT_DIR#\&UC4RB_SIEBEL_LANGUAGE#\log.txt for more detail" : INCLUDE PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_ERROR ) else ( del "&UC4RB_SIEBEL_OUTPUT_DIR#\&UC4RB_SIEBEL_LANGUAGE#\log.txt" ) : SET &VAR# = &VAR# + 1 :ENDWHILE if %errors% GTR 0 ( set retcode=%errors% goto :retcode ) : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_INFO# = "Checked SRF and found OK!" : INCLUDE PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_INFO

DOCU_Docu.DOC:
= RB name = PCK.AUTOMIC_SIEBEL.PUB.ACTION.CLEAR_LOV_CACHE = General description = Clear the list-of-values cache of a Siebel system. It is required to keep the UI in sync with the changes on the LOVs. = Inputs = * Siebel Server Url: Siebel Server host * Siebel Port: port Siebel is listening on. * Siebel Enterprise: Enterprise that the databean should connect to. * Object Manager: The Objectmanagers to connect with the Databean to check if Siebel is running. (No Spaces!!) * Siebel Username: The Siebel user to connect. * Siebel Password: The Password to connect with the Siebel user.
= Behavior = See description = Outputs = * Return code is 0 if success * Return code is 4 if not success. = Rollback = (none) = Logging = (none) = Example = (none)

= RB name = PCK.AUTOMIC_SIEBEL.PUB.ACTION.CLEAR_RESPONSIBILITY_CACHE = General description = Clear the Responsibilities cache of a Siebel system. It is required to keep the UI in sync with the changes on the Responsibilities. = Inputs = * Siebel Server Url: Siebel Server host * Siebel Port: port Siebel is listening on. * Siebel Enterprise: Enterprise that the databean should connect to. * Siebel Username: The Siebel user to connect. * Siebel Password: The Password to connect with the Siebel user. * Object Manager: The Objectmanagers to connect with the Databean to check if Siebel is running. = Behavior = This action can run on every host that has the appropriate installed Java version and can connect to the Target Siebel server. = Outputs = * Return code is 0 if success * Return code is 4 if not success. = Rollback = (none) = Logging = (none) = Example = (none)

= RB name = Action name: PCK.AUTOMIC_SIEBEL.PUB.ACTION.COLLECT_FILES
= General description = Collect all files that have to transfer and make a zip package Files to collect: Images <SiebelServer_HomeDir>\webmaster\images\[language_3_letter_code]\* Web Templates: <SiebelServer_HomeDir>\webtempl\* Java Applets: <SiebelServer_HomeDir>\webmaster\siebel_build\applets\* Java Scripts: <SiebelServer_HomeDir>\webmaster\siebel_build\scripts\* CSS: <SiebelServer_HomeDir>\webmaster\files\[language_3_letter_code]\* <webserver public directory>/[language_3_letter_code]/files <webserver public directory>/[language_3_letter_code]/images <webserver public directory>/[language_3_letter_code]/<Siebel build Nr.>/scripts <webserver public directory>/[language_3_letter_code]/<Siebel build Nr.>/applets
= Inputs = * Siebel Server Directory: The installation or root directory for Siebel Server * Siebel languages: Comma sepperated list of the installed languages * Siebel web server public directory: The public directory of the siebel web server * Export file path: The full path to zip file
= Behavior = (see general description)
= Outputs = * Return code is 0 if success. * Return code is 1 if not success.
= Rollback = (none)
= Logging = (none)
= Example = * Siebel Server Directory: C:\sba81\siebsrvr * Siebel languages: ENU, NLD, GER * Siebel web server public directory: D:\sba81\Client\PUBLIC * Export file path: C:\export\collectedfiles.zip

POST_SCRIPT.OSCRI:
: SET &UC4RB_OUT_COLLECT_FILES_ZIP# = &UC4RB_SIEBEL_EXPORT_FILE_PATH# : PUBLISH &UC4RB_OUT_COLLECT_FILES_ZIP#, , "TOP"
: SET &IS_WIN# = YES : PUBLISH &IS_WIN#, , "TOP"

PROMPTSETDATA.DATAEDITOR: <PRPTS ontop="1"><PRPTBOX><UC4RB_SIEBEL_SERVER_ROOTs.00 haslist="0" msgnr="-1" msginsert="" altview="0" promptname="UC4RB_SIEBEL_SERVER_ROOT#" ReadFromTable="OPSE">&ENV#?SIEBEL_SERVER_ROOT</UC4RB_SIEBEL_SERVER_ROOTs.00><UC4RB_SIEBEL_LANGUAGESs.00 haslist="0" msgnr="-1" msginsert="" altview="0" promptname="UC4RB_SIEBEL_LANGUAGES#" ReadFromTable="OPSE">&ENV#?SIEBEL_LANGUAGES</UC4RB_SIEBEL_LANGUAGESs.00><UC4RB_SIEBEL_WS_PUB_DIRs.00 haslist="0" msgnr="-1" msginsert="" altview="0" promptname="UC4RB_SIEBEL_WS_PUB_DIR#" ReadFromTable="OPSE">&ENV#?SIEBEL_WS_PUB_DIR</UC4RB_SIEBEL_WS_PUB_DIRs.00><UC4RB_SIEBEL_EXPORT_FILE_PATHs.00 haslist="0" msgnr="-1" msginsert="" altview="0" promptname="UC4RB_SIEBEL_EXPORT_FILE_PATH#" ReadFromTable="OPSE"></UC4RB_SIEBEL_EXPORT_FILE_PATHs.00></PRPTBOX></PRPTS>

XHEADER.Title: Copy Archive to Siebel Target Machine

SCRIPT.MSCRI:
:IF SYS_HOST_ALIVE("&AGENT#") = "N" : PRINT "OS Agent must be active to copy neccessary packages." : EXIT 99 :ENDIF
:IF &UC4RB_SIEBEL_SOURCE_HOST# <> "" : IF SYS_HOST_ALIVE("&UC4RB_SIEBEL_SOURCE_HOST#") = "N" : PRINT "Source agent must be active to copy neccessary packages." : EXIT 99 : ENDIF :ENDIF :SET &UC4RB_SIEBEL_IMPORT_PCK_DIR# = "&UC4RB_SIEBEL_TARGET_DIR#" :PUBLISH &UC4RB_SIEBEL_IMPORT_PCK_DIR#,,"TOP" :SET &UC4RB_SIEBEL_IMPORT_PCK_NAME# = "&UC4RB_SIEBEL_TARGET_PCK_NAME#"; :PUBLISH &UC4RB_SIEBEL_IMPORT_PCK_NAME#,,"TOP"

DOCU_Docu.DOC:
= RB name = PCK.AUTOMIC_SIEBEL.PUB.ACTION.COPY_ARCHIVE_TO_TARGET = General description = Copies the archive file created on the Siebel Source machine, to the Siebel Target Machine. The tar command must be parameterized in a way that the permissions are retained for the packaged files. = Inputs = * Siebel Source Host: The host to copy the Archive from * Siebel Source Dir: The Directory where the Archive is placed * Siebel Source Archive Name: The Name of the Archive. * Siebel Target Dir: The Directory where the Archive is placed * Siebel Target Archive Name: The Name of the Archive.
= Behavior = (see general description) = Outputs = * Return code is 0 if success * Return code is 1 if not success. = Rollback = (none) = Logging = (none) = Example = (none)

SCRIPT.MSCRI:
:INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SIEBEL.PRV.INCLUDE.ATTACH_RESOURCES @echo off !setlocal enabledelayedexpansion :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_HEADER_PARAM_VALIDATION
:DEFINE &STRING_ARR#,string,30 :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.NORMALIZE_PATH "UC4RB_CONVERTED_STRING" = "UC4RB_SIEBEL_SOURCE_DIR" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.NORMALIZE_PATH "UC4RB_CONVERTED_STRING" = "UC4RB_SIEBEL_TARGET_DIR"
:SET &UC4RB_SOURCE_FILE# = "&UC4RB_SIEBEL_SOURCE_DIR#\&UC4RB_SIEBEL_SOURCE_PCK_NAME#" :SET &UC4RB_TARGET_FILE# = "&UC4RB_SIEBEL_TARGET_DIR#\&UC4RB_SIEBEL_TARGET_PCK_NAME#"
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Siebel Source Host" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_SIEBEL_SOURCE_HOST#
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Siebel Source Dir" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_SIEBEL_SOURCE_DIR#
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Siebel Source Archive Name" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_SIEBEL_SOURCE_PCK_NAME#
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Siebel Target Dir" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_SIEBEL_TARGET_DIR#
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Siebel Target Archive Name" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_SIEBEL_TARGET_PCK_NAME#
set /a errors=0 > nul
! Check if source archive file exists :SET &UC4RB_CHECKME# = &UC4RB_SOURCE_FILE# :INCLUDE PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.CHECK_WINDOWS_CONSOLE_FILE_EXISTS
if %EXIST% == 0 ( : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Siebel source archive file" : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_ERROR# = "Siebel source archive &UC4RB_CHECKME# does not exist" : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_ERROR_PARAMETER set /a errors=1 > nul ) else ( if %ISFILE% == 0 ( : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Siebel source archive file" : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_ERROR# = "Siebel source archive &UC4RB_CHECKME# exists but is not a file " : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_ERROR_PARAMETER set /a errors=2 > nul ) )
! Check if target dir exists if not exist "&UC4RB_SIEBEL_TARGET_DIR#\" ( mkdir "&UC4RB_SIEBEL_TARGET_DIR#\" ) set retcode=%errorlevel% if NOT %ERRORLEVEL% == 0 ( : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Siebel Target Dir" : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_ERROR# = "Target directory &UC4RB_SIEBEL_TARGET_DIR# is invalid" : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_ERROR_PARAMETER goto :retcode ) :IF &UC4RB_SIEBEL_OVERWRITE# = 'No' : SET &UC4RB_CHECKME# = &UC4RB_TARGET_FILE# : INCLUDE PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.CHECK_WINDOWS_CONSOLE_FILE_EXISTS
if %EXIST% == 1 ( : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Siebel target archive file" : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_ERROR# = "Siebel target archive &UC4RB_CHECKME# already existed and overwrite flag set to No" : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_ERROR_PARAMETER set /a errors=1 > nul ) :ENDIF
if %errors% GTR 0 ( set retcode=%errors% goto :retcode ) :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_HEADER_EXECUTION :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.CHANGE_FOLDER_TO_AGENT_BIN
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_INFO# = "Copy siebel package from &UC4RB_SOURCE_FILE# to &UC4RB_TARGET_FILE# ..." :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_INFO copy "&UC4RB_SOURCE_FILE#" "&UC4RB_TARGET_FILE#" /Y if NOT %ERRORLEVEL% == 0 ( set retcode=%errorlevel% goto :retcode )

:INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SIEBEL.PRV.INCLUDE.ATTACH_RESOURCES
:INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_HEADER_PARAM_VALIDATION
:DEFINE &STRING_ARR#,string,30 :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.NORMALIZE_PATH "UC4RB_CONVERTED_STRING" = "UC4RB_SIEBEL_SOURCE_DIR" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.NORMALIZE_PATH "UC4RB_CONVERTED_STRING" = "UC4RB_SIEBEL_TARGET_DIR"
:SET &UC4RB_SOURCE_FILE# = "&UC4RB_SIEBEL_SOURCE_DIR#/&UC4RB_SIEBEL_SOURCE_PCK_NAME#" :SET &UC4RB_TARGET_FILE# = "&UC4RB_SIEBEL_TARGET_DIR#/&UC4RB_SIEBEL_TARGET_PCK_NAME#"
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Siebel Source Host" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_SIEBEL_SOURCE_HOST#
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Siebel Source Dir" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_SIEBEL_SOURCE_DIR#
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Siebel Source Archive Name" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_SIEBEL_SOURCE_PCK_NAME#
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Siebel Target Dir" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_SIEBEL_TARGET_DIR#
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Siebel Target Archive Name" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_SIEBEL_TARGET_PCK_NAME#
errors=0
! Check if source archive file exists :SET &UC4RB_CHECKME# = &UC4RB_SOURCE_FILE# :INCLUDE PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.CHECK_UNIX_SHELL_FILE_EXISTS
if [ $EXIST -eq 0 ] then : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Siebel source archive file" : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_ERROR# = "Siebel source archive &UC4RB_CHECKME# does not exist" : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_ERROR_PARAMETER errors=1 else if [ "$ISFILE" -eq "0" ] ; then : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Siebel source archive file" : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_ERROR# = "Siebel source archive &UC4RB_CHECKME# exists but is not a file " : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_ERROR_PARAMETER errors=2 fi fi
! Check if target dir exists : SET &UC4RB_CONVERTED_STRING# = "&UC4RB_SIEBEL_TARGET_DIR#" : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.ENSURE_DIRECTORY_EXISTS_UNIX
:IF &UC4RB_SIEBEL_OVERWRITE# = 'No' : SET &UC4RB_CHECKME# = &UC4RB_TARGET_FILE# : INCLUDE PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.CHECK_UNIX_SHELL_FILE_EXISTS
if [ $EXIST -eq 1 ] then : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Siebel target archive file" : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_ERROR# = "Siebel target archive &UC4RB_CHECKME# already existed and overwrite flag set to No" : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_ERROR_PARAMETER errors=1 fi :ENDIF
if [ $errors -ne 0 ] then exit $errors fi
:INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_HEADER_EXECUTION :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.CHANGE_FOLDER_TO_AGENT_BIN
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_INFO# = "Copy siebel package from &UC4RB_SOURCE_FILE# to &UC4RB_TARGET_FILE# ..." :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_INFO \cp -f -p "&UC4RB_SOURCE_FILE#" "&UC4RB_TARGET_FILE#" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.CHECK_RETURN_CODE_UNIX_SHELL

XHEADER.Title: Copy Files to Target Siebel System

SCRIPT.MSCRI: : PUBLISH &UC4RB_SIEBEL_SERVER_HOME_DIR#,,"TOP" : PUBLISH &UC4RB_SIEBEL_LANGUAGES#,,"TOP"

DOCU_Docu.DOC:
= RB name = PCK.AUTOMIC_SIEBEL.PUB.ACTION.COPY_FILE_TO_TARGET
= General description = This Action first creates a backup of files on the Siebel Server and then copies the files from the archive file. This Action runs on the Siebel target Server.
= Inputs = * Deployment Package Dir: The directory, where the deployment package should be imported from * Deployment Package Filename: The deployment package file name to import * Backup Directory Name: Base file path fort the Backup * Siebel Server Home Directory: The home dir of the siebel server. * Languages to use for the Import: The installed languages as comma sepperated list. * Siebel WebServer Public Directory: The public directory of the siebel web server
= Behavior = This Action first creates a backup of files on the Siebel Server and then copies the files from the archive file. This Action runs on the Siebel target Server. Steps: * Create Backup Directory Create a Directory. Accept an Entry for the Base directory of the Backup. Base Directory: siebel_backup Backup Dir: actual Date --> YYYYMMDD_HHMMSS * Backup Files Put all of the following files in the backup Directory: Browser Script Dir (For all languages) current .SRF File (For all languages) webtemplates (*.swt) css (For all languages) * Put SRF to Directory An Action that moves the new SRF File to the specified Directory and overwrites the existing old one. (that is language dependent and has to be repeated for every given Language). The Directory is the same from the root directory of the siebel server, on every siebel server. * Copy Rest of Files In the export there was a creation of an archive, that puts together some files. These files have to be put in place, on the target machine. The directories have to be the same as on source. Owners and Groups must be compatible to the target system. The access rights must be the same as on the source system.
= Outputs = * Return code is 0 if success * Return code is 1 if not success.
= Rollback = (none)
= Logging = (none)
= Example = (none)

SCRIPT.MSCRI:
:INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SIEBEL.PRV.INCLUDE.ATTACH_RESOURCES :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.POWERSHELL_UTILITY :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_HEADER_PARAM_VALIDATION
:DEFINE &STRING_ARR#,string,30 :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.NORMALIZE_PATH "UC4RB_CONVERTED_STRING" = "UC4RB_SIEBEL_SERVER_HOME_DIR" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.NORMALIZE_PATH "UC4RB_CONVERTED_STRING" = "UC4RB_SIEBEL_WS_PUB_DIR" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.NORMALIZE_PATH "UC4RB_CONVERTED_STRING" = "UC4RB_SIEBEL_CREATED_DIR"
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Siebel Server Home Directory" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_SIEBEL_SERVER_HOME_DIR# :SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Siebel WebServer Public Directory" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_SIEBEL_WS_PUB_DIR# :SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Backup Directory Name" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_SIEBEL_CREATED_DIR#
! Check Backup Directory Name exists :SET &UC4RB_CHECKME# = &UC4RB_SIEBEL_CREATED_DIR# :INCLUDE PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.CHECK_WINDOWS_POWERSHELL_FILE_EXISTS $errors = 0 if ($EXIST -eq 0) { : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Backup Directory Name" : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_ERROR# = "Directory &UC4RB_SIEBEL_CREATED_DIR# does not exist" : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_ERROR_PARAMETER $errors=1 } elseif ($ISDIR -eq 0){ : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Backup Directory Name" : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_ERROR# = "&UC4RB_SIEBEL_CREATED_DIR# exists but is not a directory " : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_ERROR_PARAMETER $errors=2 }
! Action return if directories does not exist if ($errors -gt 0) { exit $errors }
! Start execution :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_HEADER_EXECUTION :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.CHANGE_FOLDER_TO_AGENT_BIN
! getting siebel build number by executing list server cmd in srvrmgr tool ! $buildNumber = Get-Content "&UC4RB_SIEBEL_SERVER_HOME_DIR#\base.txt"| select-string -Pattern "`[[0-9\-]*`]" -allmatches | select -expa matches | select -expa value ! $buildNumber = $buildNumber.replace("[","").replace("]","")
:SET &CONTAINER# = "&UC4RB_AGENT_WORKING_DIR#\temp&$RUNID#" ! create container dir $tempDir = "&CONTAINER#" New-Item -Path "$tempDir" -Force -ItemType directory :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.CHECK_RETURN_CODE_WINDOWS_POWERSHELL
$languages = "&UC4RB_SIEBEL_LANGUAGES#" $serverFullDir = "&UC4RB_SIEBEL_SERVER_HOME_DIR#"; $wsPubDir = "&UC4RB_SIEBEL_WS_PUB_DIR#";
$strArr = $serverFullDir.Split("\") $exportServerDir = $strArr[$strArr.length-1];
$strArr = $wsPubDir.Split("\") $exportWsPubDir = $strArr[$strArr.length-2]+"\"+$strArr[$strArr.length-1];
! Backup Browser Script Dir <SiebelServer_HomeDir>\bscripts\* $targetDir = $tempDir+"\"+$exportServerDir+"\bscripts" if (!(Test-Path -Path "$targetDir")) { New-Item -Path "$targetDir" -Force -ItemType directory } Copy-Item "$serverFullDir\bscripts\*" -Destination "$targetDir" -Force -Recurse :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.CHECK_RETURN_CODE_WINDOWS_POWERSHELL
! Backup SRF Files: <SiebelServer_HomeDir>\OBJECTS\* $targetDir = $tempDir+"\"+$exportServerDir+"\OBJECTS" if (!(Test-Path -Path "$targetDir")) { New-Item -Path "$targetDir" -Force -ItemType directory } Copy-Item "$serverFullDir\OBJECTS\*" -Destination "$targetDir" -Force -Recurse :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.CHECK_RETURN_CODE_WINDOWS_POWERSHELL
! Backup Web Templates: <SiebelServer_HomeDir>\webtempl\* $targetDir = $tempDir+"\"+$exportServerDir+"\webtempl" if (!(Test-Path -Path "$targetDir")) { New-Item -Path "$targetDir" -Force -ItemType directory } Copy-Item "$serverFullDir\webtempl\*" -Destination "$targetDir" -Force -Recurse :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.CHECK_RETURN_CODE_WINDOWS_POWERSHELL
! Backup CSS Files: <SiebelServer_HomeDir>\webmaster\files\* $targetDir = $tempDir+"\"+$exportServerDir+"\webmaster\files" if (!(Test-Path -Path "$targetDir")) { New-Item -Path "$targetDir" -Force -ItemType directory } Copy-Item "$serverFullDir\webmaster\files\*" -Destination "$targetDir" -Force -Recurse :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.CHECK_RETURN_CODE_WINDOWS_POWERSHELL
! Backup Files: <WebServer Public Directory>/[language_3_letter_code]/files ! Backup Files: <WebServer Public Directory>/[language_3_letter_code]/images ! Backup Files: <WebServer Public Directory>/[language_3_letter_code]/<Siebel build Nr.>/scripts ! Backup Files: <WebServer Public Directory>/[language_3_letter_code]/<Siebel build Nr.>/applets $targetDir = $tempDir+"\"+$exportWsPubDir if (!(Test-Path -Path "$targetDir")) { New-Item -Path "$targetDir" -Force -ItemType directory } Copy-Item "$wsPubDir\*" -Destination "$targetDir" -Force -Recurse :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.CHECK_RETURN_CODE_WINDOWS_POWERSHELL
! Copy $tempDir to backup directory :SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_INFO# = "Starting backup files to &UC4RB_SIEBEL_CREATED_DIR#..." :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_INFO
Copy-Item "$tempDir\*" -Destination "&UC4RB_SIEBEL_CREATED_DIR#" -Force -Recurse :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.CHECK_RETURN_CODE_WINDOWS_POWERSHELL
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_INFO# = "Backup files successfully to &UC4RB_SIEBEL_CREATED_DIR#" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_INFO
! remove container dir Remove-Item "$tempDir" -Force -Recurse :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.CHECK_RETURN_CODE_WINDOWS_POWERSHELL
__uc_return( 0 )

Check Deployment Package Extracted Directory exists :SET &UC4RB_CHECKME# = &UC4RB_SIEBEL_EXTRACTED_DIR# :INCLUDE PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.CHECK_UNIX_SHELL_FILE_EXISTS errors=0 if [ "$EXIST" -eq "0" ]; then : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Deployment Package Extracted Directory" : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_ERROR# = "Directory &UC4RB_SIEBEL_EXTRACTED_DIR# does not exist" : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_ERROR_PARAMETER errors=1 elif [ "$ISDIR" -eq "0" ]; then : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Deployment Package Extracted Directory" : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_ERROR# = "&UC4RB_SIEBEL_EXTRACTED_DIR# exists but is not a directory " : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_ERROR_PARAMETER errors=2 fi

:DEFINE &ARRAY#, string, 20 :FILL &ARRAY#[] = STR_SPLIT(&UC4RB_SIEBEL_LANGUAGES#, ",") :SET &VAR# = 1 :SET &LEN# = LENGTH(&ARRAY#[], SIZE)
:WHILE &VAR# LE &LEN# : SET &LANG# = STR_TRIM(&ARRAY#[&VAR#]) : SET &LANG_UC# = STR_UC(&LANG#) : SET &LANG_LC# = STR_LC(&LANG#) sourceDir=$sourceBase/browser_scripts/&LANG# targetDir=$targetBase/webmaster/&LANG# targetDir_uc=$targetBase/webmaster/&LANG_UC# targetDir_lc=$targetBase/webmaster/&LANG_LC#
if [ -d "$sourceDir" ]; then echo "INFO: Copy file from $sourceDir to $targetDir." if [ -d "$targetDir_uc" ]; then cp -rf "$sourceDir"/* "$targetDir_uc" : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.CHECK_RETURN_CODE_UNIX_SHELL elif [ -d "$targetDir_lc" ]; then cp -rf "$sourceDir"/* "$targetDir_lc" : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.CHECK_RETURN_CODE_UNIX_SHELL else mkdir -p "$targetDir" cp -rf "$sourceDir"/* "$targetDir" : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.CHECK_RETURN_CODE_UNIX_SHELL fi fi : SET &VAR# = &VAR# + 1 :ENDWHILE

:DEFINE &STRING_ARR#,string,30 :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.NORMALIZE_PATH "UC4RB_CONVERTED_STRING" = "UC4RB_SIEBEL_SERVER_HOME_DIR" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.NORMALIZE_PATH "UC4RB_CONVERTED_STRING" = "UC4RB_SIEBEL_WS_PUB_DIR" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.NORMALIZE_PATH "UC4RB_CONVERTED_STRING" = "UC4RB_SIEBEL_CREATED_DIR"
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Siebel Server Home Directory" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_SIEBEL_SERVER_HOME_DIR# :SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Siebel WebServer Public Directory" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_SIEBEL_WS_PUB_DIR# :SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Backup Directory Name" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_SIEBEL_CREATED_DIR#
! <Begin of sudo script> :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.SUDOERS_HEADER ! Check Backup Directory Name exists :SET &UC4RB_CHECKME# = &UC4RB_SIEBEL_CREATED_DIR# :INCLUDE PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.CHECK_UNIX_SHELL_FILE_EXISTS errors=0 if [ "$EXIST" -eq "0" ]; then : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Backup Directory Name" : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_ERROR# = "Directory &UC4RB_SIEBEL_CREATED_DIR# does not exist" : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_ERROR_PARAMETER errors=1 elif [ "$ISDIR" -eq "0" ]; then : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Backup Directory Name" : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_ERROR# = "&UC4RB_SIEBEL_CREATED_DIR# exists but is not a directory " : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_ERROR_PARAMETER errors=2 fi
! Action return if directories does not exist if [ "$errors" -gt 0 ]; then exit $errors; fi
! Start execution :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_HEADER_EXECUTION :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.CHANGE_FOLDER_TO_AGENT_BIN
! getting siebel build number by executing list server cmd in srvrmgr tool ! $buildNumber = Get-Content "&UC4RB_SIEBEL_SERVER_HOME_DIR#\base.txt"| select-string -Pattern "`[[0-9\-]*`]" -allmatches | select -expa matches | select -expa value ! $buildNumber = $buildNumber.replace("[","").replace("]","")
! create container dir :SET &CONTAINER# = "&UC4RB_AGENT_WORKING_DIR#/temp&$RUNID#" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.ENSURE_DIRECTORY_EXISTS_UNIX "UC4RB_CONVERTED_STRING" = "CONTAINER"
tempDir="&CONTAINER#" languages="&UC4RB_SIEBEL_LANGUAGES#" serverFullDir="&UC4RB_SIEBEL_SERVER_HOME_DIR#" ! wsPubDir="&UC4RB_SIEBEL_WS_PUB_DIR#"
exportServerDir="$(basename "$serverFullDir")"
! $strArr = $wsPubDir.Split("\") ! $exportWsPubDir = $strArr[$strArr.length-2]+"\"+$strArr[$strArr.length-1];
! Backup Browser Script Dir <SiebelServer_HomeDir>\bscripts\* targetDir=$tempDir/$exportServerDir/bscripts
if [ ! -d "$targetDir" ]; then mkdir -p "$targetDir" : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.CHECK_RETURN_CODE_UNIX_SHELL fi
if [ -d "$serverFullDir/bscripts" ]; then cp -rf "$serverFullDir/bscripts"/* "$targetDir" : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.CHECK_RETURN_CODE_UNIX_SHELL fi
! Backup SRF Files: <SiebelServer_HomeDir>\OBJECTS\* targetDir=$tempDir/$exportServerDir/objects if [ ! -d "$targetDir" ]; then mkdir -p "$targetDir" : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.CHECK_RETURN_CODE_UNIX_SHELL fi
if [ -d "$serverFullDir/objects" ]; then cp -rf "$serverFullDir/objects"/* "$targetDir" : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.CHECK_RETURN_CODE_UNIX_SHELL fi
! ! Backup Web Templates: <SiebelServer_HomeDir>\webtempl\* targetDir=$tempDir/$exportServerDir/webtempl if [ ! -d "$targetDir" ]; then mkdir -p "$targetDir" : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.CHECK_RETURN_CODE_UNIX_SHELL fi
if [ -d "$serverFullDir/webtempl" ]; then cp -rf "$serverFullDir/webtempl"/* "$targetDir" : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.CHECK_RETURN_CODE_UNIX_SHELL fi
! ! Backup CSS Files: <SiebelServer_HomeDir>\webmaster\files\* targetDir=$tempDir/$exportServerDir/webmaster/files if [ ! -d "$targetDir" ]; then mkdir -p "$targetDir" : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.CHECK_RETURN_CODE_UNIX_SHELL fi
if [ -d "$serverFullDir/webmaster/files" ]; then cp -rf "$serverFullDir/webmaster/files"/* "$targetDir" : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.CHECK_RETURN_CODE_UNIX_SHELL fi
! Backup Files: <WebServer Public Directory>/[language_3_letter_code]/files ! Backup Files: <WebServer Public Directory>/[language_3_letter_code]/images ! Backup Files: <WebServer Public Directory>/[language_3_letter_code]/<Siebel build Nr.>/scripts ! Backup Files: <WebServer Public Directory>/[language_3_letter_code]/<Siebel build Nr.>/applets ! targetDir=$tempDir/$exportWsPubDir ! if [ ! -d "$targetDir" ]; then ! mkdir -p "$targetDir" ! : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.CHECK_RETURN_CODE_UNIX_SHELL ! fi
! if [ -d "$wsPubDir" ]; then ! cd "$wsPubDir" ! cp -rf * "$targetDir" ! : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.CHECK_RETURN_CODE_UNIX_SHELL ! fi
! Copy $tempDir to backup directory :SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_INFO# = "Starting backup files to &UC4RB_SIEBEL_CREATED_DIR#..." :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_INFO
cp -rf "$tempDir"/* "&UC4RB_SIEBEL_CREATED_DIR#" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.CHECK_RETURN_CODE_UNIX_SHELL
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_INFO# = "Backup files successfully to &UC4RB_SIEBEL_CREATED_DIR#" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_INFO
! remove container dir rm -rf "$tempDir" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.CHECK_RETURN_CODE_UNIX_SHELL
:INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.SUDOERS_FOOTER ! <End of sudo script>

:INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SIEBEL.PRV.INCLUDE.ATTACH_RESOURCES :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.POWERSHELL_UTILITY :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_HEADER_PARAM_VALIDATION
:DEFINE &STRING_ARR#,string,30 :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.NORMALIZE_PATH "UC4RB_CONVERTED_STRING" = "UC4RB_SIEBEL_SERVER_HOME_DIR" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.NORMALIZE_PATH "UC4RB_CONVERTED_STRING" = "UC4RB_SIEBEL_EXTRACTED_DIR"
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Siebel Server Home Directory" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_SIEBEL_SERVER_HOME_DIR# :SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Languages to use for the Import" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_SIEBEL_LANGUAGES# :SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Deployment Package Extracted Directory" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_SIEBEL_EXTRACTED_DIR#
! Check Deployment Package Extracted Directory exists :SET &UC4RB_CHECKME# = &UC4RB_SIEBEL_EXTRACTED_DIR# :INCLUDE PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.CHECK_WINDOWS_POWERSHELL_FILE_EXISTS $errors = 0 if ($EXIST -eq 0) { : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Deployment Package Extracted Directory" : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_ERROR# = "Directory &UC4RB_SIEBEL_EXTRACTED_DIR# does not exist" : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_ERROR_PARAMETER $errors=1 } elseif ($ISDIR -eq 0){ : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Deployment Package Extracted Directory" : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_ERROR# = "&UC4RB_SIEBEL_EXTRACTED_DIR# exists but is not a directory " : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_ERROR_PARAMETER $errors=2 }
! Action return if directories does not exist if ($errors -gt 0) { exit $errors }
! Start execution :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_HEADER_EXECUTION :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.CHANGE_FOLDER_TO_AGENT_BIN
$languages = "&UC4RB_SIEBEL_LANGUAGES#" $sourceBase = "&UC4RB_SIEBEL_EXTRACTED_DIR#" $targetBase = "&UC4RB_SIEBEL_SERVER_HOME_DIR#"
! Copy SRF files to siebel objects directory :SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_INFO# = "Start copying Browser Script to &UC4RB_SIEBEL_SERVER_HOME_DIR#..." :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_INFO
$strLang = $languages.Split(",") ForEach ($lang in $strLang) { $sourceDir = $sourceBase + "\browser_scripts\" + $lang.Trim() $targetDir = $targetBase + "\WEBMASTER\" + $lang.Trim() if (Test-Path -Path "$sourceDir") { Write-Host "INFO: Copy file from $sourceDir to $targetDir." if (!(Test-Path -Path "$targetDir")) { New-Item -Path "$targetDir" -Force -ItemType directory :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.CHECK_RETURN_CODE_WINDOWS_POWERSHELL } Copy-Item "$sourceDir\*" -Destination "$targetDir" -Force -Recurse :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.CHECK_RETURN_CODE_WINDOWS_POWERSHELL } }
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_INFO# = "Copy Browser Script files successfully to &UC4RB_SIEBEL_SERVER_HOME_DIR#" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_INFO
__uc_return( 0 )

:INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SIEBEL.PRV.INCLUDE.ATTACH_RESOURCES
:INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_HEADER_PARAM_VALIDATION
:DEFINE &STRING_ARR#,string,30 :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.NORMALIZE_PATH "UC4RB_CONVERTED_STRING" = "UC4RB_SIEBEL_DEPL_PKG_DIR"
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Deployment Package Directory" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_SIEBEL_DEPL_PKG_DIR# :SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Deployment Package Name" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_SIEBEL_DEPL_PKG_FILENAME#
! <Begin of sudo script> :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.SUDOERS_HEADER
:SET &UC4RB_SIEBEL_PACKAGE_FILENAME# = "&UC4RB_SIEBEL_DEPL_PKG_DIR#/&UC4RB_SIEBEL_DEPL_PKG_FILENAME#"
! Start execution :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_HEADER_EXECUTION :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.CHANGE_FOLDER_TO_AGENT_BIN
:SET &UC4RB_SIEBEL_EXTRACTED_DIR# = "&UC4RB_AGENT_WORKING_DIR#/temp&$RUNID#" :PUBLISH &UC4RB_SIEBEL_EXTRACTED_DIR#, , "TOP"
! Create extracted directory :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.ENSURE_DIRECTORY_EXISTS_UNIX "UC4RB_CONVERTED_STRING" = "UC4RB_SIEBEL_EXTRACTED_DIR"
! Extract deployment package to temp directory :SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_INFO# = "Start extracting file to &UC4RB_SIEBEL_EXTRACTED_DIR#..." :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_INFO
:SET &UC4RB_DIR_FI_UNPACK_NAME# = &UC4RB_SIEBEL_PACKAGE_FILENAME# :SET &UC4RB_DIR_FI_UNPACK_TARGET# = &UC4RB_SIEBEL_EXTRACTED_DIR# :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.UNPACK :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.CHECK_RETURN_CODE_UNIX_SHELL
! Search zip file in folder collected_files source_zip="$(ls "&UC4RB_SIEBEL_EXTRACTED_DIR#/collected_files/"*.zip)"
if [ "$source_zip" ]; then : SET &UC4RB_DIR_FI_UNPACK_NAME# = "$source_zip" : SET &UC4RB_DIR_FI_UNPACK_TARGET# = "&UC4RB_SIEBEL_EXTRACTED_DIR#/collected_files/" : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.UNPACK : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.CHECK_RETURN_CODE_UNIX_SHELL fi
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_INFO# = "Extracted files successfully to &UC4RB_SIEBEL_EXTRACTED_DIR#" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_INFO
:INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.SUDOERS_FOOTER ! <End of sudo script>

SCRIPT.MSCRI:
:INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SIEBEL.PRV.INCLUDE.ATTACH_RESOURCES :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_HEADER_PARAM_VALIDATION
:DEFINE &STRING_ARR#,string,30 :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.NORMALIZE_PATH "UC4RB_CONVERTED_STRING" = "UC4RB_SIEBEL_SERVER_HOME_DIR" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.NORMALIZE_PATH "UC4RB_CONVERTED_STRING" = "UC4RB_SIEBEL_WS_PUB_DIR" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.NORMALIZE_PATH "UC4RB_CONVERTED_STRING" = "UC4RB_SIEBEL_FILE_BACKUP_DIR" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.NORMALIZE_PATH "UC4RB_CONVERTED_STRING" = "UC4RB_SIEBEL_DEPL_PKG_DIR"
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Siebel Server Home Directory" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_SIEBEL_SERVER_HOME_DIR# :SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Siebel WebServer Public Directory" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_SIEBEL_WS_PUB_DIR# :SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Backup Directory Name" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_SIEBEL_FILE_BACKUP_DIR# :SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Deployment Package Directory" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_SIEBEL_DEPL_PKG_DIR# :SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Deployment Package Name" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_SIEBEL_DEPL_PKG_FILENAME# :SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Languages to use for the Import" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_SIEBEL_LANGUAGES#
! <Begin of sudo script> :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.SUDOERS_HEADER
! Check Siebel Server Home Directory exists :SET &UC4RB_CHECKME# = &UC4RB_SIEBEL_SERVER_HOME_DIR# :INCLUDE PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.CHECK_UNIX_SHELL_FILE_EXISTS errors=0 if [ "$EXIST" -eq "0" ]; then : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Siebel Server Home Directory" : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_ERROR# = "Directory &UC4RB_SIEBEL_SERVER_HOME_DIR# does not exist" : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_ERROR_PARAMETER errors=1 elif [ "$ISDIR" -eq "0" ]; then : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Siebel Server Home Directory" : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_ERROR# = "&UC4RB_SIEBEL_SERVER_HOME_DIR# exists but is not a directory " : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_ERROR_PARAMETER errors=2 fi
! Check Siebel WebServer Public Directory exists :SET &UC4RB_CHECKME# = &UC4RB_SIEBEL_WS_PUB_DIR# :INCLUDE PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.CHECK_UNIX_SHELL_FILE_EXISTS if [ "$EXIST" -eq "0" ]; then : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Siebel WebServer Public Directory" : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_ERROR# = "Directory &UC4RB_SIEBEL_WS_PUB_DIR# does not exist" : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_ERROR_PARAMETER errors=1 elif [ "$ISDIR" -eq "0" ]; then : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Siebel WebServer Public Directory" : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_ERROR# = "&UC4RB_SIEBEL_WS_PUB_DIR# exists but is not a directory " : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_ERROR_PARAMETER errors=2 fi
! Check Backup Directory Name exists :SET &UC4RB_CHECKME# = &UC4RB_SIEBEL_FILE_BACKUP_DIR# :INCLUDE PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.CHECK_UNIX_SHELL_FILE_EXISTS if [ "$EXIST" -eq "0" ]; then : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_INFO# = "Backup Directory Name: &UC4RB_SIEBEL_FILE_BACKUP_DIR# does not exist" : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_INFO elif [ "$ISDIR" -eq "0" ]; then : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_INFO# = "Backup Directory Name: &UC4RB_SIEBEL_FILE_BACKUP_DIR# exists but is not a directory" : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_INFO fi
! Check Deployment Package Directory exists :SET &UC4RB_CHECKME# = &UC4RB_SIEBEL_DEPL_PKG_DIR# :INCLUDE PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.CHECK_UNIX_SHELL_FILE_EXISTS if [ "$EXIST" -eq "0" ]; then : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Deployment Package Directory" : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_ERROR# = "Directory &UC4RB_SIEBEL_DEPL_PKG_DIR# does not exist" : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_ERROR_PARAMETER errors=1 elif [ "$ISDIR" -eq "0" ]; then : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Deployment Package Directory" : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_ERROR# = "&UC4RB_SIEBEL_DEPL_PKG_DIR# exists but is not a directory " : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_ERROR_PARAMETER errors=2 fi
:SET &UC4RB_SIEBEL_PACKAGE_FILENAME# = "&UC4RB_SIEBEL_DEPL_PKG_DIR#/&UC4RB_SIEBEL_DEPL_PKG_FILENAME#" ! Check Deployment Package File exists :SET &UC4RB_CHECKME# = &UC4RB_SIEBEL_PACKAGE_FILENAME# :INCLUDE PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.CHECK_UNIX_SHELL_FILE_EXISTS if [ "$EXIST" -eq "0" ]; then : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Deployment Package File" : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_ERROR# = "File &UC4RB_SIEBEL_PACKAGE_FILENAME# does not exist" : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_ERROR_PARAMETER errors=1 elif [ "$ISFILE" -eq "0" ]; then : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Deployment Package File" : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_ERROR# = "&UC4RB_SIEBEL_PACKAGE_FILENAME# exists but is not a file" : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_ERROR_PARAMETER errors=2 fi
! Action return if directories does not exist if [ "$errors" -gt 0 ]; then exit $errors; fi
:INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.SUDOERS_FOOTER ! <End of sudo script>

XHEADER.Title: Copy SRF file to Target directory

DOCU_Docu.DOC:
= RB name = PCK.AUTOMIC_SIEBEL.PUB.ACTION.COPY_SRF_TO_TARGET
= General description = This Action will moves the new SRF File to the specified Directory and overwrites the existing old one. (that is language dependent and has to be repeated for every given Language). The Directory is the same from the root directory of the siebel server, on every siebel server.
= Inputs = * Deployment Package Extracted Directory: The full path to extracted directory of source package * Siebel Server Home Directory: The home directory of the siebel server * Languages to use for the Import: The installed languages as comma sepperated list. * Maximum retries: Maximum retries time to copy/replace SRF file. * Delay time: Delay time per each retry (in second).
= Behavior = This Action will moves the new SRF File to the specified Directory and overwrites the existing old one. (that is language dependent and has to be repeated for every given Language). The Directory is the same from the root directory of the siebel server, on every siebel server.
= Outputs = * Return code is 0 if success * Return code is 1 if not success.
= Rollback = (none)
= Logging = (none)
= Example = (none)

SCRIPT.MSCRI:
:INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SIEBEL.PRV.INCLUDE.ATTACH_RESOURCES
:INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_HEADER_PARAM_VALIDATION
:DEFINE &STRING_ARR#,string,30 :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.NORMALIZE_PATH "UC4RB_CONVERTED_STRING" = "UC4RB_SIEBEL_SERVER_HOME_DIR" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.NORMALIZE_PATH "UC4RB_CONVERTED_STRING" = "UC4RB_SIEBEL_EXTRACTED_DIR"
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Deployment Package Extracted Directory" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_SIEBEL_EXTRACTED_DIR# :SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Siebel Server Home Directory" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_SIEBEL_SERVER_HOME_DIR# :SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Languages to use for the Import" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_SIEBEL_LANGUAGES# :SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Maximum retries" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_COPY_MAXIMUM_RETRIES# :SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Delay time" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_COPY_DELAY_TIME#
! <Begin of sudo script> :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.SUDOERS_HEADER ! Check Deployment Package Extracted Directory exists :SET &UC4RB_CHECKME# = &UC4RB_SIEBEL_EXTRACTED_DIR# :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.CHECK_UNIX_SHELL_FILE_EXISTS errors=0 if [ "$EXIST" -eq "0" ]; then : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Deployment Package Extracted Directory" : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_ERROR# = "Directory &UC4RB_SIEBEL_EXTRACTED_DIR# does not exist" : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_ERROR_PARAMETER errors=1 elif [ "$ISDIR" -eq "0" ]; then : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Deployment Package Extracted Directory" : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_ERROR# = "&UC4RB_SIEBEL_EXTRACTED_DIR# exists but is not a directory " : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_ERROR_PARAMETER errors=2 fi
! Check Siebel Server Home Directory exists :SET &UC4RB_CHECKME# = &UC4RB_SIEBEL_SERVER_HOME_DIR# :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.CHECK_UNIX_SHELL_FILE_EXISTS if [ "$EXIST" -eq "0" ]; then : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Siebel Server Home Directory" : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_ERROR# = "Directory &UC4RB_SIEBEL_SERVER_HOME_DIR# does not exist" : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_ERROR_PARAMETER errors=1 elif [ "$ISDIR" -eq "0" ]; then : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Siebel Server Home Directory" : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_ERROR# = "&UC4RB_SIEBEL_SERVER_HOME_DIR# exists but is not a directory " : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_ERROR_PARAMETER errors=2 fi
! Action return if directories does not exist if [ "$errors" -gt 0 ]; then exit $errors; fi
! Start execution :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_HEADER_EXECUTION :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.CHANGE_FOLDER_TO_AGENT_BIN
languages="&UC4RB_SIEBEL_LANGUAGES#" sourceBase="&UC4RB_SIEBEL_EXTRACTED_DIR#" targetBase="&UC4RB_SIEBEL_SERVER_HOME_DIR#"
:DEFINE &ARRAY#, string, 20 :FILL &ARRAY#[] = STR_SPLIT(&UC4RB_SIEBEL_LANGUAGES#, ",") :SET &VAR# = 1 :SET &LEN# = LENGTH(&ARRAY#[], SIZE)
! Copy SRF files to siebel objects directory :SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_INFO# = "Start copying SRF files to &UC4RB_SIEBEL_SERVER_HOME_DIR#..." :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_INFO
:WHILE &VAR# LE &LEN# : SET &LANG# = STR_TRIM(&ARRAY#[&VAR#]) : SET &LANG_UC# = STR_UC(&LANG#) : SET &LANG_LC# = STR_LC(&LANG#) sourceDir=$sourceBase/srf/&LANG# sourceDir_uc=$sourceBase/srf/&LANG_UC# sourceDir_lc=$sourceBase/srf/&LANG_LC# targetDir=$targetBase/objects/&LANG# targetDir_uc=$targetBase/objects/&LANG_UC# targetDir_lc=$targetBase/objects/&LANG_LC# if [ -d "$sourceDir_uc" ]; then sourceDir=$sourceDir_uc elif [ -d "$sourceDir_lc" ]; then sourceDir=$sourceDir_lc fi
if [ -d "$targetDir_uc" ]; then targetDir=$targetDir_uc elif [ -d "$targetDir_lc" ]; then targetDir=$targetDir_lc fi
if [ -d "$sourceDir" ]; then
if [ ! -d "$targetDir" ]; then mkdir -p "$targetDir" fi
maxRetries="&UC4RB_COPY_MAXIMUM_RETRIES#" i=1 while [ $i -lt $maxRetries ] do echo "INFO: Try to copy SRF file from $sourceDir to $targetDir ($i time)..." cp -rf "$sourceDir"/* "$targetDir" RC=$? if [ $RC -eq 0 ]; then break fi sleep &UC4RB_COPY_DELAY_TIME# i=`expr $i + 1` done
if [ $i -eq $maxRetries ]; then cp -rf "$sourceDir"/* "$targetDir" RC=$? if [ $RC -ne 0 ]; then echo "Failed to copy SRF file to &UC4RB_SIEBEL_SERVER_HOME_DIR#" exit $RC fi fi fi
: SET &VAR# = &VAR# + 1 :ENDWHILE
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_INFO# = "Copy SRF files successfully to &UC4RB_SIEBEL_SERVER_HOME_DIR#" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_INFO
:INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.SUDOERS_FOOTER ! <End of sudo script>

DOCU_Docu.DOC:
= RB name = Action name: PCK.AUTOMIC_SIEBEL.PUB.ACTION.CREATE_DEPLOYMENT_PACKAGE
= General description = Copy all files that were created on the Siebel Tools and Siebel Server then create a zip package
= Inputs = * Siebel SRF Output Directory: Path to directory contains exported SRF files, if multiple languages files are created, SRF files are located under this children directories like enu/, nld/, ... * Siebel Browser Script Output Directory: Path to directory contains generated browser scripts. * Siebel Exported Repository File: Path to exported repository file * Siebel Exported Schema File: Path to exported schema file * Siebel Collected Archive File: Path to ZIP archive of collected files * Output Package File: Path to output deployment package file
= Behavior = (see general description)
= Outputs = * Return code is 0 if success. * Return code is 1 if not success.
= Rollback = (none)
= Logging = (none)
= Example = Siebel SRF Output Directory: C:\adm\srf Siebel Browser Script Output Directory: C:\adm\bscript Siebel Exported Repository File: C:\export\repository.dat Siebel Exported Schema File: D:\sba81\dbsrvr\oracle\schema.dll Siebel Collected Archive File: Path to ZIP archive of collected files Output Package File: Path to output deployment package file

This action creates a ZIP structure for Siebel stuff generated from previous steps. This is the last step in the Export workflow. Output from this action is a package contains all exported data from the siebel server and the Siebel tool server. We use it for transport to another Siebel System can be used to import again to another Siebel system.

DOCU_Docu.DOC: = RB name = PCK.AUTOMIC_SIEBEL.PUB.ACTION.CREATE_DEPLOYMENT_PROJECT = General description = This action creates a new deployment project, that is used as a grouping entity by the ADM of Siebel. The deployment project is only created with the name and the description. All other settings must be entered manually - the configuration is not part of the solution. = Inputs = * Siebel Server Url: Siebel Server host * Siebel Server Port: port Siebel is listening on. * Siebel Enterprise: Enterprise that the databean should connect to. * Object Manager: The Objectmanagers to connect with the Databean to check if Siebel is running. (No Spaces!!) * Siebel Username: The Siebel user to connect. * Siebel Password: The Password to connect with the Siebel user. * Siebel Project Name: The name of Siebel Project will be created. * Siebel Project Description: The Description of Siebel Project will be created. = Behavior = This action can run on every host that has the appropriate installed Java version and can connect to the Target Siebel server. = Outputs = * Return code is 0 if success * Return code is 4 if not success. = Rollback = (none) = Logging = (none) = Example = (none)

DOCU_Docu.DOC: = RB name = PCK.AUTOMIC_SIEBEL.PUB.ACTION.DELETE_REPOSITORY = General description = Optional step to remove the old backup of the Siebel Repository = Inputs = * Siebel Url: The name of the siebel Server. * Siebel Port: The port Siebel is listening on. * Siebel Enterprise: The Enterprise that the databean should connect to. * Siebel Username: The Siebel user to connect. * Siebel Password: The Password to connect with the Siebel user. * Object Manager: The Objectmanagers to connect with the Databean to check if Siebel is running. (No Spaces!!) * Business component: The Business Component that is affected. Default: Repository Repository * Business object: The Business Object that is affected. Default: Repository Repository * Current repository name: Current name of the object to be deleted = Behavior = (see general description) = Outputs = * Return code is 0 if success * Return code is 4 if not success. = Rollback = (none) = Logging = (none) = Example = (none)

SCRIPT.MSCRI:
:INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SIEBEL.PRV.INCLUDE.ATTACH_RESOURCES @echo off :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_HEADER_PARAM_VALIDATION
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Server Url" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_SIEBEL_SERVER_URL#
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Port" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_SIEBEL_PORT#
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Siebel Enterprise" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_SIEBEL_ENTERPRISE#
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Siebel Username" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_SIEBEL_USER#
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Siebel Password" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_SIEBEL_PASSWORD#
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Object Manager" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_SIEBEL_OBJECT_MANAGER#
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Business component" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_SIEBEL_BUSINESS_COMP#
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Business object" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_SIEBEL_BUSINESS_OBJECT#
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Repository name" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_SIEBEL_OBJ_NAME#
:INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SIEBEL.PRV.INCLUDE.SET_SIEBEL_PROPERTIES :SET &COMMAND# = "java -jar ""&SIEBEL_TOOL_JAR#"" siebel DeleteRepository" :SET &COMMAND# = STR_CAT(&COMMAND#, ' -h &UC4RB_SIEBEL_SERVER_URL# -pt &UC4RB_SIEBEL_PORT#') :SET &COMMAND# = STR_CAT(&COMMAND#, ' -su &UC4RB_SIEBEL_USER# -sp &UC4RB_SIEBEL_PASSWORD#') :SET &COMMAND# = STR_CAT(&COMMAND#, ' -e "&UC4RB_SIEBEL_ENTERPRISE#" -om &UC4RB_SIEBEL_OBJECT_MANAGER#') :SET &COMMAND# = STR_CAT(&COMMAND#, ' -rp "''&UC4RB_SIEBEL_OBJ_NAME#''"')
:IF &UC4RB_SIEBEL_BUSINESS_OBJECT# NE "" : SET &COMMAND# = STR_CAT(&COMMAND#, ' -bo "&UC4RB_SIEBEL_BUSINESS_OBJECT#"') :ENDIF
:IF &UC4RB_SIEBEL_BUSINESS_COMP# NE "" : SET &COMMAND# = STR_CAT(&COMMAND#, ' -bc "&UC4RB_SIEBEL_BUSINESS_COMP#"') :ENDIF :SET &COMMAND# = STR_CAT(&COMMAND#, "&SIEBEL_PROPERTIES#")
!Begin my code :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_HEADER_EXECUTION
:INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.CHANGE_FOLDER_TO_AGENT_BIN &COMMAND# :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.CHECK_RETURN_CODE_WINDOWS_CONSOLE !End my code

:INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SIEBEL.PRV.INCLUDE.ATTACH_RESOURCES :DEFINE &STRING_ARR#, string, 30
@echo off :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_HEADER_PARAM_VALIDATION
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Server Url" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_SIEBEL_SERVER_URL#
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Port" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_SIEBEL_PORT#
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Siebel Enterprise" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_SIEBEL_ENTERPRISE#
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Siebel Username" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_SIEBEL_USER#

:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Business object" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_SIEBEL_BUSINESS_OBJECT#

:INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SIEBEL.PRV.INCLUDE.SET_SIEBEL_PROPERTIES :SET &COMMAND# = "java -jar ""&SIEBEL_TOOL_JAR#"" siebel DeleteRepository" :SET &COMMAND# = STR_CAT(&COMMAND#, ' -h &UC4RB_SIEBEL_SERVER_URL# -pt &UC4RB_SIEBEL_PORT#') :SET &COMMAND# = STR_CAT(&COMMAND#, ' -su &UC4RB_SIEBEL_USER# -sp &UC4RB_SIEBEL_PASSWORD#') :SET &COMMAND# = STR_CAT(&COMMAND#, ' -e "&UC4RB_SIEBEL_ENTERPRISE#" -om &UC4RB_SIEBEL_OBJECT_MANAGER#') :SET &COMMAND# = STR_CAT(&COMMAND#, ' -rp "''&UC4RB_SIEBEL_OBJ_NAME#''"')
:IF &UC4RB_SIEBEL_BUSINESS_OBJECT# NE "" : SET &COMMAND# = STR_CAT(&COMMAND#, ' -bo "&UC4RB_SIEBEL_BUSINESS_OBJECT#"') :ENDIF
:IF &UC4RB_SIEBEL_BUSINESS_COMP# NE "" : SET &COMMAND# = STR_CAT(&COMMAND#, ' -bc "&UC4RB_SIEBEL_BUSINESS_COMP#"') :ENDIF :SET &COMMAND# = STR_CAT(&COMMAND#, "&SIEBEL_PROPERTIES#")
!Begin my code :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_HEADER_EXECUTION ! <Begin of sudo script> :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.SUDOERS_HEADER
:INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.CHANGE_FOLDER_TO_AGENT_BIN &COMMAND# :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.CHECK_RETURN_CODE_UNIX_SHELL
:INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.SUDOERS_FOOTER ! <End of sudo script> !End my code
