PROMPTSETDATA.DATAEDITOR: <PRPTS ontop="1"><PRPTBOX><UC4RB_SIEBEL_USERs.00 haslist="0" msgnr="-1" msginsert="" altview="0" promptname="UC4RB_SIEBEL_USER#" ReadFromTable="OPSE"></UC4RB_SIEBEL_USERs.00><UC4RB_SIEBEL_PASSWORDs.00 haslist="0" msgnr="-1" msginsert="" altview="0" promptname="UC4RB_SIEBEL_PASSWORD#" ReadFromTable="OPSE">--10</UC4RB_SIEBEL_PASSWORDs.00><UC4RB_SIEBEL_OBJECT_MANAGERs.00 haslist="0" msgnr="-1" msginsert="" altview="0" promptname="UC4RB_SIEBEL_OBJECT_MANAGER#" ReadFromTable="OPSE">&ENV#?SIEBEL_OBJECT_MANAGERS</UC4RB_SIEBEL_OBJECT_MANAGERs.00><UC4RB_SIEBEL_BUSINESS_COMPs.00 haslist="0" msgnr="-1" msginsert="" altview="0" promptname="UC4RB_SIEBEL_BUSINESS_COMP#" ReadFromTable="OPSE">Repository Repository</UC4RB_SIEBEL_BUSINESS_COMPs.00><UC4RB_SIEBEL_BUSINESS_OBJECTs.00 haslist="0" msgnr="-1" msginsert="" altview="0" promptname="UC4RB_SIEBEL_BUSINESS_OBJECT#" ReadFromTable="OPSE">Repository Repository</UC4RB_SIEBEL_BUSINESS_OBJECTs.00><UC4RB_SIEBEL_OBJ_NAMEs.00 haslist="0" msgnr="-1" msginsert="" altview="0" promptname="UC4RB_SIEBEL_OBJ_NAME#" ReadFromTable="OPSE">&ENV#?SIEBEL_REPOSITORY_NAME</UC4RB_SIEBEL_OBJ_NAMEs.00><UC4RB_SIEBEL_ENTERPRISEs.00 haslist="0" msgnr="-1" msginsert="" altview="0" promptname="UC4RB_SIEBEL_ENTERPRISE#" ReadFromTable="OPSE">&ENV#?SIEBEL_ENTRPR_SERVER</UC4RB_SIEBEL_ENTERPRISEs.00><UC4RB_SIEBEL_SERVER_URLs.00 haslist="0" msgnr="-1" msginsert="" altview="0" promptname="UC4RB_SIEBEL_SERVER_URL#" ReadFromTable="OPSE">&ENV#?SIEBEL_URL</UC4RB_SIEBEL_SERVER_URLs.00><UC4RB_SIEBEL_PORTs.00 haslist="0" msgnr="-1" msginsert="" altview="0" promptname="UC4RB_SIEBEL_PORT#" ReadFromTable="OPSE">2321</UC4RB_SIEBEL_PORTs.00></PRPTBOX></PRPTS>

DOCU_Docu.DOC: = RB name = PCK.AUTOMIC_SIEBEL.PUB.DEPLOY_WORKFLOW = General description = This action can run on hosts that have the appropriate Java version installed and can connect to the Target Siebel server. Deploys Siebel workflows. = Inputs = * Siebel Server Url: The host name of the Siebel Server * Siebel Server Port: The port Siebel is listening on * Siebel Enterprise: The Enterprise that the databean should connect to * Object Manager: The ObjectManagers to connect with the DataBean to check if Siebel is running * Siebel Username: The Siebel user to connect * Siebel Password: The Password to connect with the Siebel user * Flow Search Specification: The search specification that Siebel CRM uses to identify the workflow processes that it must deploy = Outputs = * Number of Deployed Workflows: The number of workflow processes that Siebel CRM imported. = Behavior = (see general description) = Return value= * Return code is 0 if success * Return code is 4 if not success. = Rollback = (none) = Logging = (none) = Example = (none)

SCRIPT.MSCRI:
:INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SIEBEL.PRV.INCLUDE.ATTACH_RESOURCES @echo off setlocal enabledelayedexpansion :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_HEADER_PARAM_VALIDATION
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Siebel Server Url" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_SIEBEL_SERVER_URL#
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Siebel Server Port" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_SIEBEL_PORT#
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Siebel Enterprise" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_SIEBEL_ENTERPRISE#
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Object Manager" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_SIEBEL_OBJECT_MANAGER#
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Siebel Username" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_SIEBEL_USER#
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Siebel Password" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_SIEBEL_PASSWORD#
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Flow Search Specification" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_SIEBEL_FLOW_SEARCH_SPEC#
:INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_HEADER_EXECUTION !Begin my code
:INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SIEBEL.PRV.INCLUDE.SET_SIEBEL_PROPERTIES :SET &COMMAND# = "java -jar ""&SIEBEL_TOOL_JAR#"" siebel DeployWorkflow" :SET &COMMAND# = STR_CAT(&COMMAND#, ' -h &UC4RB_SIEBEL_SERVER_URL# -pt &UC4RB_SIEBEL_PORT#') :SET &COMMAND# = STR_CAT(&COMMAND#, ' -su &UC4RB_SIEBEL_USER# -sp &UC4RB_SIEBEL_PASSWORD#') :SET &COMMAND# = STR_CAT(&COMMAND#, ' -e "&UC4RB_SIEBEL_ENTERPRISE#" -om &UC4RB_SIEBEL_OBJECT_MANAGER#') :SET &UC4RB_SIEBEL_FLOWSEARCH_TMP# = STR_SUB(&UC4RB_SIEBEL_FLOW_SEARCH_SPEC#,'"','\"') :SET &COMMAND# = STR_CAT(&COMMAND#, ' -s "&UC4RB_SIEBEL_FLOWSEARCH_TMP#"') :SET &COMMAND# = STR_CAT(&COMMAND#, "&SIEBEL_PROPERTIES#") :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.CHANGE_FOLDER_TO_AGENT_BIN &COMMAND# :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.CHECK_RETURN_CODE_WINDOWS_CONSOLE !End my code

POST_SCRIPT.OSCRI:
:SET &UC4RB_OUT_NUM_DEPLOYED_WF# = "0"
:SET &hnd# = PREP_PROCESS_REPORT(,, "REP", "*Number of workflow deployed: *") :PROCESS &hnd# : SET &line# = GET_PROCESS_LINE(&hnd#,1) : SET &LENGTH# = STR_FIND(&line#, "deployed: ") : SET &LENGTH# = &LENGTH# + 10 : SET &UC4RB_OUT_NUM_DEPLOYED_WF# = STR_CUT(&line#, &LENGTH#) :ENDPROCESS
:PUB &UC4RB_OUT_NUM_DEPLOYED_WF#,,TOP

SCRIPT.MSCRI:
:INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SIEBEL.PRV.INCLUDE.ATTACH_RESOURCES
:INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_HEADER_PARAM_VALIDATION
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Siebel Server Url" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_SIEBEL_SERVER_URL#
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Siebel Server Port" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_SIEBEL_PORT#
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Siebel Enterprise" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_SIEBEL_ENTERPRISE#
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Object Manager" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_SIEBEL_OBJECT_MANAGER#
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Siebel Username" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_SIEBEL_USER#
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Siebel Password" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_SIEBEL_PASSWORD#
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Flow Search Specification" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_SIEBEL_FLOW_SEARCH_SPEC#
:INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_HEADER_EXECUTION !Begin my code
:INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SIEBEL.PRV.INCLUDE.SET_SIEBEL_PROPERTIES :SET &COMMAND# = "java -jar ""&SIEBEL_TOOL_JAR#"" siebel DeployWorkflow" :SET &COMMAND# = STR_CAT(&COMMAND#, ' -h &UC4RB_SIEBEL_SERVER_URL# -pt &UC4RB_SIEBEL_PORT#') :SET &COMMAND# = STR_CAT(&COMMAND#, ' -su &UC4RB_SIEBEL_USER# -sp &UC4RB_SIEBEL_PASSWORD#') :SET &COMMAND# = STR_CAT(&COMMAND#, ' -e "&UC4RB_SIEBEL_ENTERPRISE#" -om &UC4RB_SIEBEL_OBJECT_MANAGER#') :SET &UC4RB_SIEBEL_FLOWSEARCH_TMP# = STR_SUB(&UC4RB_SIEBEL_FLOW_SEARCH_SPEC#,'"','\"') :SET &COMMAND# = STR_CAT(&COMMAND#, ' -s "&UC4RB_SIEBEL_FLOWSEARCH_TMP#"') :SET &COMMAND# = STR_CAT(&COMMAND#, "&SIEBEL_PROPERTIES#") :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.CHANGE_FOLDER_TO_AGENT_BIN &COMMAND# :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.CHECK_RETURN_CODE_UNIX_SHELL !End my code

POST_SCRIPT.OSCRI:
:SET &UC4RB_OUT_NUM_DEPLOYED_WF# = "0"
:SET &hnd# = PREP_PROCESS_REPORT(,, "REP", "*Number of workflow deployed: *") :PROCESS &hnd# : SET &line# = GET_PROCESS_LINE(&hnd#,1) : SET &LENGTH# = STR_FIND(&line#, "deployed: ") : SET &LENGTH# = &LENGTH# + 10 : SET &UC4RB_OUT_NUM_DEPLOYED_WF# = STR_CUT(&line#, &LENGTH#) :ENDPROCESS
:PUB &UC4RB_OUT_NUM_DEPLOYED_WF#,,TOP

SCRIPT.MSCRI:
:INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SIEBEL.PRV.INCLUDE.ATTACH_RESOURCES :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.POWERSHELL_UTILITY :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_HEADER_PARAM_VALIDATION
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "AE Hostname" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4_AE_HOST#
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "AE Port" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4_AE_PORT#
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "AE User" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4_AE_USER#
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Configuration object title" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4_CONFIG_OBJECT_TITLE#
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Configuration Object Target Folder" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4_CONFIG_FOLDER#
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Siebel Username" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_SIEBEL_USER#
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Log Level" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4_LOGLEVEL#
!Begin my code :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_HEADER_EXECUTION
:INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.CHANGE_FOLDER_TO_AGENT_BIN
! Figure out AE hostname and password $aeHost = "" $aePort = ""
$scriptPID = ([System.Diagnostics.Process]::GetCurrentProcess()).id $agentPID = (get-wmiobject win32_process -filter "processid=$scriptPID").parentprocessid
netstat -nop TCP| Select-String -Pattern $agentPID | ForEach-Object { $item = $_.line.split(" ",[System.StringSplitOptions]::RemoveEmptyEntries) if (($item[2] -notmatch '^\[::')) { $aeHost = $item[2].split(':')[0] $aePort = $item[2].split(':')[1] return } }
:IF &UC4_AE_HOST# NE "" $aeHost = "&UC4_AE_HOST#" :ENDIF
:IF &UC4_AE_PORT# NE "0" $aePort = "&UC4_AE_PORT#" :ENDIF
if (($aeHost -eq "") -or ($aePort -eq "")) { echo "Can not find AE hostname and/or port." __uc_return(1) }
:IF &UC4_AE_USER# NE "" $aeUser = "&UC4_AE_USER#" :ELSE $aeUser = "&$CLIENT#/&$USER#/&$DEPARTMENT#" :ENDIF
:JCL_CONCAT_CHAR "?" java -jar "&SIEBEL_TOOL_JAR#" siebel Discovery ? -ae $aeHost -p $aePort ? -u $aeUser -pw "&UC4_AE_PASSWORD#" ? -co "&UC4_CONFIG_OBJECT_TITLE#" ? -cf "&UC4_CONFIG_FOLDER#" ? -su "&UC4RB_SIEBEL_USER#" ? -sp "&UC4RB_SIEBEL_PASSWORD#" ? -i "&$PROCESSOR_RUNID#" ? -a "&AGENT#" ? -l "&LOGIN#" ? -ll "&UC4_LOGLEVEL#"
:JCL_CONCAT_CHAR
:INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.CHECK_RETURN_CODE_WINDOWS_POWERSHELL !End my code

:INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SIEBEL.PRV.INCLUDE.ATTACH_RESOURCES :DEFINE &STRING_ARR#, string, 30 ! <Begin of sudo script> :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.SUDOERS_HEADER :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_HEADER_PARAM_VALIDATION
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "AE Hostname" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4_AE_HOST#
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "AE Port" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4_AE_PORT#
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "AE User" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4_AE_USER#
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Configuration object title" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4_CONFIG_OBJECT_TITLE#
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Configuration Object Target Folder" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4_CONFIG_FOLDER#
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Siebel Username" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_SIEBEL_USER#
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Log Level" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4_LOGLEVEL#
line=`netstat -npt | grep "$$"/ | awk -v var="$$" ' $7 ~ var {print $0}' | grep -v grep | tr -d ' ' | wc -l` if [ "$line" -ne 1 ] then connection=`netstat -npt | grep "$PPID"/ | awk -v var="$PPID" ' $7 ~ var {print $0}' | grep -v grep | awk ' $4 ~ /:/ {print $5;}'` else connection=`netstat -npt | grep "$$"/ | awk -v var="$$" ' $7 ~ var {print $0}' | grep -v grep | awk ' $4 ~ /:/ {print $5;}'` fi
echo "AE:$connection"
!Begin my code :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_HEADER_EXECUTION
:INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.CHANGE_FOLDER_TO_AGENT_BIN
! :IF "" EQ &UC4_AE_HOST# OR &UC4_AE_PORT# ! connection=`netstat -npt | grep "$$"/ | awk ' $4 ~ /:/ {print $5;}'` ! :ENDIF
:IF "" EQ &UC4_AE_HOST# aeHost=`echo "$connection" | awk 'BEGIN {FS=":";}{print $1}'` :ELSE aeHost="&UC4_AE_HOST#" :ENDIF
:IF &UC4_AE_PORT# EQ "" OR "0" aePort=`echo "$connection" | awk 'BEGIN {FS=":";}{print $2}'` :ELSE aePort="&UC4_AE_PORT#" :ENDIF
if [[ ! $aeHost =~ ^[0-9]{1,3}\.[0-9]{1,3}\.[0-9]{1,3}\.[0-9]{1,3}$ ]]; then echo "$aeHost is not a valid ip address" exit 1 fi
if [[ ! $aePort =~ ^[0-9]+$ ]]; then echo "$aePort is not a valid port number" exit 2 fi
:IF &UC4_AE_USER# NE "" aeUser="&UC4_AE_USER#" :ELSE aeUser="&$CLIENT#/&$USER#/&$DEPARTMENT#" :ENDIF
:JCL_CONCAT_CHAR "?" java -jar "&SIEBEL_TOOL_JAR#" siebel Discovery ? -ae $aeHost -p $aePort ? -u $aeUser -pw "&UC4_AE_PASSWORD#" ? -co "&UC4_CONFIG_OBJECT_TITLE#" ? -cf "&UC4_CONFIG_FOLDER#" ? -su "&UC4RB_SIEBEL_USER#" ? -sp "&UC4RB_SIEBEL_PASSWORD#" ? -i "&$PROCESSOR_RUNID#" ? -a "&AGENT#" ? -l "&LOGIN#" ? -ll "&UC4_LOGLEVEL#" :JCL_CONCAT_CHAR
:INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.CHECK_RETURN_CODE_UNIX_SHELL :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.SUDOERS_FOOTER ! <End of sudo script>

DOCU_Docu.DOC: = RB name = PCK.AUTOMIC_SIEBEL.PUB.ACTION.EXECUTE_ADM_REQUEST = General description = Executes a request to run a predefined Workflow to import an ADM file on the specified Siebel System. = Inputs = * Siebel Server Url: Siebel Server host * Siebel Server Port: port Siebel is listening on. * Siebel Enterprise: Enterprise that the databean should connect to. * Object Manager: The Objectmanagers to connect with the Databean to check if Siebel is running. (No Spaces!!) * Siebel Username: The Siebel user to connect. * Siebel Password: The Password to connect with the Siebel user. * Siebel ADM File: The path of the ADM XML file. = Behavior = This action can run on every host that has the appropriate installed Java version and can connect to the Target Siebel server. = Outputs = * Return code is 0 if success * Return code is 4 if not success. = Rollback = (none) = Logging = (none) = Example = (none)

The file must be located somewhere, where the Siebel Server can access it (e.g. locally or at a network share)</entry><entry name="customfield"/><entry name="modifiable">1</entry><entry name="multiline">0</entry><entry name="multilineIcon">0</entry><entry name="regex"/><entry name="required">1</entry><entry name="resetable">1</entry><entry name="initvalue"/><entry name="xmlkey"/><entry name="xmlpath"/><entry name="onchangereset"/></properties></text></readpanel></dialog>

DOCU_Docu.DOC: = RB name = PCK.AUTOMIC_SIEBEL.PUB.ACTION.EXPORT_AUDIT_TRAILS = General description = This runbook exports business component Audit Trail Buscomp and it's children (including: Responsibility, Audit Trail Child Buscomp and Position) from Siebel using the java api and stores the data in a structured XML format in a file. Business Object: Audit Trail Admin Business Component: Audit Trail Buscomp Fields: Assoc Flag, Buscomp, Buscomp Base Table Name, Comments, Copy Flag, Delete Flag, End Date, Export Flag, New Flag, Restriction Type, Start Date, System Audited Flag, Update Flag Children: the relationship information to the following children should be exported = Inputs = * Siebel Username: The Siebel user to connect. * Siebel Password: The Password to connect with the Siebel user. * Server Url: siebel Server host * Siebel Enterprise: Enterprise that the databean should connect to. * Port: port Siebel is listening on. * Object Manager: The Objectmanagers to connect with the Databean to check if Siebel is running. (No Spaces!!) * Export Directory: The name of the directory where the exported file shall be placed * File name: The name of the file that contains the exported data * Input File Directory: The directory from which the tool reads the input xml files * Input XML File name: Name of the file that contains the input xml schema. * Search Specification: The filter expression that is applied upon the business components. For example: [Buscomp] like 'Contact' = Behavior = (see general description) = Outputs = * Return code is 0 if success * Return code is 4 if not success. = Rollback = (none) = Logging = (none) = Example = (none)

SCRIPT.MSCRI: :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SIEBEL.PRV.INCLUDE.SET_SIEBEL_PROPERTIES :JCL_CONCAT_CHAR "?" java -jar "&$AGENT_RESOURCES_CLIENT#/siebeltool.jar" siebel ExportBusinessObject2 ? -h &UC4RB_SIEBEL_SERVER_URL# ? -pt &UC4RB_SIEBEL_PORT# ? -e &UC4RB_SIEBEL_ENTERPRISE# ? -su "&UC4RB_SIEBEL_USER#" ? -sp "&UC4RB_SIEBEL_PASSWORD#" ? -om "&UC4RB_SIEBEL_OBJECT_MANAGER#" ? -o "&SIEBEL_EXPORT_DIR#/&SIEBEL_EXPORT_FILE#" ? -i "&SIEBEL_INPUT_DIR#/&SIEBEL_INPUT_XML#" ? -s "&SIEBEL_SEARCH_SPEC#" ? -ll "&UC4_LOGLEVEL#" &SIEBEL_PROPERTIES# :JCL_CONCAT_CHAR

DOCU_Docu.DOC: = RB name = PCK.AUTOMIC_SIEBEL.PUB.ACTION.EXPORT_BUSINESS_OBJECT = General description = This generic export function exports business objects from siebel using the java api of siebel and stores the data in a structured format (e.g. XML) in a file. = Inputs = * Siebel Username: The Siebel user to connect. * Siebel Password: The Password to connect with the Siebel user. * Server Url: siebel Server host * Siebel Enterprise: Enterprise that the databean should connect to. * Port: port Siebel is listening on. * Object Manager: The Objectmanagers to connect with the Databean to check if Siebel is running. (No Spaces!!) * Export Directory: The directory to which the tool writes the export file. * File name: Name of the file that contains the business objects * Input File Directory: The directory from which the tool reads the input xml files * Input XML File name: Name of the file that contains the input xml schema. * Search Specification: The search specification that Siebel CRM uses to identify the business objects that it exports. For example: [Name] like 'User Reg*' = Behavior = (see general description) = Outputs = * Return code is 0 if success * Return code is 4 if not success. = Rollback = (none) = Logging = (none) = Example = (none)

SCRIPT.MSCRI: :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SIEBEL.PRV.INCLUDE.SET_SIEBEL_PROPERTIES :JCL_CONCAT_CHAR "?" java -jar "&SIEBEL_TOOL_JAR#" siebel ExportBusinessObject ? -h &UC4RB_SIEBEL_SERVER_URL# ? -pt &UC4RB_SIEBEL_PORT# ? -e &UC4RB_SIEBEL_ENTERPRISE# ? -su "&UC4RB_SIEBEL_USER#" ? -sp "&UC4RB_SIEBEL_PASSWORD#" ? -om "&UC4RB_SIEBEL_OBJECT_MANAGER#" ? -o "&SIEBEL_EXPORT_FILE_PATH#" ? -i "&SIEBEL_IMPORT_FILE_PATH#" ? -s "&SIEBEL_SEARCH_SPEC#" ? &SIEBEL_PROPERTIES# :JCL_CONCAT_CHAR

:INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SIEBEL.PRV.INCLUDE.ATTACH_RESOURCES @echo off setlocal enabledelayedexpansion :DEFINE &STRING_ARR#, string, 30 :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_HEADER_PARAM_VALIDATION
:IF &SIEBEL_INPUT_DIR# = "" ! If user does not specify input directory, then attach the resource schema ! Attach resources file to agent first : ATTACH_RES "PCK.AUTOMIC_SIEBEL.PRV.STORE", "&SIEBEL_INPUT_XML#", T : SET &SIEBEL_INPUT_DIR# = "&$AGENT_RESOURCES_TASK#" :ENDIF
:INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.NORMALIZE_PATH "UC4RB_CONVERTED_STRING" = "SIEBEL_EXPORT_DIR" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.NORMALIZE_PATH "UC4RB_CONVERTED_STRING" = "SIEBEL_INPUT_DIR"
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Siebel Server Url" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_SIEBEL_SERVER_URL#
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Siebel Port" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_SIEBEL_PORT#
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Siebel Enterprise" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_SIEBEL_ENTERPRISE#
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Siebel Username" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_SIEBEL_USER#
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Siebel Password" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_SIEBEL_PASSWORD#
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Object Manager" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_SIEBEL_OBJECT_MANAGER#
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Export Directory" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &SIEBEL_EXPORT_DIR#
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "File name" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &SIEBEL_EXPORT_FILE#
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Input File Directory" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &SIEBEL_INPUT_DIR#
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Input XML File name" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &SIEBEL_INPUT_XML#
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Search Specification" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &SIEBEL_SEARCH_SPEC#
set /a errors=0 > nul
! Check if xml input exists :SET &UC4RB_CHECKME# = "&SIEBEL_INPUT_DIR#\&SIEBEL_INPUT_XML#" :INCLUDE PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.CHECK_WINDOWS_CONSOLE_FILE_EXISTS
if %ISFILE% == 0 ( : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Input xml file path" : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_ERROR# = "File &SIEBEL_INPUT_DIR#\&SIEBEL_INPUT_XML# does not exist" : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_ERROR_PARAMETER set /a errors=1 > nul )
:INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.ENSURE_DIRECTORY_EXISTS_WINDOWS_CONSOLE "UC4RB_CONVERTED_STRING" = "SIEBEL_EXPORT_DIR"
if %errors% GTR 0 ( set retcode=%errors% goto :retcode )
:SET &SIEBEL_EXPORT_FILE_PATH# = "&SIEBEL_EXPORT_DIR#\&SIEBEL_EXPORT_FILE#" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.NORMALIZE_PATH "UC4RB_CONVERTED_STRING" = "SIEBEL_EXPORT_FILE_PATH"
:SET &SIEBEL_IMPORT_FILE_PATH# = "&SIEBEL_INPUT_DIR#\&SIEBEL_INPUT_XML#" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.NORMALIZE_PATH "UC4RB_CONVERTED_STRING" = "SIEBEL_IMPORT_FILE_PATH"
:INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_HEADER_EXECUTION !Begin my code :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.CHANGE_FOLDER_TO_AGENT_BIN :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SIEBEL.PRV.INCLUDE.EXPORT_BUSINESS_OBJECT :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.CHECK_RETURN_CODE_WINDOWS_CONSOLE !End my code

POST_SCRIPT.OSCRI: :SET &output_entry# = PREP_PROCESS_REPORT(, , "REP", "*Number of records exported*") :PROCESS &output_entry# : SET &output_line# = GET_PROCESS_LINE(&output_entry#, 1) : SET &POS# = STR_FIND_REVERSE(&output_line#, ":") : SET &POS# = &POS# + 1 : SET &OUT_NUM_EXPORTED_OBJS# = SUBSTR(&output_line#, &POS#) : PUBLISH &OUT_NUM_EXPORTED_OBJS#, , 'WORKFLOW' :ENDPROCESS :CLOSE_PROCESS &output_entry#

SCRIPT.MSCRI:
:INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SIEBEL.PRV.INCLUDE.ATTACH_RESOURCES :DEFINE &STRING_ARR#, string, 30
:INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_HEADER_PARAM_VALIDATION
:IF &SIEBEL_INPUT_DIR# = "" ! If user does not specify input directory, then attach the resource schema ! Attach resources file to agent first : ATTACH_RES "PCK.AUTOMIC_SIEBEL.PRV.STORE", "&SIEBEL_INPUT_XML#", T : SET &SIEBEL_INPUT_DIR# = "&$AGENT_RESOURCES_TASK#" :ENDIF
:INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.NORMALIZE_PATH "UC4RB_CONVERTED_STRING" = "SIEBEL_EXPORT_DIR" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.NORMALIZE_PATH "UC4RB_CONVERTED_STRING" = "SIEBEL_INPUT_DIR"
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Siebel Server Url" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_SIEBEL_SERVER_URL#
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Siebel Port" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_SIEBEL_PORT#
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Siebel Enterprise" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_SIEBEL_ENTERPRISE#
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Siebel Username" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_SIEBEL_USER#
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Siebel Password" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_SIEBEL_PASSWORD#
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Object Manager" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_SIEBEL_OBJECT_MANAGER#
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Export Directory" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &SIEBEL_EXPORT_DIR#
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "File name" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &SIEBEL_EXPORT_FILE#
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Input File Directory" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &SIEBEL_INPUT_DIR#
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Input XML File name" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &SIEBEL_INPUT_XML#
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Search Specification" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &SIEBEL_SEARCH_SPEC#
! <Begin of sudo script> :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.SUDOERS_HEADER
errors=0 ! Check if xml input exists :SET &UC4RB_CHECKME# = "&SIEBEL_INPUT_DIR#/&SIEBEL_INPUT_XML#" :INCLUDE PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.CHECK_UNIX_SHELL_FILE_EXISTS if [ "$ISFILE" -eq "0" ]; then : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Input xml file path" : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_ERROR# = "File &SIEBEL_INPUT_DIR#/&SIEBEL_INPUT_XML# does not exist" : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_ERROR_PARAMETER errors=1 fi
:INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.ENSURE_DIRECTORY_EXISTS_UNIX "UC4RB_CONVERTED_STRING" = "SIEBEL_EXPORT_DIR"
if [ "$errors" -gt 0 ]; then exit $errors; fi
:SET &SIEBEL_EXPORT_FILE_PATH# = "&SIEBEL_EXPORT_DIR#/&SIEBEL_EXPORT_FILE#" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.NORMALIZE_PATH "UC4RB_CONVERTED_STRING" = "SIEBEL_EXPORT_FILE_PATH"
:SET &SIEBEL_IMPORT_FILE_PATH# = "&SIEBEL_INPUT_DIR#/&SIEBEL_INPUT_XML#" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.NORMALIZE_PATH "UC4RB_CONVERTED_STRING" = "SIEBEL_IMPORT_FILE_PATH"
:INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_HEADER_EXECUTION !Begin my code
:INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.CHANGE_FOLDER_TO_AGENT_BIN :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.CHECK_RETURN_CODE_UNIX_SHELL
! Insert java call here :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SIEBEL.PRV.INCLUDE.EXPORT_BUSINESS_OBJECT :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.CHECK_RETURN_CODE_UNIX_SHELL
:INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.SUDOERS_FOOTER ! <End of sudo script>
:INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.CHECK_RETURN_CODE_UNIX_SHELL !End my code

POST_SCRIPT.OSCRI: :SET &output_entry# = PREP_PROCESS_REPORT(, , "REP", "*Number of records exported*") :PROCESS &output_entry# : SET &output_line# = GET_PROCESS_LINE(&output_entry#, 1) : SET &POS# = STR_FIND_REVERSE(&output_line#, ":") : SET &POS# = &POS# + 1 : SET &OUT_NUM_EXPORTED_OBJS# = SUBSTR(&output_line#, &POS#) : PUBLISH &OUT_NUM_EXPORTED_OBJS#, , 'WORKFLOW' :ENDPROCESS :CLOSE_PROCESS &output_entry#

DOCU_Docu.DOC: = RB name = PCK.AUTOMIC_SIEBEL.PUB.ACTION.EXPORT_EAI_XML = General description = Exports an EAI XML File. This action uses the underlying Write Siebel Message ( WriteEAIMsg ) business method. = Inputs = * Siebel Server Url: Siebel Server host * Siebel Port: port Siebel is listening on. * Siebel Enterprise: Enterprise that the databean should connect to. * Object Manager: The Objectmanagers to connect with the Databean to check if Siebel is running. (No Spaces!!) * Siebel Username: The Siebel user to connect. * Siebel Password: The Password to connect with the Siebel user. * Integration Object Name: The Name of the integration object to export. Must be selected from a Hierarchy type object. * Output Directory: The target folder where the XML should be exported to * Output Filename: The XML file name to export * Parameter of Number of Imported Objects: The output parameter to hold the number of imported objects. = Behavior = (see general description) = Outputs = * Return code is 0 if success, a SFR file is created. * Return code is 4 if not success. = Rollback = (none) = Logging = (none) = Example = (none)

SCRIPT.MSCRI:
:INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_HEADER_PARAM_VALIDATION :SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Siebel Server Url" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_SIEBEL_SERVER_URL#
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Siebel Server Port" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_SIEBEL_PORT#
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Siebel Enterprise" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_SIEBEL_ENTERPRISE#
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Object Manager" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_SIEBEL_OBJECT_MANAGER#
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Siebel Username" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_SIEBEL_USER#
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Integration Object Name" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &SIEBEL_EAI_INT_OBJ_NAME#
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Output Directory" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &SIEBEL_EAI_XML_DIR#
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Output Filename" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &SIEBEL_EAI_XML_FILENAME#
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Search Spec" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &SIEBEL_EAI_SEARCH_SPEC#
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Parameter of Number of Exported Objects" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &SIEBEL_OUTPUT_NUMBER_PARAM#

:INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SIEBEL.PRV.INCLUDE.ATTACH_RESOURCES :DEFINE &STRING_ARR#, string, 30 :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SIEBEL.PRV.INCLUDE.EXPORT_EAI_XML_LOGGING_PARAMS
!Check and create the target directory :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.NORMALIZE_PATH "UC4RB_CONVERTED_STRING" = "SIEBEL_EAI_XML_DIR" :SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_INFO# = "Create directory &SIEBEL_EAI_XML_DIR# if not found" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_INFO :SET &UC4RB_CONVERTED_STRING# = &SIEBEL_EAI_XML_DIR# :INCLUDE PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.ENSURE_DIRECTORY_EXISTS_UNIX
:INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_HEADER_EXECUTION !Begin my code :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.SUDOERS_HEADER :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.CHANGE_FOLDER_TO_AGENT_BIN :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.CHECK_RETURN_CODE_UNIX_SHELL :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SIEBEL.PRV.INCLUDE.SET_SIEBEL_PROPERTIES
:JCL_CONCAT_CHAR "?" java -jar "&SIEBEL_TOOL_JAR#" siebel ExportIntegrationObject ? -h &UC4RB_SIEBEL_SERVER_URL# ? -pt &UC4RB_SIEBEL_PORT# ? -e &UC4RB_SIEBEL_ENTERPRISE# ? -su "&UC4RB_SIEBEL_USER#" ? -sp "&UC4RB_SIEBEL_PASSWORD#" ? -om "&UC4RB_SIEBEL_OBJECT_MANAGER#" ? -t "&SIEBEL_EAI_INT_OBJ_NAME#" ? -f "&SIEBEL_EAI_XML_DIR#/&SIEBEL_EAI_XML_FILENAME#" ? -s "&SIEBEL_EAI_SEARCH_SPEC#" ? -c "&SIEBEL_OUTPUT_NUMBER_PARAM#" ? -ll "&UC4_LOGLEVEL#" &SIEBEL_PROPERTIES# :JCL_CONCAT_CHAR :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.CHECK_RETURN_CODE_UNIX_SHELL :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.SUDOERS_FOOTER !End my code

POST_SCRIPT.OSCRI: :INCLUDE PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.SCAN_OUTPUT_VARIABLES

SCRIPT.MSCRI:
:INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SIEBEL.PRV.INCLUDE.ATTACH_RESOURCES :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.POWERSHELL_UTILITY :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SIEBEL.PRV.INCLUDE.EXPORT_EAI_XML_LOGGING_PARAMS
!Check and create the target directory :DEFINE &STRING_ARR#,string,30 :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.NORMALIZE_PATH "UC4RB_CONVERTED_STRING" = "SIEBEL_EAI_XML_DIR" :SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_INFO# = "Create directory &SIEBEL_EAI_XML_DIR# if not found" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_INFO :SET &UC4RB_CONVERTED_STRING# = &SIEBEL_EAI_XML_DIR# :INCLUDE PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.ENSURE_DIRECTORY_EXISTS_WINDOWS_POWERSHELL
:INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_HEADER_EXECUTION !Begin my code :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.CHANGE_FOLDER_TO_AGENT_BIN :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.CHECK_RETURN_CODE_WINDOWS_POWERSHELL :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SIEBEL.PRV.INCLUDE.SET_SIEBEL_PROPERTIES
!Make Here String for optional parameters $searchSpec = @' "&SIEBEL_EAI_SEARCH_SPEC#" '@
$outputParam = @' "&SIEBEL_OUTPUT_NUMBER_PARAM#" '@
$loglevel = @' "&UC4_LOGLEVEL#" '@
:JCL_CONCAT_CHAR "?" java -jar "&SIEBEL_TOOL_JAR#" siebel ExportIntegrationObject ? -h &UC4RB_SIEBEL_SERVER_URL# ? -pt &UC4RB_SIEBEL_PORT# ? -e &UC4RB_SIEBEL_ENTERPRISE# ? -su "&UC4RB_SIEBEL_USER#" ? -sp "&UC4RB_SIEBEL_PASSWORD#" ? -om "&UC4RB_SIEBEL_OBJECT_MANAGER#" ? -t "&SIEBEL_EAI_INT_OBJ_NAME#" ? -f "&SIEBEL_EAI_XML_DIR#\&SIEBEL_EAI_XML_FILENAME#" ? -s "$searchSpec" ? -c "$outputParam" ? -ll $loglevel &SIEBEL_PROPERTIES# :JCL_CONCAT_CHAR :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.CHECK_RETURN_CODE_WINDOWS_POWERSHELL __uc_return(0) !End my code

POST_SCRIPT.OSCRI: :INCLUDE PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.SCAN_OUTPUT_VARIABLES

DOCU_Docu.DOC:
= RB name = PCK.AUTOMIC_SIEBEL.PUB.ACTION.EXPORT_LOVS = General description = Exports a set of LOV-s into an XML file. Optionally the action exports the parent LOVs recursively. = Inputs = * Siebel Server Url: Siebel Server host * Siebel Port: port Siebel is listening on. * Siebel Enterprise: Enterprise that the databean should connect to. * Object Manager: The Objectmanagers to connect with the Databean to check if Siebel is running. * Siebel Username: The Siebel user to connect. * Siebel Password: The Password to connect with the Siebel user. * Siebel Export Directory: The name of the directory where the exported file shall be placed. * Siebel Export File: The name of the file that contains the exported data. * Search Filter: The filter expression that is applied upon the business components. * Export Parents Recursively: Exports all parent LOVs of the same type recursively. The parents are looked up based on the attributes "Parent LIC" and "Language Independent Code". The parents are exported recursively meaning that grandparents..etc are exported as well. * Siebel Input Directory: The directory from which the tool reads the input xml files. * Input XML File name: Name of the file that contains the input xml schema.
= Behavior = This action can run on every host that has the appropriate installed Java version and can connect to the Target Siebel server. = Outputs = * Return code is 0 if success * Return code is 1 if Siebel Input Directory or Input XML File does not exist. * Return code is 4 if not success. = Rollback = (none) = Logging = (none) = Example = (none)

DOCU_Docu.DOC:
= RB name = PCK.AUTOMIC_SIEBEL.PUB.ACTION.EXPORT_REPOSITORY
= General description = Export a file dump of a repository (which refers to a subset of tables in which Siebel objects definitions and scripts are stored.)
= Inputs = * Unix environment script directory: The directory where the Siebel Environment Script is placed. Required for Unix. * Unix environment script file: The file name of the Environment Script. Required for Unix. * Siebel Server Directory: The installation or root directory for Siebel Server * Username: The user name of the Siebel database administrator * Password: The password of the Siebel database administrator * ODBC Data Source: The ODBC system data source name that Siebel server uses to connect to the Siebel database on the RDBMS * Siebel Table Owner: name of the Siebel table owner account. * Repository name: name of siebel repository * Data file path: The export repository data file's name * Log file path: The path of the data log file.
= Behavior = (see general description)
= Outputs = * Return code is 0 if success. * Return code is 1 if not success.
= Rollback = (none)
= Logging = (none)
= Example = Siebel Server Directory: C:\sba81\siebsrvr Username: sadmin Password: sadmin ODBC Data Source: SSD default instance Siebel Table Owner: siebel Repository name: Siebel Repository Data file path: c:\adm1\MyRepo.dat Log file path: c:\adm1\log\MyRepo.log

SCRIPT.MSCRI:
:INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SIEBEL.PRV.INCLUDE.ATTACH_RESOURCES :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_HEADER_PARAM_VALIDATION
:DEFINE &STRING_ARR#,string,30 :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.NORMALIZE_PATH "UC4RB_CONVERTED_STRING" = "UC4RB_SIEBEL_ENV_SCRIPT_DIR" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.NORMALIZE_PATH "UC4RB_CONVERTED_STRING" = "UC4RB_SIEBEL_SERVER_ROOT" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.NORMALIZE_PATH "UC4RB_CONVERTED_STRING" = "UC4RB_SIEBEL_DATA_FILE_PATH" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.NORMALIZE_PATH "UC4RB_CONVERTED_STRING" = "UC4RB_SIEBEL_LOG_FILE_PATH"
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Unix environment script directory" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_SIEBEL_ENV_SCRIPT_DIR#
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Unix environment script file" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_SIEBEL_ENV_SCRIPT#
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Siebel Server home Directory" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_SIEBEL_SERVER_ROOT#
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Siebel administrator user name" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_SIEBEL_DB_USER#
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Password" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_SIEBEL_DB_PASSWORD#
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "ODBC data source" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_SIEBEL_DATA_SOURCE#
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Siebel database table owner" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_SIEBEL_TABLE_OWNER#
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Siebel repository name" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_SIEBEL_REPOSITORY_NAME#
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Data file path" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_SIEBEL_DATA_FILE_PATH#
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Log file path" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_SIEBEL_LOG_FILE_PATH#
! <Begin of sudo script> :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.SUDOERS_HEADER
errors=0
! Check if Unix environment script directory exist :SET &UC4RB_CHECKME# = "&UC4RB_SIEBEL_ENV_SCRIPT_DIR#/&UC4RB_SIEBEL_ENV_SCRIPT#" :INCLUDE PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.CHECK_UNIX_SHELL_FILE_EXISTS
if [ "$EXIST" -eq "0" ] ; then : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Unix environment script directory/Unix environment script file" : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_ERROR# = "Unix environment script '&UC4RB_CHECKME#' doesn't exist." : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_ERROR_PARAMETER errors=1 else if [ "$ISFILE" -eq "0" ] ; then : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Unix environment script directory/Unix environment script file" : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_ERROR# = "&UC4RB_CHECKME# exists but is not a file" : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_ERROR_PARAMETER errors=2 fi fi
! Check if Siebel home directory exists :SET &UC4RB_CHECKME# = &UC4RB_SIEBEL_SERVER_ROOT# :INCLUDE PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.CHECK_UNIX_SHELL_FILE_EXISTS
if [ "$EXIST" -eq "0" ] ; then : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Siebel Server home Directory" : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_ERROR# = "Siebel Server home Directory '&UC4RB_SIEBEL_SERVER_ROOT#' doesn't exist." : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_ERROR_PARAMETER errors=1 else if [ "$ISDIR" -eq "0" ] ; then : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Siebel Server home Directory" : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_ERROR# = "&UC4RB_SIEBEL_SERVER_ROOT# exists but is not a directory " : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_ERROR_PARAMETER errors=2 fi fi
if [ $errors -gt 0 ] ; then retcode=$errors exit $retcode fi
:INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_HEADER_EXECUTION
! Create log file dir if it doesn't exist :SET &UC4RB_CONVERTED_STRING# = "&UC4RB_SIEBEL_LOG_FILE_PATH#" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.GET_DIRECTORY_FROM_FILE_NAME :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.ENSURE_DIRECTORY_EXISTS_UNIX
! Create dat file dir if it doesn't exist :SET &UC4RB_CONVERTED_STRING# = "&UC4RB_SIEBEL_DATA_FILE_PATH#" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.GET_DIRECTORY_FROM_FILE_NAME :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.ENSURE_DIRECTORY_EXISTS_UNIX
cd "&UC4RB_SIEBEL_SERVER_ROOT#/bin" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.CHECK_RETURN_CODE_UNIX_SHELL ! Execute the siebel environment script source /&UC4RB_SIEBEL_ENV_SCRIPT_DIR#/&UC4RB_SIEBEL_ENV_SCRIPT#
:INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.CHECK_RETURN_CODE_UNIX_SHELL ! Execute export repository command :SET &UC4RB_ENCRYPTED_PASSWORD_TMP#="&UC4RB_SIEBEL_DB_PASSWORD#" :INCLUDE PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.DECRYPT_PASSWORD :JCL_CONCAT_CHAR "?" repimexp /A E /U "&UC4RB_SIEBEL_DB_USER#" /P "$UC4_DECRYPTED_PWD" ? /C "&UC4RB_SIEBEL_DATA_SOURCE#" /D "&UC4RB_SIEBEL_TABLE_OWNER#" /R "&UC4RB_SIEBEL_REPOSITORY_NAME#" ? /F "&UC4RB_SIEBEL_DATA_FILE_PATH#" ? /V Y /L "&UC4RB_SIEBEL_LOG_FILE_PATH#" :JCL_CONCAT_CHAR
:INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.CHECK_RETURN_CODE_UNIX_SHELL
:INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.SUDOERS_FOOTER ! <End of sudo script>

:INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SIEBEL.PRV.INCLUDE.ATTACH_RESOURCES @echo off setlocal enabledelayedexpansion
:INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_HEADER_PARAM_VALIDATION :DEFINE &STRING_ARR#,string,30 :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.NORMALIZE_PATH "UC4RB_CONVERTED_STRING" = "UC4RB_SIEBEL_SERVER_ROOT" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.NORMALIZE_PATH "UC4RB_CONVERTED_STRING" = "UC4RB_SIEBEL_DATA_FILE_PATH" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.NORMALIZE_PATH "UC4RB_CONVERTED_STRING" = "UC4RB_SIEBEL_LOG_FILE_PATH"
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Siebel Server home Directory" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_SIEBEL_SERVER_ROOT#
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Siebel administrator user name" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_SIEBEL_DB_USER#
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Password" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_SIEBEL_DB_PASSWORD#
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "ODBC data source" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_SIEBEL_DATA_SOURCE#
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Siebel database table owner" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_SIEBEL_TABLE_OWNER#
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Siebel repository name" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_SIEBEL_REPOSITORY_NAME#
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Data file path" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_SIEBEL_DATA_FILE_PATH#
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Log file path" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_SIEBEL_LOG_FILE_PATH#
set /a errors=0 > nul
! Check if Siebel home directory exists :SET &UC4RB_CHECKME# = &UC4RB_SIEBEL_SERVER_ROOT# :INCLUDE PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.CHECK_WINDOWS_CONSOLE_FILE_EXISTS
if %EXIST% == 0 ( : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Siebel Server home Directory" : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_ERROR# = "Directory &UC4RB_SIEBEL_SERVER_ROOT# does not exist" : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_ERROR_PARAMETER set /a errors=1 > nul ) else ( if %ISDIR% == 0 ( : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Siebel Server home Directory" : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_ERROR# = "&UC4RB_SIEBEL_SERVER_ROOT# exists but is not a directory " : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_ERROR_PARAMETER set /a errors=2 > nul ) )
if %errors% GTR 0 ( set retcode=%errors% goto :retcode )
:INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_HEADER_EXECUTION :DEFINE &STRING_ARR#,string,30 ! Create log file dir if it doesn't exist :SET &UC4RB_CONVERTED_STRING# = "&UC4RB_SIEBEL_LOG_FILE_PATH#" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.GET_DIRECTORY_FROM_FILE_NAME :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.ENSURE_DIRECTORY_EXISTS_WINDOWS_CONSOLE
! Create dat file dir if it doesn't exist :SET &UC4RB_CONVERTED_STRING# = "&UC4RB_SIEBEL_DATA_FILE_PATH#" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.GET_DIRECTORY_FROM_FILE_NAME :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.ENSURE_DIRECTORY_EXISTS_WINDOWS_CONSOLE
cd /d "&UC4RB_SIEBEL_SERVER_ROOT#\bin" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.CHECK_RETURN_CODE_WINDOWS_CONSOLE
:SET &UC4RB_ENCRYPTED_PASSWORD_TMP#="&UC4RB_SIEBEL_DB_PASSWORD#" :INCLUDE PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.DECRYPT_PASSWORD
:JCL_CONCAT_CHAR "?" repimexp.exe /A E /U "&UC4RB_SIEBEL_DB_USER#" /P "%UC4_DECRYPTED_PWD%" ? /C "&UC4RB_SIEBEL_DATA_SOURCE#" /D "&UC4RB_SIEBEL_TABLE_OWNER#" /R "&UC4RB_SIEBEL_REPOSITORY_NAME#" ? /F "&UC4RB_SIEBEL_DATA_FILE_PATH#" ? /V Y /L "&UC4RB_SIEBEL_LOG_FILE_PATH#" :JCL_CONCAT_CHAR
:INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.CHECK_RETURN_CODE_WINDOWS_CONSOLE

POST_SCRIPT.OSCRI: :SET &UC4RB_OUT_REPO_FILE# = &UC4RB_SIEBEL_DATA_FILE_PATH# :PUBLISH &UC4RB_OUT_REPO_FILE#, , "TOP"

DOCU_Docu.DOC: = RB name = PCK.AUTOMIC_SIEBEL.PUB.ACTION.EXPORT_RESPONSIBILITIES = General description = Exports responsibilities together with the links to the associated views & users. = Inputs = * Siebel Username: The Siebel user to connect. * Siebel Password: The Password to connect with the Siebel user. * Server Url: siebel Server host * Siebel Enterprise: Enterprise that the databean should connect to. * Port: port Siebel is listening on. * Object Manager: The Objectmanagers to connect with the Databean to check if Siebel is running. (No Spaces!!) * Export Directory: The directory to which the tool writes the export file. * File name: Name of the file that contains the business objects * Input File Directory: The directory from which the tool reads the input xml files * Input XML File name: Name of the file that contains the input xml schema. * Search Specification: The search specification that Siebel CRM uses to identify the business objects that it exports. For example: [Name] like 'User Reg*' = Behavior = (see general description) = Outputs = * Return code is 0 if success * Return code is 4 if not success. = Rollback = (none) = Logging = (none) = Example = (none)

SCRIPT.MSCRI: :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SIEBEL.PRV.INCLUDE.SET_SIEBEL_PROPERTIES :JCL_CONCAT_CHAR "?" java -jar "&$AGENT_RESOURCES_CLIENT#siebeltool.jar" siebel ExportBusinessObject ? -h &UC4RB_SIEBEL_SERVER_URL# ? -pt &UC4RB_SIEBEL_PORT# ? -e &UC4RB_SIEBEL_ENTERPRISE# ? -su "&UC4RB_SIEBEL_USER#" ? -sp "&UC4RB_SIEBEL_PASSWORD#" ? -om "&UC4RB_SIEBEL_OBJECT_MANAGER#" ? -o "&SIEBEL_EXPORT_DIR#/&SIEBEL_EXPORT_FILE#" ? -i "&SIEBEL_INPUT_DIR#/&SIEBEL_INPUT_XML#" ? -s "&SIEBEL_SEARCH_SPEC#" ? &SIEBEL_PROPERTIES# :JCL_CONCAT_CHAR

:INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SIEBEL.PRV.INCLUDE.ATTACH_RESOURCES :DEFINE &STRING_ARR#, string, 30
:INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_HEADER_PARAM_VALIDATION
:INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.NORMALIZE_PATH "UC4RB_CONVERTED_STRING" = "SIEBEL_EXPORT_DIR" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.NORMALIZE_PATH "UC4RB_CONVERTED_STRING" = "SIEBEL_INPUT_DIR"
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Siebel Server Url" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_SIEBEL_SERVER_URL#
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Siebel Port" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_SIEBEL_PORT#
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Siebel Enterprise" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_SIEBEL_ENTERPRISE#
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Siebel Username" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_SIEBEL_USER#
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Siebel Password" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_SIEBEL_PASSWORD#
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Object Manager" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_SIEBEL_OBJECT_MANAGER#
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Export Directory" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &SIEBEL_EXPORT_DIR#
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "File name" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &SIEBEL_EXPORT_FILE#
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Input File Directory" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &SIEBEL_INPUT_DIR#
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Input XML File name" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &SIEBEL_INPUT_XML#
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Search Specification" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &SIEBEL_SEARCH_SPEC#
! <Begin of sudo script> :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.SUDOERS_HEADER
errors=0 ! Check if xml input exists :SET &UC4RB_CHECKME# = "&SIEBEL_INPUT_DIR#/&SIEBEL_INPUT_XML#" :INCLUDE PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.CHECK_UNIX_SHELL_FILE_EXISTS if [ "$ISFILE" -eq "0" ]; then : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Input xml file path" : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_ERROR# = "File &SIEBEL_INPUT_DIR#/&SIEBEL_INPUT_XML# does not exist" : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_ERROR_PARAMETER errors=1 fi
:INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.ENSURE_DIRECTORY_EXISTS_UNIX "UC4RB_CONVERTED_STRING" = "SIEBEL_EXPORT_DIR"
if [ "$errors" -gt 0 ]; then exit $errors; fi
:INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_HEADER_EXECUTION !Begin my code
:INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.CHANGE_FOLDER_TO_AGENT_BIN :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.CHECK_RETURN_CODE_UNIX_SHELL
! Insert java call here :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SIEBEL.PRV.INCLUDE.EXPORT_RESPONSIBILITIES :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.CHECK_RETURN_CODE_UNIX_SHELL
:INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.SUDOERS_FOOTER ! <End of sudo script>
:INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.CHECK_RETURN_CODE_UNIX_SHELL !End my code

POST_SCRIPT.OSCRI: :SET &output_entry# = PREP_PROCESS_REPORT(, , "REP", "*Number of records exported*") :PROCESS &output_entry# : SET &output_line# = GET_PROCESS_LINE(&output_entry#, 1) : SET &POS# = STR_FIND_REVERSE(&output_line#, ":") : SET &POS# = &POS# + 1 : SET &OUT_NUM_EXPORTED_OBJS# = SUBSTR(&output_line#, &POS#) : PUBLISH &OUT_NUM_EXPORTED_OBJS#, , 'WORKFLOW' :ENDPROCESS :CLOSE_PROCESS &output_entry#

SCRIPT.MSCRI:
:INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SIEBEL.PRV.INCLUDE.ATTACH_RESOURCES @echo off setlocal enabledelayedexpansion :DEFINE &STRING_ARR#, string, 30 :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_HEADER_PARAM_VALIDATION
:INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.NORMALIZE_PATH "UC4RB_CONVERTED_STRING" = "SIEBEL_EXPORT_DIR" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.NORMALIZE_PATH "UC4RB_CONVERTED_STRING" = "SIEBEL_INPUT_DIR"
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Siebel Server Url" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_SIEBEL_SERVER_URL#
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Siebel Port" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_SIEBEL_PORT#

:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Siebel Username" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_SIEBEL_USER#
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Siebel Password" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_SIEBEL_PASSWORD#
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Object Manager" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_SIEBEL_OBJECT_MANAGER#
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Export Directory" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &SIEBEL_EXPORT_DIR#
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "File name" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &SIEBEL_EXPORT_FILE#
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Input File Directory" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &SIEBEL_INPUT_DIR#
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Input XML File name" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &SIEBEL_INPUT_XML#
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Search Specification" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &SIEBEL_SEARCH_SPEC#
set /a errors=0 > nul
! Check if xml input exists :SET &UC4RB_CHECKME# = "&SIEBEL_INPUT_DIR#\&SIEBEL_INPUT_XML#" :INCLUDE PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.CHECK_WINDOWS_CONSOLE_FILE_EXISTS
if %ISFILE% == 0 ( : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Input xml file path" : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_ERROR# = "File &SIEBEL_INPUT_DIR#\&SIEBEL_INPUT_XML# does not exist" : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_ERROR_PARAMETER set /a errors=1 > nul )
:INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.ENSURE_DIRECTORY_EXISTS_WINDOWS_CONSOLE "UC4RB_CONVERTED_STRING" = "SIEBEL_EXPORT_DIR"
if %errors% GTR 0 ( set retcode=%errors% goto :retcode ) :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_HEADER_EXECUTION !Begin my code :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.CHANGE_FOLDER_TO_AGENT_BIN :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SIEBEL.PRV.INCLUDE.EXPORT_RESPONSIBILITIES :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.CHECK_RETURN_CODE_WINDOWS_CONSOLE !End my code

POST_SCRIPT.OSCRI: :SET &output_entry# = PREP_PROCESS_REPORT(, , "REP", "*Number of records exported*") :PROCESS &output_entry# : SET &output_line# = GET_PROCESS_LINE(&output_entry#, 1) : SET &POS# = STR_FIND_REVERSE(&output_line#, ":") : SET &POS# = &POS# + 1 : SET &OUT_NUM_EXPORTED_OBJS# = SUBSTR(&output_line#, &POS#) : PUBLISH &OUT_NUM_EXPORTED_OBJS#, , 'WORKFLOW' :ENDPROCESS :CLOSE_PROCESS &output_entry#

DOCU_Docu.DOC: = RB name = PCK.AUTOMIC_SIEBEL.PUB.ACTION.EXPORT_SCHEMA = General description = Generate the schema file that contains the logical definition of the Siebel database. = Inputs = * Siebel Server Directory: The installation or root directory for Siebel Server * Username: The user name of the Siebel database administrator * Password: The password of the Siebel database administrator * ODBC Data Source: The ODBC system data source name that Siebel server uses to connect to the Siebel database on the RDBMS * Siebel Table Owner: name of the Siebel table owner account. * DLL file path: The path of the ddl that will be exported * Table types: Table Types: (D)ata|Di(C)t|(I)face|(W)arehouse|(E)AI|(R)epos * Repository name: name of siebel repository * Log file path: The path of the data log file. = Behavior = (see general description) = Outputs = * Return code is 0 if success. * Return code is 1 if not success. = Rollback = (none) = Logging = (none) = Example = * Siebel Server Directory: D:\sba81\siebsrvr * Username: sadmin * Password: sadmin * ODBC Data Source: SSD default instance * Siebel Table Owner: siebel * DLL file path: D:\sba81\dbsrvr\oracle\schema.ddl * Table types: Table Types: DCIR * Repository name: Siebel Repository * Log file path: ddldict.log

SCRIPT.MSCRI:
:INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SIEBEL.PRV.INCLUDE.ATTACH_RESOURCES @echo off setlocal enabledelayedexpansion
:INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_HEADER_PARAM_VALIDATION
:DEFINE &STRING_ARR#, string, 30 :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.NORMALIZE_PATH "UC4RB_CONVERTED_STRING" = "UC4RB_SIEBEL_SERVER_ROOT" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.NORMALIZE_PATH "UC4RB_CONVERTED_STRING" = "UC4RB_SIEBEL_DDL_FILE_PATH" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.NORMALIZE_PATH "UC4RB_CONVERTED_STRING" = "UC4RB_SIEBEL_LOG_FILE_PATH"
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Siebel Server Directory" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_SIEBEL_SERVER_ROOT#
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Username" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_SIEBEL_DB_USER#
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Password" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_SIEBEL_DB_PASSWORD#
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "ODBC Data Source" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_SIEBEL_DATA_SOURCE#
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Siebel Table Owner" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_SIEBEL_TABLE_OWNER#
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "DDL file path" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_SIEBEL_DDL_FILE_PATH#
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Table Types" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_SIEBEL_TABLE_TYPES#
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Repository Name" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_SIEBEL_REPOSITORY_NAME#
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Log file path" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_SIEBEL_LOG_FILE_PATH#
set /a errors=0 > nul
! Check if Siebel directory exists :SET &UC4RB_CHECKME# = &UC4RB_SIEBEL_SERVER_ROOT# :INCLUDE PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.CHECK_WINDOWS_CONSOLE_FILE_EXISTS
if %EXIST% == 0 ( : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Siebel Server Directory" : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_ERROR# = "Directory &UC4RB_SIEBEL_SERVER_ROOT# does not exist" : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_ERROR_PARAMETER set /a errors=1 > nul )
if %errors% GTR 0 ( set retcode=%errors% goto :retcode )
:INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_HEADER_EXECUTION
:SET &UC4RB_ENCRYPTED_PASSWORD_TMP#="&UC4RB_SIEBEL_DB_PASSWORD#" :INCLUDE PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.DECRYPT_PASSWORD
!Begin my code ! Create log file dir if it doesn't exist :SET &UC4RB_CONVERTED_STRING# = "&UC4RB_SIEBEL_LOG_FILE_PATH#" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.GET_DIRECTORY_FROM_FILE_NAME :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.ENSURE_DIRECTORY_EXISTS_WINDOWS_CONSOLE
! Create ddl file dir if it doesn't exist :SET &UC4RB_CONVERTED_STRING# = "&UC4RB_SIEBEL_DDL_FILE_PATH#" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.GET_DIRECTORY_FROM_FILE_NAME :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.ENSURE_DIRECTORY_EXISTS_WINDOWS_CONSOLE
:SET &UC4RB_AGENT_TEMP_DIR# = GET_VAR('UC_EX_PATH_TEMP', &AGENT#) :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.NORMALIZE_PATH "UC4RB_CONVERTED_STRING" = "UC4RB_AGENT_TEMP_DIR" :SET &UC4RB_AGENT_TEMP_REPORT# = "&UC4RB_AGENT_TEMP_DIR#\report&$RUNID#"
:INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.ESCAPE_WINDOWS_CHARS "UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING" = "UC4RB_SIEBEL_DDL_FILE_PATH" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.ESCAPE_WINDOWS_CHARS "UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING" = "UC4RB_SIEBEL_LOG_FILE_PATH"
cd /d "&UC4RB_SIEBEL_SERVER_ROOT#\BIN" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.CHECK_RETURN_CODE_WINDOWS_CONSOLE
:JCL_CONCAT_CHAR "?" ddldict.exe /u "&UC4RB_SIEBEL_DB_USER#" /p "%UC4_DECRYPTED_PWD%" /c "&UC4RB_SIEBEL_DATA_SOURCE#" /d "&UC4RB_SIEBEL_TABLE_OWNER#" ? /f "&UC4RB_SIEBEL_DDL_FILE_PATH#" /e Y /a Y ? /l "&UC4RB_SIEBEL_LOG_FILE_PATH#" /n "&UC4RB_SIEBEL_REPOSITORY_NAME#" /t "&UC4RB_SIEBEL_TABLE_TYPES#" 2> "&UC4RB_AGENT_TEMP_REPORT#" :JCL_CONCAT_CHAR set retcode=%errorlevel% if NOT %retcode% == 0 ( type "&UC4RB_AGENT_TEMP_REPORT#" ) DEL /F /Q "&UC4RB_AGENT_TEMP_REPORT#" goto :retcode !End my code

POST_SCRIPT.OSCRI: :SET &UC4RB_OUT_SCHEMA_FILE# = &UC4RB_SIEBEL_DDL_FILE_PATH# :PUBLISH &UC4RB_OUT_SCHEMA_FILE#, , "TOP"

SCRIPT.MSCRI:
:INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SIEBEL.PRV.INCLUDE.ATTACH_RESOURCES
:INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_HEADER_PARAM_VALIDATION
:DEFINE &STRING_ARR#, string, 30 :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.NORMALIZE_PATH "UC4RB_CONVERTED_STRING" = "UC4RB_SIEBEL_SERVER_ROOT" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.NORMALIZE_PATH "UC4RB_CONVERTED_STRING" = "UC4RB_SIEBEL_DDL_FILE_PATH" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.NORMALIZE_PATH "UC4RB_CONVERTED_STRING" = "UC4RB_SIEBEL_LOG_FILE_PATH"
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Siebel Server Directory" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_SIEBEL_SERVER_ROOT#
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Username" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_SIEBEL_DB_USER#
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Password" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_SIEBEL_DB_PASSWORD#
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "ODBC Data Source" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_SIEBEL_DATA_SOURCE#
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Siebel Table Owner" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_SIEBEL_TABLE_OWNER#
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "DDL file path" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_SIEBEL_DDL_FILE_PATH#
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Table Types" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_SIEBEL_TABLE_TYPES#
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Repository Name" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_SIEBEL_REPOSITORY_NAME#
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Log file path" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_SIEBEL_LOG_FILE_PATH#
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Siebel Environment Script directory" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_SIEBEL_ENV_SCRIPT_DIR#
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Siebel Environment Script file name" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_SIEBEL_ENV_SCRIPT#
! <Begin of sudo script> :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.SUDOERS_HEADER
:SET &UC4RB_SIEBEL_ENV_SCRIPT_PATH# = "&UC4RB_SIEBEL_ENV_SCRIPT_DIR#/&UC4RB_SIEBEL_ENV_SCRIPT#" errors=0 ! Validate siebel environment script :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.CHECK_UNIX_SHELL_FILE_EXISTS "&UC4RB_CHECKME#" = "&UC4RB_SIEBEL_ENV_SCRIPT_PATH#" if [ "$ISFILE" -eq "0" ] ; then echo "ERROR[Siebel Environment Script file]: &UC4RB_SIEBEL_ENV_SCRIPT_PATH# is not a valid file" error=1 fi
! Check if Siebel directory exists :SET &UC4RB_CHECKME# = &UC4RB_SIEBEL_SERVER_ROOT# :INCLUDE PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.CHECK_UNIX_SHELL_FILE_EXISTS if [ "$ISDIR" -eq "0" ] ; then : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Siebel Server Directory" : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_ERROR# = "Directory &UC4RB_SIEBEL_SERVER_ROOT# does not exist" : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_ERROR_PARAMETER errors=1 fi
if [ "$errors" -gt "0" ] ; then exit $errors fi
:INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_HEADER_EXECUTION
:SET &UC4RB_ENCRYPTED_PASSWORD_TMP#="&UC4RB_SIEBEL_DB_PASSWORD#" :INCLUDE PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.DECRYPT_PASSWORD
!Begin my code ! Create log file dir if it doesn't exist :SET &UC4RB_CONVERTED_STRING# = "&UC4RB_SIEBEL_LOG_FILE_PATH#" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.GET_DIRECTORY_FROM_FILE_NAME :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.ENSURE_DIRECTORY_EXISTS_UNIX
! Create ddl file dir if it doesn't exist :SET &UC4RB_CONVERTED_STRING# = "&UC4RB_SIEBEL_DDL_FILE_PATH#" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.GET_DIRECTORY_FROM_FILE_NAME :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.ENSURE_DIRECTORY_EXISTS_UNIX
:SET &UC4RB_AGENT_TEMP_DIR# = GET_VAR('UC_EX_PATH_TEMP', &AGENT#) :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.NORMALIZE_PATH "UC4RB_CONVERTED_STRING" = "UC4RB_AGENT_TEMP_DIR" :SET &UC4RB_AGENT_TEMP_REPORT# = "&UC4RB_AGENT_TEMP_DIR#/report&$RUNID#"
. "&UC4RB_SIEBEL_ENV_SCRIPT_PATH#" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.CHECK_RETURN_CODE_UNIX_SHELL
cd "&UC4RB_SIEBEL_SERVER_ROOT#/bin" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.CHECK_RETURN_CODE_UNIX_SHELL
echo Start exporting... :JCL_CONCAT_CHAR "?" ./ddldict /u "&UC4RB_SIEBEL_DB_USER#" /p "$UC4_DECRYPTED_PWD" /c "&UC4RB_SIEBEL_DATA_SOURCE#" /d "&UC4RB_SIEBEL_TABLE_OWNER#" ? /f "&UC4RB_SIEBEL_DDL_FILE_PATH#" /e Y /a Y ? /l "&UC4RB_SIEBEL_LOG_FILE_PATH#" /n "&UC4RB_SIEBEL_REPOSITORY_NAME#" /t "&UC4RB_SIEBEL_TABLE_TYPES#" 2> "&UC4RB_AGENT_TEMP_REPORT#" :JCL_CONCAT_CHAR
RC=$? if [ "$RC" != "" ] ; then if [ "$RC" != "0" ] ; then echo "Exporting finished with error." cat "&UC4RB_AGENT_TEMP_REPORT#" rm -f "&UC4RB_AGENT_TEMP_REPORT#" exit $RC; else echo "Exporting finished successfully." rm -f "&UC4RB_AGENT_TEMP_REPORT#" ! exit $RC; fi else RC=\$? if [ "\$RC" != "0" ] ; then echo "Exporting finished with error." cat "&UC4RB_AGENT_TEMP_REPORT#" rm -f "&UC4RB_AGENT_TEMP_REPORT#" exit \$RC; else echo "Exporting finished successfully." rm -f "&UC4RB_AGENT_TEMP_REPORT#" ! exit $RC; fi fi :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.SUDOERS_FOOTER ! <End of sudo script> !End my code

DOCU_Docu.DOC: = RB name = PCK.AUTOMIC_SIEBEL.PUB.ACTION.EXPORT_SIF_FILE = General description = Export a SIF file (Siebel Information File) which is a declarative xml file describing Siebel object. = Inputs = * Siebel Tools Directory: The installation or root directory for Siebel Tools * Username: The user name of the Siebel administrator * Password: The password of the Siebel administrator * Repository name: The name of the Siebel repository * Siebel config: The name of the config file of the siebel tools * Siebel Datasource: Datasource (as in .cfg file) that Siebel Tools connect to * Object Type to Export: Identifies the object type to export. Example: Business Component * Query Expression: Can include any query that Siebel Tools can use. Example: *Account* * Output Directory of SIF file: The directory where the SIF file should be exported to. * SIF File Name: The SIF file name = Behavior = (see general description) = Outputs = * Return code is 0 if success. * Return code is 1 if not success. = Rollback = (none) = Logging = The export.log should be checked for the STATUS message entry. = Example = Siebel Tools Directory: D:\sba81\tools Username: sadmin Password: sadmin Repository name: Siebel Repository Siebel config: tools.cfg Siebel Datasource: ServerDataSrc Object Type to Export: Business Component Query Expression: *Account* Output Directory of SIF file: c:\sif_exports\ SIF File Name:

SCRIPT.MSCRI:
:INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SIEBEL.PRV.INCLUDE.ATTACH_RESOURCES :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.POWERSHELL_UTILITY :DEFINE &STRING_ARR#, string, 30 :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_HEADER_PARAM_VALIDATION
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Siebel Tools Directory" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &SIEBEL_TOOLS_ROOT#
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Username" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &SIEBEL_USER#
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Password" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &SIEBEL_PASSWORD#
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Repository name" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &SIEBEL_REPOSITORY_NAME#
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Siebel config" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &SIEBEL_CONFIG_NAME#
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Siebel Datasource" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &SIEBEL_CFG_DATA_SOURCE#
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Object Type to Export" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &SIEBEL_OBJECT_TYPE_TO_EXPORT#
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Query Expression" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &SIEBEL_QUERY_EXPRESSION#
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Output Directory of SIF file" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &SIEBEL_SIF_DIR#
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "SIF File Name" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &SIEBEL_SIF_NAME#
! Check Siebel Tools Directory exists :SET &UC4RB_CHECKME# = &SIEBEL_TOOLS_ROOT# :INCLUDE PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.CHECK_WINDOWS_POWERSHELL_FILE_EXISTS $errors = 0 if ($ISDIR -eq 0){ : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Siebel Tools Directory" : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_ERROR# = "Directory &SIEBEL_TOOLS_ROOT# does not exist" : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_ERROR_PARAMETER $errors=1 }
if ($errors -gt 0) { exit $errors }
:INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_HEADER_EXECUTION ! Begin my code
:SET &INPUT_FILE_NAME# = &SIEBEL_SIF_NAME# :IF &SIEBEL_SIF_DIR# NE "" : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.NORMALIZE_PATH "UC4RB_CONVERTED_STRING" = "SIEBEL_SIF_DIR" : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.ENSURE_DIRECTORY_EXISTS_WINDOWS_POWERSHELL "UC4RB_CONVERTED_STRING" = "SIEBEL_SIF_DIR" : SET &INPUT_FILE_NAME# = "&SIEBEL_SIF_DIR#\&SIEBEL_SIF_NAME#" :ENDIF
:SET &UC4RB_CONVERTED_STRING# = GET_VAR('UC_EX_PATH_TEMP', &AGENT#) :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.NORMALIZE_PATH :SET &TEMP_FILE# = "&UC4RB_CONVERTED_STRING#\&$RUNID#.txt" :SET &LOG_FILE# = "&UC4RB_CONVERTED_STRING#\&$RUNID#_log.txt"
Remove-Item '&LOG_FILE#' -Force -errorAction SilentlyContinue
write-output "&SIEBEL_OBJECT_TYPE_TO_EXPORT#,&SIEBEL_QUERY_EXPRESSION#,&INPUT_FILE_NAME#" | Out-File "&TEMP_FILE#" -Encoding ASCII cd "&SIEBEL_TOOLS_ROOT#\BIN" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.CHECK_RETURN_CODE_WINDOWS_POWERSHELL
:SET &UC4RB_ENCRYPTED_PASSWORD_TMP#="&SIEBEL_PASSWORD#" :INCLUDE PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.DECRYPT_PASSWORD
:JCL_CONCAT_CHAR "?" $MyProcess = Start-Process .\siebdev.exe -passthru -ArgumentList "/c","&SIEBEL_CONFIG_NAME#","/d","&SIEBEL_CFG_DATA_SOURCE#","/u","&SIEBEL_USER#","/p","$UC4_DECRYPTED_PWD",? "/batchexport","'&SIEBEL_REPOSITORY_NAME#'","'&TEMP_FILE#'","'&LOG_FILE#'" :JCL_CONCAT_CHAR :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.CHECK_RETURN_CODE_WINDOWS_POWERSHELL
$timeout = 0 while ( $true ) { $timeout += 10 Start-Sleep -s 10 $running = ( get-process -Id $MyProcess.Id -errorAction SilentlyContinue ) if ( !$running ) { break; } else { if ($timeout -gt 300) { if ( !( Test-Path '&LOG_FILE#' ) ) { ! kill process Stop-Process -Id $MyProcess.Id -Force break } } } }
if ( Test-Path '&LOG_FILE#' ) { $s = ( Get-Content '&LOG_FILE#' | ? {$_.trim() -ne "" } | Select-Object -last 1 | select-string -pattern "Export Successful" -casesensitive ) if ( $s ) { echo "Export Successful, see more detail in the log file &LOG_FILE#" type '&LOG_FILE#' | ? {$_.trim() -ne "" } | Select-Object -first 5 echo "..........................................." type '&LOG_FILE#' | ? {$_.trim() -ne "" } | Select-Object -last 5 } else { echo "Export Failed, see more detail in the log file &LOG_FILE#" type '&LOG_FILE#' | ? {$_.trim() -ne "" } | Select-Object -first 5 echo "..........................................." type '&LOG_FILE#' | ? {$_.trim() -ne "" } | Select-Object -last 5 __uc_return( 1 ) } } else { echo "Export Failed, Please check input parameters again" __uc_return( 3 ) } __uc_return( 0 ) ! End my code

DOCU_Docu.DOC:
= RB name = PCK.AUTOMIC_SIEBEL.PUB.ACTION.EXPORT_STATEMODEL = General description = Exports State Model matched by a Search Filter query. = Inputs = * Siebel Server Url: Siebel Server host * Siebel Port: port Siebel is listening on. * Siebel Enterprise: Enterprise that the databean should connect to. * Object Manager: The Objectmanagers to connect with the Databean to check if Siebel is running. (No Spaces!!) * Siebel Username: The Siebel user to connect. * Siebel Password: The Password to connect with the Siebel user. * Siebel Export Directory: The name of the directory where the exported file shall be placed. * Siebel Export File: The name of the file that contains the exported data. * Search Filter: The filter expression that is applied upon the business components. * Siebel Input Directory: The directory from which the tool reads the input xml files. * Input XML File name: Name of the file that contains the input xml schema.
= Behavior = This action can run on every host that has the appropriate installed Java version and can connect to the Target Siebel server. = Outputs = * Return code is 0 if success * Return code is 1 if Siebel Input Directory or Input XML File does not exist. * Return code is 4 if not success. = Rollback = (none) = Logging = (none) = Example = (none)

DOCU_Docu.DOC: = RB name = PCK.AUTOMIC_SIEBEL.PUB.ACTION.EXPORT_WEBSERVICE = General description = Exports a Webservice that runs within Siebel into an XML file with a Siebel specific format. = Inputs = * Siebel Server Url: Siebel Server host * Siebel Port: port Siebel is listening on. * Siebel Enterprise: Enterprise that the databean should connect to. * Object Manager: The Objectmanagers to connect with the Databean to check if Siebel is running. (No Spaces!!) * Siebel Username: The Siebel user to connect. * Siebel Password: The Password to connect with the Siebel user. * Web Service Namespace: Namespace of the web services you want to export. * Web Service Name: Name of the web service you want to export. * Web Service Directory: The directory in which the web service file resides * Web Service File: The file name to be exported. = Behavior = (see general description) = Outputs = * Return code is 0 if success, a SFR file is created. * Return code is 4 if not success. = Rollback = (none) = Logging = (none) = Example = (none)
