DOCU_Docu.DOC: = RB name = PCK.AUTOMIC_SIEBEL.PUB.ACTION.EXPORT_WORKFLOW = General description = This Action is designed to export workflow processes. = Inputs = * Export Directory: The directory to which Siebel CRM writes the export files. * Flow Search Specification: The search specification that Siebel CRM uses to identify the workflow processes that it exports. * Repository: The repository from which Siebel CRM exports workflow processes. * Server Url: siebel Server host * Port: port Siebel is listening on. * Siebel Enterprise: Enterprise that the databean should connect to. * Siebel Username: The Siebel user to connect. * Siebel Password: The Password to connect with the Siebel user. * Object Manager: The Objectmanagers to connect with the Databean to check if Siebel is running. (No Spaces!!) = Behavior = This action can run on every host that has the appropriate Java version and where the Source Siebel server is reachable. Exports a filtered set of Siebel workflows into XML files in a target folder. = Outputs = * Return code is 0 if success * Return code is 4 if not success. = Rollback = (none) = Logging = (none) = Example = (none)

SCRIPT.MSCRI:
:INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SIEBEL.PRV.INCLUDE.ATTACH_RESOURCES @echo off :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_HEADER_PARAM_VALIDATION
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Server Url" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_SIEBEL_SERVER_URL#
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Port" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_SIEBEL_PORT#
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Siebel Enterprise" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_SIEBEL_ENTERPRISE#
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Siebel Username" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_SIEBEL_USER#
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Object Manager" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_SIEBEL_OBJECT_MANAGER#
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Export Directory" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_SIEBEL_EXPORT_DIR#
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Flow Search Specification" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_SIEBEL_FLOWSEARCH_SPEC#
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Repository" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_SIEBEL_REPOSITORY#
set /a errors=0 > nul
:SET &UC4RB_CHECKME# = &UC4RB_SIEBEL_EXPORT_DIR# :INCLUDE PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.CHECK_WINDOWS_CONSOLE_FILE_EXISTS if %ISFILE% == 1 ( : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Export directory" : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_ERROR# = "&UC4RB_SIEBEL_EXPORT_DIR# is a file" : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_ERROR_PARAMETER set /a errors=1 > nul )
if %EXIST% == 0 ( md "&UC4RB_SIEBEL_EXPORT_DIR#" ) :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.CHECK_RETURN_CODE_WINDOWS_CONSOLE
if %errors% GTR 0 ( set retcode=%errors% goto :retcode ) !Begin my code :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_HEADER_EXECUTION
:SET &UC4RB_SIEBEL_EXPORT_DIR_TMP# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_SIEBEL_EXPORT_DIR#, "\temp_&$RUNID#")
md "&UC4RB_SIEBEL_EXPORT_DIR_TMP#" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.CHECK_RETURN_CODE_WINDOWS_CONSOLE :PUB &UC4RB_SIEBEL_EXPORT_DIR_TMP#,,TOP
:INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SIEBEL.PRV.INCLUDE.SET_SIEBEL_PROPERTIES :SET &COMMAND# = "java -jar ""&SIEBEL_TOOL_JAR#"" siebel ExportWorkflow" :SET &COMMAND# = STR_CAT(&COMMAND#, ' -h &UC4RB_SIEBEL_SERVER_URL# -pt &UC4RB_SIEBEL_PORT#') :SET &COMMAND# = STR_CAT(&COMMAND#, ' -su &UC4RB_SIEBEL_USER# -sp &UC4RB_SIEBEL_PASSWORD#') :SET &COMMAND# = STR_CAT(&COMMAND#, ' -e "&UC4RB_SIEBEL_ENTERPRISE#" -om &UC4RB_SIEBEL_OBJECT_MANAGER#') :SET &COMMAND# = STR_CAT(&COMMAND#, ' -ex "&UC4RB_SIEBEL_EXPORT_DIR_TMP#"') :SET &UC4RB_SIEBEL_FLOWSEARCH_TMP# = STR_SUB(&UC4RB_SIEBEL_FLOWSEARCH_SPEC#,'"','\"') :SET &COMMAND# = STR_CAT(&COMMAND#, ' -s "&UC4RB_SIEBEL_FLOWSEARCH_TMP#"') :SET &COMMAND# = STR_CAT(&COMMAND#, ' -rp "&UC4RB_SIEBEL_REPOSITORY#"') :SET &COMMAND# = STR_CAT(&COMMAND#, "&SIEBEL_PROPERTIES#")
:INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.CHANGE_FOLDER_TO_AGENT_BIN &COMMAND# :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.CHECK_RETURN_CODE_WINDOWS_CONSOLE !End my code

POST_SCRIPT.OSCRI:
:SET &UC4RB_OUT_NUM_EXPORTED_WF# = "0"
:SET &hnd# = PREP_PROCESS_REPORT(,, "REP", "*Number of workflow exported: *") :PROCESS &hnd# : SET &line# = GET_PROCESS_LINE(&hnd#,1) : SET &LENGTH# = STR_FIND(&line#, "exported: ") : SET &LENGTH# = &LENGTH# + 10 : SET &UC4RB_OUT_NUM_EXPORTED_WF# = STR_CUT(&line#, &LENGTH#) :ENDPROCESS
:PUB &UC4RB_OUT_NUM_EXPORTED_WF#,,TOP

SCRIPT.MSCRI:
:INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SIEBEL.PRV.INCLUDE.ATTACH_RESOURCES :DEFINE &STRING_ARR#, string, 30
:INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_HEADER_PARAM_VALIDATION
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Server Url" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_SIEBEL_SERVER_URL#
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Port" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_SIEBEL_PORT#
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Siebel Enterprise" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_SIEBEL_ENTERPRISE#
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Siebel Username" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_SIEBEL_USER#
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Object Manager" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_SIEBEL_OBJECT_MANAGER#
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Export Directory" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_SIEBEL_EXPORT_DIR#
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Flow Search Specification" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_SIEBEL_FLOWSEARCH_SPEC#
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Repository" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_SIEBEL_REPOSITORY#
! apply sudo :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.SUDOERS_HEADER errors=0
:SET &UC4RB_CHECKME# = &UC4RB_SIEBEL_EXPORT_DIR# :INCLUDE PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.CHECK_UNIX_SHELL_FILE_EXISTS if [ $ISFILE -eq 1 ] then : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Export directory" : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_ERROR# = "&UC4RB_SIEBEL_EXPORT_DIR# is a file" : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_ERROR_PARAMETER errors=1 fi
if [ $EXIST -eq 0 ] then mkdir -p "&UC4RB_SIEBEL_EXPORT_DIR#" fi :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.CHECK_RETURN_CODE_UNIX_SHELL
if [ $errors -ne 0 ] then exit $errors fi
:SET &UC4RB_SIEBEL_EXPORT_DIR_TMP# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_SIEBEL_EXPORT_DIR#, "/temp_&$RUNID#") :PUB &UC4RB_SIEBEL_EXPORT_DIR_TMP#,,TOP
:INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SIEBEL.PRV.INCLUDE.SET_SIEBEL_PROPERTIES :SET &COMMAND# = "java -jar ""&SIEBEL_TOOL_JAR#"" siebel ExportWorkflow" :SET &COMMAND# = STR_CAT(&COMMAND#, ' -h &UC4RB_SIEBEL_SERVER_URL# -pt &UC4RB_SIEBEL_PORT#') :SET &COMMAND# = STR_CAT(&COMMAND#, ' -su &UC4RB_SIEBEL_USER# -sp &UC4RB_SIEBEL_PASSWORD#') :SET &COMMAND# = STR_CAT(&COMMAND#, ' -e "&UC4RB_SIEBEL_ENTERPRISE#" -om &UC4RB_SIEBEL_OBJECT_MANAGER#') :SET &COMMAND# = STR_CAT(&COMMAND#, ' -ex "&UC4RB_SIEBEL_EXPORT_DIR_TMP#"') :SET &UC4RB_SIEBEL_FLOWSEARCH_TMP# = STR_SUB(&UC4RB_SIEBEL_FLOWSEARCH_SPEC#,'"','\"') :SET &COMMAND# = STR_CAT(&COMMAND#, ' -s "&UC4RB_SIEBEL_FLOWSEARCH_TMP#"') :SET &COMMAND# = STR_CAT(&COMMAND#, ' -rp "&UC4RB_SIEBEL_REPOSITORY#"') :SET &COMMAND# = STR_CAT(&COMMAND#, "&SIEBEL_PROPERTIES#") !Begin my code :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_HEADER_EXECUTION
mkdir -p "&UC4RB_SIEBEL_EXPORT_DIR_TMP#" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.CHECK_RETURN_CODE_UNIX_SHELL :PUB &UC4RB_SIEBEL_EXPORT_DIR_TMP#,,TOP :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.CHANGE_FOLDER_TO_AGENT_BIN &COMMAND# :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.CHECK_RETURN_CODE_UNIX_SHELL ! apply sudo :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.SUDOERS_FOOTER !End my code

POST_SCRIPT.OSCRI:
:SET &UC4RB_OUT_NUM_EXPORTED_WF# = "0"
:SET &hnd# = PREP_PROCESS_REPORT(,, "REP", "*Number of workflow exported: *") :PROCESS &hnd# : SET &line# = GET_PROCESS_LINE(&hnd#,1) : SET &LENGTH# = STR_FIND(&line#, "exported: ") : SET &LENGTH# = &LENGTH# + 10 : SET &UC4RB_OUT_NUM_EXPORTED_WF# = STR_CUT(&line#, &LENGTH#) :ENDPROCESS
:PUB &UC4RB_OUT_NUM_EXPORTED_WF#,,TOP

PROMPTSETDATA.DATAEDITOR: <PRPTS ontop="1"><PRPTBOX><UC4RB_SIEBEL_EXPORT_DIRs.00 haslist="0" msgnr="-1" msginsert="" altview="0" promptname="UC4RB_SIEBEL_EXPORT_DIR#" ReadFromTable="OPSE"></UC4RB_SIEBEL_EXPORT_DIRs.00><UC4RB_SIEBEL_FLOWSEARCH_SPECs.00 haslist="0" msgnr="-1" msginsert="" altview="0" promptname="UC4RB_SIEBEL_FLOWSEARCH_SPEC#" ReadFromTable="OPSE"></UC4RB_SIEBEL_FLOWSEARCH_SPECs.00><UC4RB_SIEBEL_REPOSITORYs.00 haslist="0" msgnr="-1" msginsert="" altview="0" promptname="UC4RB_SIEBEL_REPOSITORY#" ReadFromTable="OPSE">&ENV#?SIEBEL_REPOSITORY_NAME</UC4RB_SIEBEL_REPOSITORYs.00><UC4RB_SIEBEL_USERs.00 haslist="0" msgnr="-1" msginsert="" altview="0" promptname="UC4RB_SIEBEL_USER#" ReadFromTable="OPSE"></UC4RB_SIEBEL_USERs.00><UC4RB_SIEBEL_PASSWORDs.00 haslist="0" msgnr="-1" msginsert="" altview="0" promptname="UC4RB_SIEBEL_PASSWORD#" ReadFromTable="OPSE">--10</UC4RB_SIEBEL_PASSWORDs.00><UC4RB_SIEBEL_OBJECT_MANAGERs.00 haslist="0" msgnr="-1" msginsert="" altview="0" promptname="UC4RB_SIEBEL_OBJECT_MANAGER#" ReadFromTable="OPSE">UCMObjMgr_enu</UC4RB_SIEBEL_OBJECT_MANAGERs.00><UC4RB_SIEBEL_SERVER_URLs.00 haslist="0" msgnr="-1" msginsert="" altview="0" promptname="UC4RB_SIEBEL_SERVER_URL#" ReadFromTable="OPSE">&ENV#?SIEBEL_URL</UC4RB_SIEBEL_SERVER_URLs.00><UC4RB_SIEBEL_PORTs.00 haslist="0" msgnr="-1" msginsert="" altview="0" promptname="UC4RB_SIEBEL_PORT#" ReadFromTable="OPSE">2321</UC4RB_SIEBEL_PORTs.00><UC4RB_SIEBEL_ENTERPRISEs.00 haslist="0" msgnr="-1" msginsert="" altview="0" promptname="UC4RB_SIEBEL_ENTERPRISE#" ReadFromTable="OPSE">&ENV#?SIEBEL_ENTRPR_SERVER</UC4RB_SIEBEL_ENTERPRISEs.00></PRPTBOX></PRPTS>

DOCU_Docu.DOC: = RB name = PCK.AUTOMIC_SIEBEL.PUB.ACTION.FULL_COMPILE = General description = Compile all the object definitions and scripts that are defined in Siebel Tools and put them into a SRF file. = Inputs = * Siebel Tools Directory: The installation or root directory for Siebel Tools * Username: username of siebel administrator * Password: password of siebel administrator * Repository name: name of siebel repository * Siebel repository directory: directory is specified for the SRF file * Siebel repository file name: SRF file name * Siebel config: config file name of siebel tools. * Siebel Datasource: datasource that siebel connects to. * Siebel languages: Comma sepperated list of the installed languages = Behavior = (see general description) = Outputs = * Return code is 0 if success, a SFR file is created. * Return code is 1 if not success. * Return code is 2 if '''Siebel repository directory''' is file. = Rollback = (none) = Logging = (none) = Example = Siebel Tools Directory: D:\sba81\tools Username: sadmin Password: sadmin Repository name: Siebel Repository Siebel repository directory: c:\adm\ Siebel repository file name: SIEBEL_SIA.srf Siebel config: tools.cfg Siebel Datasource: ServerDataSrc Siebel languages: ENU

SCRIPT.MSCRI:
:INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SIEBEL.PRV.INCLUDE.ATTACH_RESOURCES :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.POWERSHELL_UTILITY :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_HEADER_PARAM_VALIDATION
:DEFINE &STRING_ARR#, string, 30 :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.NORMALIZE_PATH "UC4RB_CONVERTED_STRING" = "UC4RB_SIEBEL_TOOLS_ROOT" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.NORMALIZE_PATH "UC4RB_CONVERTED_STRING" = "UC4RB_SIEBEL_SRF_DIR"
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Siebel Tools Directory" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_SIEBEL_TOOLS_ROOT#
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Username" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_SIEBEL_USER#
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Password" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_SIEBEL_PASSWORD#
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Repository name" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_SIEBEL_REPOSITORY_NAME#
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Siebel repository directory" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_SIEBEL_SRF_DIR#
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Siebel repository file name" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_SIEBEL_SRF_NAME#
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Siebel config" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_SIEBEL_CONFIG_NAME#
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Siebel Datasource" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_SIEBEL_CFG_DATA_SOURCE#
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Siebel languages" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_SIEBEL_LANGUAGES#
! set /a errors=0 > nul ! if %errors% GTR 0 ( ! set retcode=%errors% ! goto :retcode ! ) !
function isFileLocked() { param($fileName) $oFile = New-Object System.IO.FileInfo $fileName try { $oStream = $oFile.Open([System.IO.FileMode]::Open, [System.IO.FileAccess]::ReadWrite, [System.IO.FileShare]::None) if ($oStream) { $oStream.Close() } return $false } catch { # file is locked by a process. return $true } }
function checkErrorInSRF() { param($fileName) $isrunning=1 while ( $isrunning -eq $true ) { if (!(Test-Path -Path "$fileName" )) { echo "The file $fileName doesn't exist" exit(1) break }
if ( isFileLocked "$fileName" ) { echo "Wait in 5 minutes" Start-Sleep -s 300 } else { $file=$( Get-ChildItem "$fileName" -ErrorAction "SilentlyContinue" | Where-Object {$_.Length -gt 30MB} ) if ( !$file ) { echo "file $fileName < 30MB" exit 1; } else { break } } } }
:INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_HEADER_EXECUTION
cd "&UC4RB_SIEBEL_TOOLS_ROOT#\bin"
:DEFINE &ARRAY#, string, 20 :FILL &ARRAY#[] = STR_SPLIT(&UC4RB_SIEBEL_LANGUAGES#, ",") :SET &VAR# = 1 :SET &LEN# = LENGTH(&ARRAY#[], SIZE)
:SET &UC4RB_ENCRYPTED_PASSWORD_TMP#="&UC4RB_SIEBEL_PASSWORD#" :INCLUDE PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.DECRYPT_PASSWORD
:WHILE &VAR# LE &LEN# : SET &UC4RB_SIEBEL_LANGUAGE# = &ARRAY#[&VAR#] if(!(Test-Path -Path "&UC4RB_SIEBEL_SRF_DIR#\&UC4RB_SIEBEL_LANGUAGE#" )){ New-Item -ItemType directory -Path "&UC4RB_SIEBEL_SRF_DIR#\&UC4RB_SIEBEL_LANGUAGE#" } : JCL_CONCAT_CHAR "?" & .\siebdev.exe /c "&UC4RB_SIEBEL_CONFIG_NAME#" /d "&UC4RB_SIEBEL_CFG_DATA_SOURCE#" /u "&UC4RB_SIEBEL_USER#" /p "$UC4_DECRYPTED_PWD" ? /tl &UC4RB_SIEBEL_LANGUAGE# /bc "&UC4RB_SIEBEL_REPOSITORY_NAME#" "&UC4RB_SIEBEL_SRF_DIR#\&UC4RB_SIEBEL_LANGUAGE#\&UC4RB_SIEBEL_SRF_NAME#" : JCL_CONCAT_CHAR : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.CHECK_RETURN_CODE_WINDOWS_POWERSHELL : SET &VAR# = &VAR# + 1 :ENDWHILE
! Wait 1 minute before do other check Start-Sleep -s 30
:SET &VAR# = 1 :WHILE &VAR# LE &LEN# : SET &UC4RB_SIEBEL_LANGUAGE# = &ARRAY#[&VAR#] checkErrorInSRF "&UC4RB_SIEBEL_SRF_DIR#\&UC4RB_SIEBEL_LANGUAGE#\&UC4RB_SIEBEL_SRF_NAME#" : SET &VAR# = &VAR# + 1 :ENDWHILE
:INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.CHECK_RETURN_CODE_WINDOWS_POWERSHELL __uc_return( 0 )

POST_SCRIPT.OSCRI: :SET &UC4RB_OUT_FULL_COMPILE_SRF_DIR# = &UC4RB_SIEBEL_SRF_DIR# :PUBLISH &UC4RB_OUT_FULL_COMPILE_SRF_DIR#, , "TOP"

PROMPTSETDATA.DATAEDITOR: <PRPTS ontop="1"><PRPTBOX><UC4RB_SIEBEL_TOOLS_ROOTs.00 haslist="0" msgnr="-1" msginsert="" altview="0" promptname="UC4RB_SIEBEL_TOOLS_ROOT#" ReadFromTable="OPSE">&ENV#?SIEBEL_TOOLS_ROOT</UC4RB_SIEBEL_TOOLS_ROOTs.00><UC4RB_SIEBEL_USERs.00 haslist="0" msgnr="-1" msginsert="" altview="0" promptname="UC4RB_SIEBEL_USER#" ReadFromTable="OPSE"></UC4RB_SIEBEL_USERs.00><UC4RB_SIEBEL_PASSWORDs.00 haslist="0" msgnr="-1" msginsert="" altview="0" promptname="UC4RB_SIEBEL_PASSWORD#" ReadFromTable="OPSE">--10</UC4RB_SIEBEL_PASSWORDs.00><UC4RB_SIEBEL_REPOSITORY_NAMEs.00 haslist="0" msgnr="-1" msginsert="" altview="0" promptname="UC4RB_SIEBEL_REPOSITORY_NAME#" ReadFromTable="OPSE">&ENV#?SIEBEL_REPOSITORY_NAME</UC4RB_SIEBEL_REPOSITORY_NAMEs.00><UC4RB_SIEBEL_SRF_DIRs.00 haslist="0" msgnr="-1" msginsert="" altview="0" promptname="UC4RB_SIEBEL_SRF_DIR#" ReadFromTable="OPSE"></UC4RB_SIEBEL_SRF_DIRs.00><UC4RB_SIEBEL_SRF_NAMEs.00 haslist="0" msgnr="-1" msginsert="" altview="0" promptname="UC4RB_SIEBEL_SRF_NAME#" ReadFromTable="OPSE">&ENV#?SIEBEL_SRF_FILE</UC4RB_SIEBEL_SRF_NAMEs.00><UC4RB_SIEBEL_CONFIG_NAMEs.00 haslist="0" msgnr="-1" msginsert="" altview="0" promptname="UC4RB_SIEBEL_CONFIG_NAME#" ReadFromTable="OPSE">&ENV#?SIEBEL_TOOLS_CONFIG_FILE</UC4RB_SIEBEL_CONFIG_NAMEs.00><UC4RB_SIEBEL_CFG_DATA_SOURCEs.00 haslist="0" msgnr="-1" msginsert="" altview="0" promptname="UC4RB_SIEBEL_CFG_DATA_SOURCE#" ReadFromTable="OPSE">&ENV#?SIEBEL_CFG_DATA_SOURCE</UC4RB_SIEBEL_CFG_DATA_SOURCEs.00><UC4RB_SIEBEL_LANGUAGESs.00 haslist="0" msgnr="-1" msginsert="" altview="0" promptname="UC4RB_SIEBEL_LANGUAGES#" ReadFromTable="OPSE">&ENV#?SIEBEL_LANGUAGES</UC4RB_SIEBEL_LANGUAGESs.00></PRPTBOX></PRPTS>

DOCU_Docu.DOC: = RB name = PCK.AUTOMIC_SIEBEL.PUB.ACTION.GENERATE_BROWSER_SCRIPT = General description = Generate browser scripts for every installed languages. = Inputs = * Destination directory: Path where the browser scripts should be exported to. * Siebel client config: The name of the config file of the Siebel client. * Siebel client directory: Path to the Siebel Client which contain generate browser script tool * Siebel languages: Comma sepperated list of the installed languages = Behavior = (see general description) = Outputs = * Return code is 0 if success. * Return code is 1 if not success. = Rollback = (none) = Logging = (none) = Example = Destination directory: C:\export\whatever\ Siebel client config: uagent.cfg Siebel client directory: D:\sba81\Client Siebel languages: ENU, NLD, HEB

SCRIPT.MSCRI:
:INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SIEBEL.PRV.INCLUDE.ATTACH_RESOURCES @echo off setlocal enabledelayedexpansion
:INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_HEADER_PARAM_VALIDATION
:DEFINE &STRING_ARR#, string, 30 :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.NORMALIZE_PATH "UC4RB_CONVERTED_STRING" = "UC4RB_SIEBEL_SCRIPT_OUTPUT_DIR" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.NORMALIZE_PATH "UC4RB_CONVERTED_STRING" = "UC4RB_SIEBEL_CLIENT_ROOT"
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Destination directory" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_SIEBEL_SCRIPT_OUTPUT_DIR# :SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Siebel client config" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_SIEBEL_SCRIPT_CFG_FILE# :SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Siebel client directory" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_SIEBEL_CLIENT_ROOT# :SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Siebel languages" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_SIEBEL_LANGUAGES#
set /a errors=0 > nul
! Check if Siebel Client directory exists :SET &UC4RB_CHECKME# = &UC4RB_SIEBEL_CLIENT_ROOT# :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.CHECK_WINDOWS_CONSOLE_FILE_EXISTS
if %EXIST% == 0 ( : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Siebel client directory" : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_ERROR# = "Directory &UC4RB_SIEBEL_CLIENT_ROOT# does not exist" : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_ERROR_PARAMETER set /a errors=1 > nul ) else ( if %ISDIR% == 0 ( : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Siebel client directory" : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_ERROR# = "&UC4RB_SIEBEL_CLIENT_ROOT# exists but is not a directory " : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_ERROR_PARAMETER set /a errors=2 > nul ) )
:DEFINE &ARRAY#, string, 20 :FILL &ARRAY#[] = STR_SPLIT(&UC4RB_SIEBEL_LANGUAGES#, ",") :SET &VAR# = 1 :SET &LEN# = LENGTH(&ARRAY#[], SIZE) :IF &LEN# LT 1 : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Siebel languages" : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_ERROR# = "Installed languages parameter &UC4RB_SIEBEL_LANGUAGES# is invalid" : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_ERROR_PARAMETER set /a errors=1 > nul :ENDIF :WHILE &VAR# LE &LEN# : SET &UC4RB_SIEBEL_LANGUAGE# = &ARRAY#[&VAR#] ! Check if Siebel Client config file exists : SET &UC4RB_CHECKME# = &UC4RB_SIEBEL_CLIENT_ROOT#\BIN\&UC4RB_SIEBEL_LANGUAGE#\&UC4RB_SIEBEL_SCRIPT_CFG_FILE# : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.CHECK_WINDOWS_CONSOLE_FILE_EXISTS
if %EXIST% == 0 ( : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Siebel Client config file" : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_ERROR# = "Config file &UC4RB_CHECKME# does not exist" : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_ERROR_PARAMETER set /a errors=1 > nul ) else ( if %ISFILE% == 0 ( : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Siebel Client config file" : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_ERROR# = "&UC4RB_CHECKME# exists but is not a file " : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_ERROR_PARAMETER set /a errors=2 > nul ) ) : SET &VAR# = &VAR# + 1 :ENDWHILE
! stop execution if validation errors occurred if %errors% GTR 0 ( set retcode=%errors% goto :retcode )
:INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_HEADER_EXECUTION
cd /d "&UC4RB_SIEBEL_CLIENT_ROOT#\BIN" :FILL &ARRAY#[] = STR_SPLIT(&UC4RB_SIEBEL_LANGUAGES#, ",") :SET &VAR# = 1 :SET &LEN# = LENGTH(&ARRAY#[], SIZE)
:WHILE &VAR# LE &LEN# : SET &UC4RB_SIEBEL_LANGUAGE# = &ARRAY#[&VAR#]
if exist "&UC4RB_SIEBEL_SCRIPT_OUTPUT_DIR#\&UC4RB_SIEBEL_LANGUAGE#" ( ! delete target directory if exist rd /s /q "&UC4RB_SIEBEL_SCRIPT_OUTPUT_DIR#\&UC4RB_SIEBEL_LANGUAGE#" : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.CHECK_RETURN_CODE_WINDOWS_CONSOLE )
! create directory for target language mkdir "&UC4RB_SIEBEL_SCRIPT_OUTPUT_DIR#\&UC4RB_SIEBEL_LANGUAGE#" : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.CHECK_RETURN_CODE_WINDOWS_CONSOLE
: SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_INFO# = "Generating browser script for language &UC4RB_SIEBEL_LANGUAGE# into &UC4RB_SIEBEL_SCRIPT_OUTPUT_DIR#\&UC4RB_SIEBEL_LANGUAGE#..." : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_INFO
: SET &UC4RB_SIEBEL_OUTPUT_FILE# = &UC4RB_SIEBEL_SCRIPT_OUTPUT_DIR#\&UC4RB_SIEBEL_LANGUAGE#\log.txt : JCL_CONCAT_CHAR "?" genbscript.exe "&UC4RB_SIEBEL_CLIENT_ROOT#\BIN\&UC4RB_SIEBEL_LANGUAGE#\&UC4RB_SIEBEL_SCRIPT_CFG_FILE#" ? "&UC4RB_SIEBEL_SCRIPT_OUTPUT_DIR#\&UC4RB_SIEBEL_LANGUAGE#" >> "&UC4RB_SIEBEL_OUTPUT_FILE#" : JCL_CONCAT_CHAR : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.CHECK_RETURN_CODE_WINDOWS_CONSOLE : SET &VAR# = &VAR# + 1 :ENDWHILE : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_INFO# = "Generated browser script successfully!" : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_INFO

POST_SCRIPT.OSCRI: :SET &UC4RB_OUT_BSCRIPT_DIR# = &UC4RB_SIEBEL_SCRIPT_OUTPUT_DIR# :PUBLISH &UC4RB_OUT_BSCRIPT_DIR#, , "TOP"

DOCU_Docu.DOC: = RB name = PCK.AUTOMIC_SIEBEL.PUB.ACTION.IMPORT_AUDIT_TRAILS = General description = This runbook import business component Audit Trail Buscomp and it's children (including: Responsibility, Audit Trail Child Buscomp and Position) to Siebel using the java api. Imported data is read from a structured XML format file which is output of EXPORT_AUDIT_TRAILS runbook = Inputs = * Siebel Username: The Siebel user to connect. * Siebel Password: The Password to connect with the Siebel user. * Server Url: siebel Server host * Siebel Enterprise: Enterprise that the databean should connect to. * Port: port Siebel is listening on. * Object Manager: The Objectmanagers to connect with the Databean to check if Siebel is running. (No Spaces!!) * Directory: The directory from which the tool reads the file * File name: Name of the file that contains the business objects = Behavior = (see general description) = Outputs = * Return code is 0 if success * Return code is 4 if not success. = Rollback = (none) = Logging = (none) = Example = (none)

SCRIPT.MSCRI: :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SIEBEL.PRV.INCLUDE.SET_SIEBEL_PROPERTIES :JCL_CONCAT_CHAR "?" java -jar "&$AGENT_RESOURCES_CLIENT#siebeltool.jar" siebel ImportBusinessObject2 ? -h &UC4RB_SIEBEL_SERVER_URL# ? -pt &UC4RB_SIEBEL_PORT# ? -e &UC4RB_SIEBEL_ENTERPRISE# ? -su "&UC4RB_SIEBEL_USER#" ? -sp "&UC4RB_SIEBEL_PASSWORD#" ? -om "&UC4RB_SIEBEL_OBJECT_MANAGER#" ? -i "&SIEBEL_IMPORT_DIR#/&SIEBEL_IMPORT_FILE#" ? -ll "&UC4_LOGLEVEL#" &SIEBEL_PROPERTIES# :JCL_CONCAT_CHAR

:INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SIEBEL.PRV.INCLUDE.ATTACH_RESOURCES @echo off setlocal enabledelayedexpansion :DEFINE &STRING_ARR#, string, 30 :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_HEADER_PARAM_VALIDATION
:INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.NORMALIZE_PATH "UC4RB_CONVERTED_STRING" = "SIEBEL_IMPORT_DIR"
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Siebel Server Url" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_SIEBEL_SERVER_URL#
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Siebel Port" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_SIEBEL_PORT#
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Siebel Enterprise" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_SIEBEL_ENTERPRISE#
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Siebel Username" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_SIEBEL_USER#
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Siebel Password" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_SIEBEL_PASSWORD#
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Object Manager" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_SIEBEL_OBJECT_MANAGER#
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Directory" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &SIEBEL_IMPORT_DIR#
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "File name" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &SIEBEL_IMPORT_FILE#
set /a errors=0 > nul ! Check if xml input exists :SET &UC4RB_CHECKME# = "&SIEBEL_IMPORT_DIR#\&SIEBEL_IMPORT_FILE#" :INCLUDE PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.CHECK_WINDOWS_CONSOLE_FILE_EXISTS
if %ISFILE% == 0 ( : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Import file path" : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_ERROR# = "File &SIEBEL_IMPORT_DIR#\&SIEBEL_IMPORT_FILE# does not exist" : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_ERROR_PARAMETER set /a errors=1 > nul ) if %errors% GTR 0 ( set retcode=%errors% goto :retcode ) :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_HEADER_EXECUTION !Begin my code :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.CHANGE_FOLDER_TO_AGENT_BIN :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SIEBEL.PRV.INCLUDE.IMPORT_AUDIT_TRAILS :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.CHECK_RETURN_CODE_WINDOWS_CONSOLE !End my code

POST_SCRIPT.OSCRI: :SET &output_entry# = PREP_PROCESS_REPORT(, , "REP", "*Number of records imported*") :PROCESS &output_entry# : SET &output_line# = GET_PROCESS_LINE(&output_entry#, 1) : SET &POS# = STR_FIND_REVERSE(&output_line#, ":") : SET &POS# = &POS# + 1 : SET &OUT_NUM_IMPORTED_OBJS# = SUBSTR(&output_line#, &POS#) : PUBLISH &OUT_NUM_IMPORTED_OBJS#, , 'WORKFLOW' :ENDPROCESS :CLOSE_PROCESS &output_entry#

SCRIPT.MSCRI:
:INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SIEBEL.PRV.INCLUDE.ATTACH_RESOURCES :DEFINE &STRING_ARR#, string, 30
:INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_HEADER_PARAM_VALIDATION
:INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.NORMALIZE_PATH "UC4RB_CONVERTED_STRING" = "SIEBEL_IMPORT_DIR"
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Siebel Server Url" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_SIEBEL_SERVER_URL#
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Siebel Port" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_SIEBEL_PORT#
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Siebel Enterprise" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_SIEBEL_ENTERPRISE#
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Siebel Username" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_SIEBEL_USER#
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Siebel Password" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_SIEBEL_PASSWORD#
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Object Manager" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_SIEBEL_OBJECT_MANAGER#
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Directory" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &SIEBEL_IMPORT_DIR#
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "File name" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &SIEBEL_IMPORT_FILE#
! <Begin of sudo script> :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.SUDOERS_HEADER
errors=0 ! Check if xml input exists :SET &UC4RB_CHECKME# = "&SIEBEL_IMPORT_DIR#/&SIEBEL_IMPORT_FILE#" :INCLUDE PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.CHECK_UNIX_SHELL_FILE_EXISTS if [ "$ISFILE" -eq "0" ]; then : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Import file path" : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_ERROR# = "File &SIEBEL_IMPORT_DIR#/&SIEBEL_IMPORT_FILE# does not exist" : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_ERROR_PARAMETER errors=1 fi
if [ "$errors" -gt 0 ]; then exit $errors; fi
:INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_HEADER_EXECUTION !Begin my code
:INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.CHANGE_FOLDER_TO_AGENT_BIN :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.CHECK_RETURN_CODE_UNIX_SHELL
! Insert java call here :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SIEBEL.PRV.INCLUDE.IMPORT_AUDIT_TRAILS :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.CHECK_RETURN_CODE_UNIX_SHELL
:INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.SUDOERS_FOOTER ! <End of sudo script>
:INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.CHECK_RETURN_CODE_UNIX_SHELL !End my code

POST_SCRIPT.OSCRI: :SET &output_entry# = PREP_PROCESS_REPORT(, , "REP", "*Number of records imported*") :PROCESS &output_entry# : SET &output_line# = GET_PROCESS_LINE(&output_entry#, 1) : SET &POS# = STR_FIND_REVERSE(&output_line#, ":") : SET &POS# = &POS# + 1 : SET &OUT_NUM_IMPORTED_OBJS# = SUBSTR(&output_line#, &POS#) : PUBLISH &OUT_NUM_IMPORTED_OBJS#, , 'WORKFLOW' :ENDPROCESS :CLOSE_PROCESS &output_entry#

DOCU_Docu.DOC: = RB name = PCK.AUTOMIC_SIEBEL.PUB.ACTION.IMPORT_BUSINESS_OBJECT = General description = This generic import function imports business objects from siebel using the java api of siebel and reads the data in a structured format (e.g. XML) from a file. = Inputs = * Siebel Username: The Siebel user to connect. * Siebel Password: The Password to connect with the Siebel user. * Server Url: siebel Server host * Siebel Enterprise: Enterprise that the databean should connect to. * Port: port Siebel is listening on. * Object Manager: The Objectmanagers to connect with the Databean to check if Siebel is running. (No Spaces!!) * Directory: The directory from which the tool reads the file * File name: Name of the file that contains the business objects = Behavior = (see general description) = Outputs = * Return code is 0 if success * Return code is 4 if not success. = Rollback = (none) = Logging = (none) = Example = (none)

SCRIPT.MSCRI: :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SIEBEL.PRV.INCLUDE.SET_SIEBEL_PROPERTIES :SET &TEMP_FILE# = "&SIEBEL_IMPORT_DIR#/&SIEBEL_IMPORT_FILE#" :IF &UC4RB_AGENT_OS# = "WINDOWS" : SET &TEMP_FILE# = "&SIEBEL_IMPORT_DIR#\&SIEBEL_IMPORT_FILE#" :ENDIF :JCL_CONCAT_CHAR "?" java -jar "&SIEBEL_TOOL_JAR#" siebel ImportBusinessObject ? -h &UC4RB_SIEBEL_SERVER_URL# ? -pt &UC4RB_SIEBEL_PORT# ? -e &UC4RB_SIEBEL_ENTERPRISE# ? -su "&UC4RB_SIEBEL_USER#" ? -sp "&UC4RB_SIEBEL_PASSWORD#" ? -om "&UC4RB_SIEBEL_OBJECT_MANAGER#" ? -i "&TEMP_FILE#" ? &SIEBEL_PROPERTIES# :JCL_CONCAT_CHAR

:DEFINE &STRING_ARR#, string, 30 :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SIEBEL.PRV.INCLUDE.ATTACH_RESOURCES
:INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_HEADER_PARAM_VALIDATION
:INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.NORMALIZE_PATH "UC4RB_CONVERTED_STRING" = "SIEBEL_IMPORT_DIR"
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Siebel Server Url" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_SIEBEL_SERVER_URL#
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Siebel Port" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_SIEBEL_PORT#
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Siebel Enterprise" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_SIEBEL_ENTERPRISE#
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Siebel Username" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_SIEBEL_USER#
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Siebel Password" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_SIEBEL_PASSWORD#
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Object Manager" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_SIEBEL_OBJECT_MANAGER#
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Directory" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &SIEBEL_IMPORT_DIR#
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "File name" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &SIEBEL_IMPORT_FILE#
! <Begin of sudo script> :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.SUDOERS_HEADER
errors=0 ! Check if xml input exists :SET &UC4RB_CHECKME# = "&SIEBEL_IMPORT_DIR#/&SIEBEL_IMPORT_FILE#" :INCLUDE PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.CHECK_UNIX_SHELL_FILE_EXISTS if [ "$ISFILE" -eq "0" ]; then : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Import file path" : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_ERROR# = "File &SIEBEL_IMPORT_DIR#/&SIEBEL_IMPORT_FILE# does not exist" : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_ERROR_PARAMETER errors=1 fi
if [ "$errors" -gt 0 ]; then exit $errors; fi
:INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_HEADER_EXECUTION !Begin my code
:INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.CHANGE_FOLDER_TO_AGENT_BIN :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.CHECK_RETURN_CODE_UNIX_SHELL
! Insert java call here :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SIEBEL.PRV.INCLUDE.IMPORT_BUSINESS_OBJECT :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.CHECK_RETURN_CODE_UNIX_SHELL
:INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.SUDOERS_FOOTER ! <End of sudo script>
:INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.CHECK_RETURN_CODE_UNIX_SHELL !End my code

POST_SCRIPT.OSCRI: :SET &output_entry# = PREP_PROCESS_REPORT(, , "REP", "*Number of records imported*") :PROCESS &output_entry# : SET &output_line# = GET_PROCESS_LINE(&output_entry#, 1) : SET &POS# = STR_FIND_REVERSE(&output_line#, ":") : SET &POS# = &POS# + 1 : SET &OUT_NUM_IMPORTED_OBJS# = SUBSTR(&output_line#, &POS#) : PUBLISH &OUT_NUM_IMPORTED_OBJS#, , 'WORKFLOW' :ENDPROCESS :CLOSE_PROCESS &output_entry#

:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Siebel Password" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_SIEBEL_PASSWORD#
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Object Manager" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_SIEBEL_OBJECT_MANAGER#
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Directory" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &SIEBEL_IMPORT_DIR#

set /a errors=0 > nul ! Check if xml input exists :SET &UC4RB_CHECKME# = "&SIEBEL_IMPORT_DIR#\&SIEBEL_IMPORT_FILE#" :INCLUDE PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.CHECK_WINDOWS_CONSOLE_FILE_EXISTS
if %ISFILE% == 0 ( : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Import file path" : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_ERROR# = "File &SIEBEL_IMPORT_DIR#\&SIEBEL_IMPORT_FILE# does not exist" : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_ERROR_PARAMETER set /a errors=1 > nul ) if %errors% GTR 0 ( set retcode=%errors% goto :retcode ) :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_HEADER_EXECUTION !Begin my code :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.CHANGE_FOLDER_TO_AGENT_BIN :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SIEBEL.PRV.INCLUDE.IMPORT_BUSINESS_OBJECT :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.CHECK_RETURN_CODE_WINDOWS_CONSOLE !End my code

DOCU_Docu.DOC: = RB name = PCK.AUTOMIC_SIEBEL.PUB.ACTION.IMPORT_EAI_XML = General description = Imports an EAI XML File. . = Inputs = * Siebel Server Url: Siebel Server host * Siebel Port: port Siebel is listening on. * Siebel Enterprise: Enterprise that the databean should connect to. * Object Manager: The Objectmanagers to connect with the Databean to check if Siebel is running. (No Spaces!!) * Siebel Username: The Siebel user to connect. * Siebel Password: The Password to connect with the Siebel user. * Input Directory: Namespace of the web services you want to export. * Input Filename: Name of the web service you want to export. * Web Server File: The file to be exported. * Parameter of Number of Imported Objects: The output parameter to hold the number of imported objects. = Behavior = (see general description) = Outputs = * Return code is 0 if success, a SFR file is created. * Return code is 4 if not success. = Rollback = (none) = Logging = (none) = Example = (none)

SCRIPT.MSCRI:
:INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SIEBEL.PRV.INCLUDE.ATTACH_RESOURCES :DEFINE &STRING_ARR#, string, 30 :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_HEADER_PARAM_VALIDATION
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Siebel Server Url" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_SIEBEL_SERVER_URL#
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Siebel Server Port" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_SIEBEL_PORT#
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Siebel Enterprise" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_SIEBEL_ENTERPRISE#
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Object Manager" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_SIEBEL_OBJECT_MANAGER#
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Siebel Username" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_SIEBEL_USER#
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Input Directory" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &SIEBEL_EAI_XML_FOLDER#
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Input Filename" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &SIEBEL_EAI_XML_FILENAME#
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Parameter of Number of Imported Objects" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &SIEBEL_OUTPUT_NUMBER_PARAM#
:SET &IMPORT_FILE# = "&SIEBEL_EAI_XML_FOLDER#/&SIEBEL_EAI_XML_FILENAME#" :DEFINE &STRING_ARR#,string,30 :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.NORMALIZE_PATH "UC4RB_CONVERTED_STRING" = "IMPORT_FILE" :SET &UC4RB_CHECKME# = "&IMPORT_FILE#" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.CHECK_UNIX_SHELL_FILE_EXISTS
if [ $EXIST -eq 0 ] then : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Input File" : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_ERROR# = "Input file &UC4RB_CHECKME# does not exist" : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_ERROR_PARAMETER errors=2 else if [ $ISFILE -eq 0 ] then : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Input File" : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_ERROR# = "&UC4RB_CHECKME# exists but is not a file " : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_ERROR_PARAMETER errors=4 fi fi
if [ $errors -gt 0 ] then exit $errors fi :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_HEADER_EXECUTION !Begin my code :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.SUDOERS_HEADER :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.CHANGE_FOLDER_TO_AGENT_BIN :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.CHECK_RETURN_CODE_UNIX_SHELL :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SIEBEL.PRV.INCLUDE.SET_SIEBEL_PROPERTIES
:JCL_CONCAT_CHAR "?" java -jar "&SIEBEL_TOOL_JAR#" siebel ImportIntegrationObject ? -h &UC4RB_SIEBEL_SERVER_URL# ? -pt &UC4RB_SIEBEL_PORT# ? -e &UC4RB_SIEBEL_ENTERPRISE# ? -su "&UC4RB_SIEBEL_USER#" ? -sp "&UC4RB_SIEBEL_PASSWORD#" ? -om "&UC4RB_SIEBEL_OBJECT_MANAGER#" ? -f "&IMPORT_FILE#" ? -c "&SIEBEL_OUTPUT_NUMBER_PARAM#" ? -ll "&UC4_LOGLEVEL#" &SIEBEL_PROPERTIES# :JCL_CONCAT_CHAR :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.CHECK_RETURN_CODE_UNIX_SHELL :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.SUDOERS_FOOTER !End my code

POST_SCRIPT.OSCRI: :INCLUDE PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.SCAN_OUTPUT_VARIABLES

SCRIPT.MSCRI:
:INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SIEBEL.PRV.INCLUDE.ATTACH_RESOURCES :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.POWERSHELL_UTILITY :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_HEADER_PARAM_VALIDATION
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Siebel Server Url" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_SIEBEL_SERVER_URL#
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Siebel Server Port" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_SIEBEL_PORT#
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Siebel Enterprise" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_SIEBEL_ENTERPRISE#
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Object Manager" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_SIEBEL_OBJECT_MANAGER#
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Siebel Username" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_SIEBEL_USER#
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Input Directory" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &SIEBEL_EAI_XML_FOLDER#
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Input Filename" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &SIEBEL_EAI_XML_FILENAME#
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Parameter of Number of Imported Objects" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &SIEBEL_OUTPUT_NUMBER_PARAM#
:SET &IMPORT_FILE# = "&SIEBEL_EAI_XML_FOLDER#\&SIEBEL_EAI_XML_FILENAME#" :DEFINE &STRING_ARR#,string,30 :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.NORMALIZE_PATH "UC4RB_CONVERTED_STRING" = "IMPORT_FILE" :SET &UC4RB_CHECKME# = "&IMPORT_FILE#" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.CHECK_WINDOWS_POWERSHELL_FILE_EXISTS
$errors = 0 if ($EXIST -eq 0) { : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Import File" : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_ERROR# = "Import File &IMPORT_FILE# does not exist" : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_ERROR_PARAMETER $errors = 2 } elseif ($ISFILE -eq 0){ : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Import File" : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_ERROR# = "&IMPORT_FILE# exists but is not a file" : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_ERROR_PARAMETER $errors = 4 }
if ($errors -gt 0) { $retcode = $errors __uc_return( $retcode ) } :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_HEADER_EXECUTION !Begin my code :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.CHANGE_FOLDER_TO_AGENT_BIN :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.CHECK_RETURN_CODE_WINDOWS_POWERSHELL :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SIEBEL.PRV.INCLUDE.SET_SIEBEL_PROPERTIES
!Make Here String for optional parameters $outputParam = @' "&SIEBEL_OUTPUT_NUMBER_PARAM#" '@
$loglevel = @' "&UC4_LOGLEVEL#" '@
:JCL_CONCAT_CHAR "?" java -jar "&SIEBEL_TOOL_JAR#" siebel ImportIntegrationObject ? -h &UC4RB_SIEBEL_SERVER_URL# ? -pt &UC4RB_SIEBEL_PORT# ? -e &UC4RB_SIEBEL_ENTERPRISE# ? -su "&UC4RB_SIEBEL_USER#" ? -sp "&UC4RB_SIEBEL_PASSWORD#" ? -om "&UC4RB_SIEBEL_OBJECT_MANAGER#" ? -f "&IMPORT_FILE#" ? -c "$outputParam" ? -ll $loglevel &SIEBEL_PROPERTIES# :JCL_CONCAT_CHAR :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.CHECK_RETURN_CODE_WINDOWS_POWERSHELL __uc_return(0) !End my code

POST_SCRIPT.OSCRI: :INCLUDE PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.SCAN_OUTPUT_VARIABLES

DOCU_Docu.DOC:
= RB name = PCK.AUTOMIC_SIEBEL.PUB.ACTION.IMPORT_LOVS = General description = Imports a set of LOV-s from XML file into Siebel system. = Inputs = * Siebel Server Url: Siebel Server host * Siebel Port: port Siebel is listening on. * Siebel Enterprise: Enterprise that the databean should connect to. * Object Manager: The Objectmanagers to connect with the Databean to check if Siebel is running. (No Spaces!!) * Siebel Username: The Siebel user to connect. * Siebel Password: The Password to connect with the Siebel user. * Siebel Import Directory: The directory from which the tool reads the file. * Siebel Import File: Name of the file that contains the business objects.
= Behavior = This action can run on every host that has the appropriate installed Java version and can connect to the Target Siebel server. = Outputs = * Return code is 0 if success * Return code is 1 if Siebel Import Directory or Siebel Import File does not exist. * Return code is 4 if not success. = Rollback = (none) = Logging = (none) = Example = (none)

DOCU_Docu.DOC:
= RB name = PCK.AUTOMIC_SIEBEL.PUB.ACTION.IMPORT_REPOSITORY
= General description = Import Siebel Repository from repository data (.dat) file
= Inputs = * Unix environment script directory: The directory where the Siebel Environment Script is placed. Required for Unix. * Unix environment script file: The file name of the Environment Script. Required for Unix. * Siebel Server Directory: The installation or root directory for Siebel Server. * Siebel Username: The user name of the Siebel database administrator. * Siebel Password: The password for the Siebel database administrator. * ODBC Data Source: The ODBC system data source name that Siebel server uses to connect to the Siebel database on the RDBMS * Siebel Table Owner: The name of the Siebel table owner account * Repository Name: The name of the Siebel repository * Data file path: The repository data file's name that will be imported * Log file path: The path of the data log file * Siebel language:The language of the Siebel system
= Behavior = (see general description)
= Outputs = * Return code is 0 if success * Return code is 4 if not success.
= Rollback = (none)
= Logging = (none)
= Example = (none)

SCRIPT.MSCRI:
:INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SIEBEL.PRV.INCLUDE.ATTACH_RESOURCES @echo off setlocal enabledelayedexpansion :DEFINE &STRING_ARR#, string, 30
! Normalize file path :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.NORMALIZE_PATH "UC4RB_CONVERTED_STRING" = "UC4RB_SIEBEL_SERVER_ROOT" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.NORMALIZE_PATH "UC4RB_CONVERTED_STRING" = "UC4RB_SIEBEL_DATA_FILE_PATH" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.NORMALIZE_PATH "UC4RB_CONVERTED_STRING" = "UC4RB_SIEBEL_LOG_FILE_PATH"
:INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_HEADER_PARAM_VALIDATION
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Siebel Server Directory" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_SIEBEL_SERVER_ROOT#
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Username" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_SIEBEL_DB_USER#
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Password" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_SIEBEL_DB_PASSWORD#
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "ODBC Data Source" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_SIEBEL_DATA_SOURCE#
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Siebel Table Owner" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_SIEBEL_TABLE_OWNER#
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Repository Name" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_SIEBEL_REPOSITORY_NAME#
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Data file path" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_SIEBEL_DATA_FILE_PATH#
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Log file path" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_SIEBEL_LOG_FILE_PATH#
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Siebel language" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_SIEBEL_LANGUAGE#
set /a errors=0 > nul ! Check if Siebel directory exists :SET &UC4RB_CHECKME# = &UC4RB_SIEBEL_SERVER_ROOT# :INCLUDE PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.CHECK_WINDOWS_CONSOLE_FILE_EXISTS
if %ISDIR% == 0 ( : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Siebel Server Directory" : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_ERROR# = "Directory &UC4RB_SIEBEL_SERVER_ROOT# does not exist" : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_ERROR_PARAMETER set /a errors=1 > nul )
! Check if Siebel import .dat file exists :SET &UC4RB_CHECKME# = &UC4RB_SIEBEL_DATA_FILE_PATH# :INCLUDE PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.CHECK_WINDOWS_CONSOLE_FILE_EXISTS
if %ISFILE% == 0 ( : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Data file path" : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_ERROR# = "File &UC4RB_SIEBEL_DATA_FILE_PATH# does not exist" : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_ERROR_PARAMETER set /a errors=2 > nul )
if %errors% GTR 0 ( set retcode=%errors% goto :retcode )
:INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_HEADER_EXECUTION
!Begin my code ! Create log file dir if it doesn't exist :SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_INFO# = "Create log file directory if it doesn't exist" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_INFO :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.ESCAPE_WINDOWS_CHARS "UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING" = "UC4RB_SIEBEL_LOG_FILE_PATH" :SET &UC4RB_CONVERTED_STRING# = "&UC4RB_SIEBEL_LOG_FILE_PATH#" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.GET_DIRECTORY_FROM_FILE_NAME :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.ENSURE_DIRECTORY_EXISTS_WINDOWS_CONSOLE
cd /d "&UC4RB_SIEBEL_SERVER_ROOT#\BIN" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.CHECK_RETURN_CODE_WINDOWS_CONSOLE :SET &UC4RB_ENCRYPTED_PASSWORD_TMP# = "&UC4RB_SIEBEL_DB_PASSWORD#" :SET &LANG# = "" :IF &UC4RB_SIEBEL_LANGUAGE# NE "" : SET &LANG# = " /G &UC4RB_SIEBEL_LANGUAGE# " :ENDIF :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.DECRYPT_PASSWORD :JCL_CONCAT_CHAR "?" repimexp.exe /A I /U "&UC4RB_SIEBEL_DB_USER#" /P "%UC4_DECRYPTED_PWD%" ? /C "&UC4RB_SIEBEL_DATA_SOURCE#" /D "&UC4RB_SIEBEL_TABLE_OWNER#" /R "&UC4RB_SIEBEL_REPOSITORY_NAME#" ? /F "&UC4RB_SIEBEL_DATA_FILE_PATH#" ? &LANG# /L "&UC4RB_SIEBEL_LOG_FILE_PATH#" :JCL_CONCAT_CHAR
:INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.CHECK_RETURN_CODE_WINDOWS_CONSOLE !End my code

:INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SIEBEL.PRV.INCLUDE.ATTACH_RESOURCES :DEFINE &STRING_ARR#, string, 30
! Normalize file path :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.NORMALIZE_PATH "UC4RB_CONVERTED_STRING" = "UC4RB_SIEBEL_SERVER_ROOT" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.NORMALIZE_PATH "UC4RB_CONVERTED_STRING" = "UC4RB_SIEBEL_DATA_FILE_PATH" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.NORMALIZE_PATH "UC4RB_CONVERTED_STRING" = "UC4RB_SIEBEL_LOG_FILE_PATH"
:INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_HEADER_PARAM_VALIDATION
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Unix environment script directory" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_SIEBEL_ENV_SCRIPT_DIR#
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Unix environment script file" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_SIEBEL_ENV_SCRIPT#
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Siebel Server Directory" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_SIEBEL_SERVER_ROOT#
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Username" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_SIEBEL_DB_USER#
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Password" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_SIEBEL_DB_PASSWORD#
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "ODBC Data Source" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_SIEBEL_DATA_SOURCE#
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Siebel Table Owner" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_SIEBEL_TABLE_OWNER#
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Repository Name" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_SIEBEL_REPOSITORY_NAME#
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Data file path" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_SIEBEL_DATA_FILE_PATH#
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Log file path" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_SIEBEL_LOG_FILE_PATH#
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Siebel language" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_SIEBEL_LANGUAGE#
! <Begin of sudo script> :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.SUDOERS_HEADER
errors=0
! Check if Unix environment script directory exist :SET &UC4RB_CHECKME# = "&UC4RB_SIEBEL_ENV_SCRIPT_DIR#/&UC4RB_SIEBEL_ENV_SCRIPT#" ! Normalize file path :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.NORMALIZE_PATH "UC4RB_CONVERTED_STRING" = "UC4RB_CHECKME"
:INCLUDE PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.CHECK_UNIX_SHELL_FILE_EXISTS
if [ "$EXIST" -eq "0" ] ; then : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Unix environment script directory/Unix environment script file" : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_ERROR# = "Unix environment script '&UC4RB_CHECKME#' doesn't exist." : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_ERROR_PARAMETER errors=1 else if [ "$ISFILE" -eq "0" ] ; then : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Unix environment script directory/Unix environment script file" : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_ERROR# = "&UC4RB_CHECKME# exists but is not a file" : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_ERROR_PARAMETER errors=2 fi fi
! Check if Siebel directory exists :SET &UC4RB_CHECKME# = &UC4RB_SIEBEL_SERVER_ROOT# :INCLUDE PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.CHECK_UNIX_SHELL_FILE_EXISTS
if [ "$EXIST" -eq "0" ] ; then : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Siebel Server Directory" : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_ERROR# = "Directory &UC4RB_SIEBEL_SERVER_ROOT# does not exist" : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_ERROR_PARAMETER errors=1 else if [ "$ISDIR" -eq "0" ] ; then : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Siebel Server Directory" : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_ERROR# = "&UC4RB_SIEBEL_SERVER_ROOT# exists but is not a directory " : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_ERROR_PARAMETER errors=2 fi fi
! Check if Siebel import .dat file exists :SET &UC4RB_CHECKME# = &UC4RB_SIEBEL_DATA_FILE_PATH# :INCLUDE PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.CHECK_UNIX_SHELL_FILE_EXISTS
if [ "$EXIST" -eq "0" ] ; then : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Data file path" : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_ERROR# = "File &UC4RB_SIEBEL_DATA_FILE_PATH# does not exist" : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_ERROR_PARAMETER errors=1 else if [ "$ISFILE" -eq "0" ] ; then : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Data file path" : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_ERROR# = "&UC4RB_SIEBEL_DATA_FILE_PATH# exists but is not a file " : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_ERROR_PARAMETER errors=2 fi fi
if [ $errors -gt 0 ] ; then retcode=$errors exit $retcode fi
:INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_HEADER_EXECUTION
!Begin my code ! Create log file dir if it doesn't exist :SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_INFO# = "Create log file directory if it doesn't exist" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_INFO :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.ESCAPE_UNIX_CHARS "UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING" = "UC4RB_SIEBEL_LOG_FILE_PATH" :SET &UC4RB_CONVERTED_STRING# = "&UC4RB_SIEBEL_LOG_FILE_PATH#" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.GET_DIRECTORY_FROM_FILE_NAME :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.ENSURE_DIRECTORY_EXISTS_UNIX
cd "&UC4RB_SIEBEL_SERVER_ROOT#/bin" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.CHECK_RETURN_CODE_UNIX_SHELL ! Execute the siebel environment script . "/&UC4RB_SIEBEL_ENV_SCRIPT_DIR#/&UC4RB_SIEBEL_ENV_SCRIPT#" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.CHECK_RETURN_CODE_UNIX_SHELL :SET &UC4RB_ENCRYPTED_PASSWORD_TMP# = "&UC4RB_SIEBEL_DB_PASSWORD#" :SET &LANG# = "" :IF &UC4RB_SIEBEL_LANGUAGE# NE "" : SET &LANG# = " /G &UC4RB_SIEBEL_LANGUAGE# " :ENDIF :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.DECRYPT_PASSWORD :JCL_CONCAT_CHAR "?" repimexp /A I /U "&UC4RB_SIEBEL_DB_USER#" /P "$UC4_DECRYPTED_PWD" ? /C "&UC4RB_SIEBEL_DATA_SOURCE#" /D "&UC4RB_SIEBEL_TABLE_OWNER#" /R "&UC4RB_SIEBEL_REPOSITORY_NAME#" ? /F "&UC4RB_SIEBEL_DATA_FILE_PATH#" ? &LANG# /L "&UC4RB_SIEBEL_LOG_FILE_PATH#" :JCL_CONCAT_CHAR
:INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.CHECK_RETURN_CODE_UNIX_SHELL !End my code
:INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.SUDOERS_FOOTER ! <End of sudo script>

DOCU_Docu.DOC: = RB name = PCK.AUTOMIC_SIEBEL.PUB.ACTION.INSERT_BUSINESS_OBJECT = General description = This generic action inserts a specified business object into Siebel system using the java api and returns an error code and a message properly. = Inputs = * Siebel Username: The Siebel user to connect. * Siebel Password: The Password to connect with the Siebel user. * Object Manager: The Objectmanagers to connect with the Databean to check if Siebel is running. (No Spaces!!) * Server Url: siebel Server host * Siebel Enterprise: Enterprise that the databean should connect to. * Port: port Siebel is listening on. * Business object: The Business Object that is affected. * Business component: The Business Component that is affected. * Fields List: Comma-separated list of fields to update of the business object * Values List: Comma-separated list of values according to the fields = Behavior = (see general description) = Outputs = * Return code is 0 if success * Return code is 4 if not success. = Rollback = (none) = Logging = (none) = Example = (none)

SCRIPT.MSCRI: :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SIEBEL.PRV.INCLUDE.SET_SIEBEL_PROPERTIES :JCL_CONCAT_CHAR "?" java -jar "&$AGENT_RESOURCES_CLIENT#siebeltool.jar" siebel ImportBusinessObject ? -h &UC4RB_SIEBEL_SERVER_URL# ? -pt &UC4RB_SIEBEL_PORT# ? -e &UC4RB_SIEBEL_ENTERPRISE# ? -su "&UC4RB_SIEBEL_USER#" ? -sp "&UC4RB_SIEBEL_PASSWORD#" ? -om "&UC4RB_SIEBEL_OBJECT_MANAGER#" ? -i "&SIEBEL_IMPORT_DIR#/&SIEBEL_IMPORT_FILE#" ? &SIEBEL_PROPERTIES# :JCL_CONCAT_CHAR

:INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SIEBEL.PRV.INCLUDE.ATTACH_RESOURCES @echo off setlocal enabledelayedexpansion :DEFINE &STRING_ARR#, string, 30 :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_HEADER_PARAM_VALIDATION
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Siebel Server Url" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_SIEBEL_SERVER_URL#
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Siebel Port" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_SIEBEL_PORT#
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Siebel Enterprise" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_SIEBEL_ENTERPRISE#
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Siebel Username" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_SIEBEL_USER#
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Siebel Password" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_SIEBEL_PASSWORD#
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Object Manager" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_SIEBEL_OBJECT_MANAGER#
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Directory" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &SIEBEL_IMPORT_DIR#
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "File name" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &SIEBEL_IMPORT_FILE#
set /a errors=0 > nul ! Check if xml input exists :SET &UC4RB_CHECKME# = "&SIEBEL_IMPORT_DIR#\&SIEBEL_IMPORT_FILE#" :INCLUDE PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.CHECK_WINDOWS_CONSOLE_FILE_EXISTS
if %ISFILE% == 0 ( : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Import file path" : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_ERROR# = "File &SIEBEL_IMPORT_DIR#\&SIEBEL_IMPORT_FILE# does not exist" : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_ERROR_PARAMETER set /a errors=1 > nul ) if %errors% GTR 0 ( set retcode=%errors% goto :retcode ) :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_HEADER_EXECUTION !Begin my code :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.CHANGE_FOLDER_TO_AGENT_BIN :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SIEBEL.PRV.INCLUDE.IMPORT_RESPONSIBILITIES :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.CHECK_RETURN_CODE_WINDOWS_CONSOLE !End my code

POST_SCRIPT.OSCRI: :SET &output_entry# = PREP_PROCESS_REPORT(, , "REP", "*Number of records imported*") :PROCESS &output_entry# : SET &output_line# = GET_PROCESS_LINE(&output_entry#, 1) : SET &POS# = STR_FIND_REVERSE(&output_line#, ":") : SET &POS# = &POS# + 1 : SET &OUT_NUM_IMPORTED_OBJS# = SUBSTR(&output_line#, &POS#) : PUBLISH &OUT_NUM_IMPORTED_OBJS#, , 'WORKFLOW' :ENDPROCESS :CLOSE_PROCESS &output_entry#

:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Siebel Port" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_SIEBEL_PORT#

if [ "$errors" -gt 0 ]; then exit $errors; fi

DOCU_Docu.DOC: = RB name = PCK.AUTOMIC_SIEBEL.PUB.ACTION.IMPORT_SIF_FILE = General description = Import a SIF file (Siebel Information File) which is a declarative xml file describing Siebel object. = Inputs = * Siebel Tools Directory: The installation or root directory for Siebel Tools * Username: The user name of the Siebel administrator * Password: The password of the Siebel administrator * Repository name: The name of the Siebel repository * Siebel config: The name of the config file of the siebel tools * Siebel Datasource: Datasource (as in .cfg file) that Siebel Tools connect to. * Input Directory of SIF file(s): The directory which contains the SIF file(s) to import * SIF File Name: The SIF file name. In case this parameter is left empty, all SIF files contained in the directory as defined by the parameter "Input Directory of SIF file(s)" is used only. * SIF Import mode: Conflict resolution when an object definition exists in the archive as well as the repository = Behavior = (see general description) = Outputs = * Return code is 0 if success. * Return code is 1 if not success. = Rollback = (none) = Logging = (none) = Example = Siebel Tools Directory: D:\sba81\tools Username: sadmin Password: sadmin Repository name: Siebel Repository Siebel config: tools.cfg Siebel Datasource: ServerDataSrc Input Directory of SIF file(s): c:\sif_exports\ SIF File Name: SIF Import mode:

SCRIPT.MSCRI:
:INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SIEBEL.PRV.INCLUDE.ATTACH_RESOURCES :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.POWERSHELL_UTILITY :DEFINE &STRING_ARR#, string, 30 :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_HEADER_PARAM_VALIDATION
:INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.NORMALIZE_PATH "UC4RB_CONVERTED_STRING" = "SIEBEL_TOOLS_ROOT" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.NORMALIZE_PATH "UC4RB_CONVERTED_STRING" = "SIEBEL_SIF_DIR"
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Siebel Tools Directory" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &SIEBEL_TOOLS_ROOT#
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Username" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &SIEBEL_USER#
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Password" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &SIEBEL_PASSWORD#
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Repository name" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &SIEBEL_REPOSITORY_NAME#
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Siebel config" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &SIEBEL_CONFIG_NAME#
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Siebel Datasource" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &SIEBEL_CFG_DATA_SOURCE#
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Input Directory of SIF file(s)" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &SIEBEL_SIF_DIR#
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "SIF File Name" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &SIEBEL_SIF_NAME#
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "SIF Import mode" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &SIEBEL_IMPORT_MODE#
$errors = 0 ! Check Siebel Tools Directory exists :SET &UC4RB_CHECKME# = &SIEBEL_TOOLS_ROOT# :INCLUDE PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.CHECK_WINDOWS_POWERSHELL_FILE_EXISTS if ($ISDIR -eq 0){ :SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Siebel Tools Directory" :SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_ERROR# = "Directory &SIEBEL_TOOLS_ROOT# does not exist" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_ERROR_PARAMETER $errors=1 }
! Check Input Directory of SIF file(s) exists :SET &UC4RB_CHECKME# = &SIEBEL_SIF_DIR# :INCLUDE PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.CHECK_WINDOWS_POWERSHELL_FILE_EXISTS if ($ISDIR -eq 0){ :SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Input Directory of SIF file(s)" :SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_ERROR# = "Directory &SIEBEL_SIF_DIR# does not exist" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_ERROR_PARAMETER $errors=2 }
:IF &SIEBEL_SIF_NAME# NE "" : SET &UC4RB_CHECKME# = "&SIEBEL_SIF_DIR#\&SIEBEL_SIF_NAME#" : INCLUDE PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.CHECK_WINDOWS_POWERSHELL_FILE_EXISTS if ($ISFILE -eq 0){ : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "SIF File Name)" : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_ERROR# = "File &SIEBEL_SIF_DIR#\&SIEBEL_SIF_NAME# does not exist" : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_ERROR_PARAMETER $errors=3 } :ENDIF
if ($errors -gt 0) { exit $errors } :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_HEADER_EXECUTION ! Begin my code :SET &IMPORT_FILE_NAME# = &SIEBEL_SIF_DIR# :IF &SIEBEL_SIF_NAME# NE "" : SET &IMPORT_FILE_NAME# = "&SIEBEL_SIF_DIR#\&SIEBEL_SIF_NAME#" :ENDIF
:SET &UC4RB_CONVERTED_STRING# = GET_VAR('UC_EX_PATH_TEMP', &AGENT#) :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.NORMALIZE_PATH :SET &LOG_FILE# = "&UC4RB_CONVERTED_STRING#\&$RUNID#_log.txt"
Remove-Item '&LOG_FILE#' -Force -errorAction SilentlyContinue
cd "&SIEBEL_TOOLS_ROOT#\BIN" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.CHECK_RETURN_CODE_WINDOWS_POWERSHELL
:SET &UC4RB_ENCRYPTED_PASSWORD_TMP#="&SIEBEL_PASSWORD#" :INCLUDE PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.DECRYPT_PASSWORD
:JCL_CONCAT_CHAR "?" $MyProcess = Start-Process .\siebdev.exe -passthru -ArgumentList "/c","&SIEBEL_CONFIG_NAME#","/d","&SIEBEL_CFG_DATA_SOURCE#","/u","&SIEBEL_USER#","/p","$UC4_DECRYPTED_PWD",? "/batchimport","'&SIEBEL_REPOSITORY_NAME#'","&SIEBEL_IMPORT_MODE#","'&IMPORT_FILE_NAME#'","'&LOG_FILE#'" :JCL_CONCAT_CHAR :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.CHECK_RETURN_CODE_WINDOWS_POWERSHELL
$timeout = 0 while ( $true ) { $timeout += 10 Start-Sleep -s 10 $running = ( get-process -Id $MyProcess.Id -errorAction SilentlyContinue ) if ( !$running ) { break; } else { if ($timeout -gt 300) { if ( !( Test-Path '&LOG_FILE#' ) ) { ! kill process Stop-Process -Id $MyProcess.Id -Force break } } } }
if ( Test-Path '&LOG_FILE#' ) {
$text = ( Get-Content '&LOG_FILE#' | ? {$_.trim() -ne "" } | Select-Object -last 1 ) $failedimport = $text.split(",")[2] $failedimport = $failedimport.split(":")[1].trim() if ( $failedimport -eq 0 ) { echo "Import Successful, see more detail in the log file &LOG_FILE#" type '&LOG_FILE#' | ? {$_.trim() -ne "" } | Select-Object -first 5 echo "..........................................." type '&LOG_FILE#' | ? {$_.trim() -ne "" } | Select-Object -last 5 } else { echo "Import Failed, see more detail in the log file &LOG_FILE#" type '&LOG_FILE#' | ? {$_.trim() -ne "" } | Select-Object -first 5 echo "..........................................." type '&LOG_FILE#' | ? {$_.trim() -ne "" } | Select-Object -last 5 __uc_return( 1 ) } } else { echo "Import Failed, Please check input parameters again" __uc_return( 4 ) } __uc_return( 0 )
! End my code

DOCU_Docu.DOC: = RB name = PCK.AUTOMIC_SIEBEL.PUB.ACTION.IMPORT_STATEMODEL = General description = ports State Models from an XML file including their states and transitions (together with the Authorized Positions) to Siebel using the java api. Imported data is read from a structured XML format file which is output of EXPORT_STATEMODEL runbook = Inputs = * Siebel Username: The Siebel user to connect. * Siebel Password: The Password to connect with the Siebel user. * Server Url: siebel Server host * Siebel Enterprise: Enterprise that the databean should connect to. * Port: port Siebel is listening on. * Object Manager: The Objectmanagers to connect with the Databean to check if Siebel is running. (No Spaces!!) * Directory: The directory from which the tool reads the file * File name: Name of the file that contains the business objects = Behavior = (see general description) = Outputs = * Return code is 0 if success * Return code is 4 if not success. = Rollback = (none) = Logging = (none) = Example = (none)

DOCU_Docu.DOC: = RB name = PCK.AUTOMIC_SIEBEL.PUB.ACTION.IMPORT_SYMBOLIC_URL = General description = Executes a request to run a predefined Workflow to import Symbolic URL list from an ADM file on the specified Siebel System. = Inputs = * Siebel Server Url: Siebel Server host * Siebel Server Port: port Siebel is listening on. * Siebel Enterprise: Enterprise that the databean should connect to. * Object Manager: The Objectmanagers to connect with the Databean to check if Siebel is running. (No Spaces!!) * Siebel Username: The Siebel user to connect. * Siebel Password: The Password to connect with the Siebel user. * Symbolic URL input file path: The path of the ADM XML file. = Behavior = This action can run on every host that has the appropriate installed Java version and can connect to the Target Siebel server. = Outputs = * Return code is 0 if success * Return code is 4 if not success. = Rollback = (none) = Logging = (none) = Example = (none)

DOCU_Docu.DOC:
= RB name = PCK.AUTOMIC_SIEBEL.PUB.ACTION.IMPORT_VIEWS = General description = Imports a set of views from an XML file. = Inputs = * Siebel Server Url: Siebel Server host * Siebel Port: port Siebel is listening on. * Siebel Enterprise: Enterprise that the databean should connect to. * Object Manager: The Objectmanagers to connect with the Databean to check if Siebel is running. (No Spaces!!) * Siebel Username: The Siebel user to connect. * Siebel Password: The Password to connect with the Siebel user. * Siebel Import Directory: The directory from which the tool reads the file. * Siebel Import File: Name of the file that contains the business objects.
= Behavior = This action can run on every host that has the appropriate installed Java version and can connect to the Target Siebel server. = Outputs = * Return code is 0 if success * Return code is 1 if Siebel Import Directory or Siebel Import File does not exist. * Return code is 4 if not success. = Rollback = (none) = Logging = (none) = Example = (none)

DOCU_Docu.DOC: = RB name = PCK.AUTOMIC_SIEBEL.PUB.ACTION.IMPORT_WEBSERVICE = General description = Imports a Webservice that runs within Siebel from an XML file that was formerly exported. = Inputs = * Siebel Server Url: Siebel Server host * Siebel Port: port Siebel is listening on. * Siebel Enterprise: Enterprise that the databean should connect to. * Object Manager: The Objectmanagers to connect with the Databean to check if Siebel is running. (No Spaces!!) * Siebel Username: The Siebel user to connect. * Siebel Password: The Password to connect with the Siebel user. * Web Server Directory: The directory in which the web server file resides * Web Server File: The file to be imported. = Behavior = (see general description) = Outputs = * Return code is 0 if success, a SFR file is created. * Return code is 4 if not success. = Rollback = (none) = Logging = (none) = Example = (none)

= RB name = PCK.AUTOMIC_SIEBEL.PUB.ACTION.IMPORT_WORKFLOW = General description = Import workflow processes from xml files = Inputs = * Import Directory:The directory where the workflow export files are located. * File Search Specification: The search specification used to identify the workflow export files to be imported. * Repository: The repository from which workflow processes are imported * Project Name: The Tools project into which workflow processes are imported. * Server Url: The host name of the Siebel Server * Port: The port Siebel is listening on * Siebel Enterprise: The Enterprise that the databean should connect to * Object Manager: The ObjectManagers to connect with the DataBean to check if Siebel is running * Siebel Username: The Siebel user to connect * Siebel Password: The Password to connect with the Siebel user = Behavior = (see general description) = Outputs = * Return code is 0 if success * Return code is 4 if not success. = Rollback = (none) = Logging = (none) = Example = (none)

SCRIPT.MSCRI:
:INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SIEBEL.PRV.INCLUDE.ATTACH_RESOURCES :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_HEADER_PARAM_VALIDATION
:DEFINE &STRING_ARR#,string,30 :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.NORMALIZE_PATH "UC4RB_CONVERTED_STRING" = "UC4RB_SIEBEL_IMPORT_DIR"
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Import Directory" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_SIEBEL_IMPORT_DIR#
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "File Search Specification" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_SIEBEL_FILE_SEARCH_SPEC#
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Repository" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_SIEBEL_REPOSITORY#
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Project Name" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_SIEBEL_PROJECT_NAME#
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Server Url" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_SIEBEL_SERVER_URL#
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Port" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_SIEBEL_PORT#
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Siebel Enterprise" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_SIEBEL_ENTERPRISE#
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Object Manager" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_SIEBEL_OBJECT_MANAGER#
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Siebel Username" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_SIEBEL_USER#
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Siebel Password" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_SIEBEL_PASSWORD#
! apply sudo :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.SUDOERS_HEADER ! Check if Siebel directory exists :SET &UC4RB_CHECKME# = &UC4RB_SIEBEL_IMPORT_DIR# :INCLUDE PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.CHECK_UNIX_SHELL_FILE_EXISTS
errors=0 if [ "$ISDIR" -eq "0" ]; then : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Import Directory" : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_ERROR# = "Import directory &UC4RB_SIEBEL_IMPORT_DIR# does not exist" : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_ERROR_PARAMETER errors=1 fi
if [ "$errors" -gt 0 ]; then exit $errors; fi
:INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_HEADER_EXECUTION !Begin my code :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SIEBEL.PRV.INCLUDE.SET_SIEBEL_PROPERTIES :SET &COMMAND# = "java -jar ""&SIEBEL_TOOL_JAR#"" siebel ImportWorkflow" :SET &COMMAND# = STR_CAT(&COMMAND#, ' -h &UC4RB_SIEBEL_SERVER_URL# -pt &UC4RB_SIEBEL_PORT#') :SET &COMMAND# = STR_CAT(&COMMAND#, ' -su &UC4RB_SIEBEL_USER# -sp &UC4RB_SIEBEL_PASSWORD#') :SET &COMMAND# = STR_CAT(&COMMAND#, ' -e "&UC4RB_SIEBEL_ENTERPRISE#" -om &UC4RB_SIEBEL_OBJECT_MANAGER#') :SET &COMMAND# = STR_CAT(&COMMAND#, ' -im "&UC4RB_SIEBEL_IMPORT_DIR#"') :SET &UC4RB_SIEBEL_FILE_SEARCH_SPEC# = STR_SUB(&UC4RB_SIEBEL_FILE_SEARCH_SPEC#,'"','\"') :SET &COMMAND# = STR_CAT(&COMMAND#, ' -s "&UC4RB_SIEBEL_FILE_SEARCH_SPEC#"') :SET &COMMAND# = STR_CAT(&COMMAND#, ' -rp "&UC4RB_SIEBEL_REPOSITORY#"') :SET &COMMAND# = STR_CAT(&COMMAND#, ' -pn "&UC4RB_SIEBEL_PROJECT_NAME#"') :SET &COMMAND# = STR_CAT(&COMMAND#, "&SIEBEL_PROPERTIES#") :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.CHANGE_FOLDER_TO_AGENT_BIN &COMMAND# :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.CHECK_RETURN_CODE_UNIX_SHELL !End my code !apply sudo :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.SUDOERS_FOOTER

POST_SCRIPT.OSCRI:
:SET &UC4RB_OUT_NUM_IMPORTED_WF# = "0"
:SET &hnd# = PREP_PROCESS_REPORT(,, "REP", "*Number of workflows imported: *") :PROCESS &hnd# : SET &line# = GET_PROCESS_LINE(&hnd#,1) : SET &LENGTH# = STR_FIND(&line#, "imported: ") : SET &LENGTH# = &LENGTH# + 10 : SET &UC4RB_OUT_NUM_IMPORTED_WF# = STR_CUT(&line#, &LENGTH#) :ENDPROCESS
:PUB &UC4RB_OUT_NUM_IMPORTED_WF#,,TOP

SCRIPT.MSCRI:
:INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SIEBEL.PRV.INCLUDE.ATTACH_RESOURCES @echo off setlocal enabledelayedexpansion :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_HEADER_PARAM_VALIDATION
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Import Directory" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_SIEBEL_IMPORT_DIR#
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "File Search Specification" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_SIEBEL_FILE_SEARCH_SPEC#
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Repository" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_SIEBEL_REPOSITORY#
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Project Name" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_SIEBEL_PROJECT_NAME#
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Server Url" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_SIEBEL_SERVER_URL#
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Port" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_SIEBEL_PORT#
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Siebel Enterprise" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_SIEBEL_ENTERPRISE#
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Object Manager" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_SIEBEL_OBJECT_MANAGER#
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Siebel Username" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_SIEBEL_USER#
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Siebel Password" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_SIEBEL_PASSWORD#
! Check if Siebel directory exists :SET &UC4RB_CHECKME# = &UC4RB_SIEBEL_IMPORT_DIR# :INCLUDE PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.CHECK_WINDOWS_CONSOLE_FILE_EXISTS
set /a errors=0 > nul
if %ISDIR% == 0 ( : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Import Directory" : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_ERROR# = "Import directory &UC4RB_SIEBEL_IMPORT_DIR# does not exist" : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_ERROR_PARAMETER set /a errors=1 > nul )
if %errors% GTR 0 ( set retcode=%errors% goto :retcode ) :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_HEADER_EXECUTION !Begin my code !Normalize inputs :DEFINE &STRING_ARR#,string,30 :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.NORMALIZE_PATH "UC4RB_CONVERTED_STRING" = "UC4RB_SIEBEL_IMPORT_DIR"
:INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SIEBEL.PRV.INCLUDE.SET_SIEBEL_PROPERTIES :SET &COMMAND# = "java -jar ""&SIEBEL_TOOL_JAR#"" siebel ImportWorkflow" :SET &COMMAND# = STR_CAT(&COMMAND#, ' -h &UC4RB_SIEBEL_SERVER_URL# -pt &UC4RB_SIEBEL_PORT#') :SET &COMMAND# = STR_CAT(&COMMAND#, ' -su &UC4RB_SIEBEL_USER# -sp &UC4RB_SIEBEL_PASSWORD#') :SET &COMMAND# = STR_CAT(&COMMAND#, ' -e "&UC4RB_SIEBEL_ENTERPRISE#" -om &UC4RB_SIEBEL_OBJECT_MANAGER#') :SET &COMMAND# = STR_CAT(&COMMAND#, ' -im "&UC4RB_SIEBEL_IMPORT_DIR#"') :SET &UC4RB_SIEBEL_FILE_SEARCH_SPEC# = STR_SUB(&UC4RB_SIEBEL_FILE_SEARCH_SPEC#,'"','\"') :SET &COMMAND# = STR_CAT(&COMMAND#, ' -s "&UC4RB_SIEBEL_FILE_SEARCH_SPEC#"') :SET &COMMAND# = STR_CAT(&COMMAND#, ' -rp "&UC4RB_SIEBEL_REPOSITORY#"') :SET &COMMAND# = STR_CAT(&COMMAND#, ' -pn "&UC4RB_SIEBEL_PROJECT_NAME#"') :SET &COMMAND# = STR_CAT(&COMMAND#, "&SIEBEL_PROPERTIES#") :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.CHANGE_FOLDER_TO_AGENT_BIN &COMMAND# :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.CHECK_RETURN_CODE_WINDOWS_CONSOLE !End my code

:PUB &UC4RB_OUT_NUM_IMPORTED_WF#,,TOP
