DOCU_Docu.DOC: = RB name = PCK.AUTOMIC_SIEBEL.PUB.ACTION.INSERT_BUSINESS_COMPONENT = General description = This generic action inserts a specified business component into Siebel system using the java api and returns an error code and a message properly. = Inputs = * Siebel Username: The Siebel user to connect. * Siebel Password: The Password to connect with the Siebel user. * Object Manager: The Objectmanagers to connect with the Databean to check if Siebel is running. (No Spaces!!) * Server Url: siebel Server host * Siebel Enterprise: Enterprise that the databean should connect to. * Port: port Siebel is listening on. * Business object: The Business Object that is affected. * Business component: The Business Component that is affected. * Fields List: Comma-separated list of fields to update of the business component * Values List: Comma-separated list of values according to the fields. If a field is Multi-Value Field/Link, input search specification inside {} symbols as the value to identify the linked object. i.e: {[Name] like 'Siebel Account'} = Behavior = (see general description) = Outputs = * Return code is 0 if success * Return code is 4 if not success. = Rollback = (none) = Logging = (none) = Example = (none)

DOCU_Docu.DOC: = RB name = PCK.AUTOMIC_SIEBEL.PUB.ACTION.INVOKE_OBJECT_METHOD = General description = This generic invoke function invokes a method of a business component from siebel using the java api of siebel and returns an error code and a message. = Inputs = * Siebel Username: The Siebel user to connect. * Siebel Password: The Password to connect with the Siebel user. * Object Manager: The Objectmanagers to connect with the Databean to check if Siebel is running. (No Spaces!!) * Server Url: siebel Server host * Siebel Enterprise: Enterprise that the databean should connect to. * Port: port Siebel is listening on. * Business object: The Business Object that is affected. * Business component: The Business Component that is affected. * Method Name: Name of the Method to call. = Behavior = (see general description) = Outputs = * Return code is 0 if success * Return code is 4 if not success. = Rollback = (none) = Logging = (none) = Example = (none)

SCRIPT.MSCRI: :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SIEBEL.PRV.INCLUDE.SET_SIEBEL_PROPERTIES :JCL_CONCAT_CHAR "?" java -jar "&$AGENT_RESOURCES_CLIENT#/siebeltool.jar" siebel InvokeObjectMethod ? -h &UC4RB_SIEBEL_SERVER_URL# ? -pt &UC4RB_SIEBEL_PORT# ? -e &UC4RB_SIEBEL_ENTERPRISE# ? -su "&UC4RB_SIEBEL_USER#" ? -sp "&UC4RB_SIEBEL_PASSWORD#" ? -om "&UC4RB_SIEBEL_OBJECT_MANAGER#" ? -bo "&SIEBEL_BUSINESS_OBJECT#" ? -bc "&SIEBEL_BUSINESS_COMPONENT#" ? -m "&SIEBEL_OBJECT_METHOD#" ? -v "&SIEBEL_IN_VALUES#" ? -ll "&UC4_LOGLEVEL#" &SIEBEL_PROPERTIES# :JCL_CONCAT_CHAR

:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Server Url" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_SIEBEL_SERVER_URL#
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Port" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_SIEBEL_PORT#
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Siebel Enterprise" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_SIEBEL_ENTERPRISE#
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Object Manager" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_SIEBEL_OBJECT_MANAGER#
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Siebel Username" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_SIEBEL_USER#
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Business Component" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &SIEBEL_BUSINESS_COMPONENT#
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Business Object" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &SIEBEL_BUSINESS_OBJECT#
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Method Name" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &SIEBEL_OBJECT_METHOD#
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Input Values" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &SIEBEL_IN_VALUES#

:INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SIEBEL.PRV.INCLUDE.ATTACH_RESOURCES :DEFINE &STRING_ARR#, string, 30
:INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_HEADER_PARAM_VALIDATION :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SIEBEL.PRV.INCLUDE.INVOKE_OBJECT_METHOD_LOGGING_PARAM :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_HEADER_EXECUTION !Begin my code ! <Begin of sudo script> :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.SUDOERS_HEADER
:INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.CHANGE_FOLDER_TO_AGENT_BIN :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.CHECK_RETURN_CODE_UNIX_SHELL
:INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SIEBEL.PRV.INCLUDE.SET_SIEBEL_PROPERTIES :JCL_CONCAT_CHAR "?" java -jar "&SIEBEL_TOOL_JAR#" siebel InvokeObjectMethod ? -h &UC4RB_SIEBEL_SERVER_URL# ? -pt &UC4RB_SIEBEL_PORT# ? -e &UC4RB_SIEBEL_ENTERPRISE# ? -su "&UC4RB_SIEBEL_USER#" ? -sp "&UC4RB_SIEBEL_PASSWORD#" ? -om "&UC4RB_SIEBEL_OBJECT_MANAGER#" ? -bo "&SIEBEL_BUSINESS_OBJECT#" ? -bc "&SIEBEL_BUSINESS_COMPONENT#" ? -m "&SIEBEL_OBJECT_METHOD#" ? -v "&SIEBEL_IN_VALUES#" ? -ll "&UC4_LOGLEVEL#" &SIEBEL_PROPERTIES# :JCL_CONCAT_CHAR
:INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.CHECK_RETURN_CODE_UNIX_SHELL :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.SUDOERS_FOOTER ! <End of sudo script> !End my code

:INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SIEBEL.PRV.INCLUDE.ATTACH_RESOURCES :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.POWERSHELL_UTILITY :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_HEADER_PARAM_VALIDATION :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SIEBEL.PRV.INCLUDE.INVOKE_OBJECT_METHOD_LOGGING_PARAM :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_HEADER_EXECUTION !Begin my code :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.CHANGE_FOLDER_TO_AGENT_BIN :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.CHECK_RETURN_CODE_WINDOWS_POWERSHELL !Make Here String for optional parameters $values = @' "&SIEBEL_IN_VALUES#" '@ $loglevel = @' "&UC4_LOGLEVEL#" '@
:INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SIEBEL.PRV.INCLUDE.SET_SIEBEL_PROPERTIES :JCL_CONCAT_CHAR "?" java -jar "&SIEBEL_TOOL_JAR#" siebel InvokeObjectMethod ? -h &UC4RB_SIEBEL_SERVER_URL# ? -pt &UC4RB_SIEBEL_PORT# ? -e &UC4RB_SIEBEL_ENTERPRISE# ? -su "&UC4RB_SIEBEL_USER#" ? -sp "&UC4RB_SIEBEL_PASSWORD#" ? -om "&UC4RB_SIEBEL_OBJECT_MANAGER#" ? -bo "&SIEBEL_BUSINESS_OBJECT#" ? -bc "&SIEBEL_BUSINESS_COMPONENT#" ? -m "&SIEBEL_OBJECT_METHOD#" ? -v $values ? -ll $loglevel &SIEBEL_PROPERTIES# :JCL_CONCAT_CHAR :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.CHECK_RETURN_CODE_WINDOWS_POWERSHELL __uc_return(0) !End my code

DOCU_Docu.DOC: = RB name = PCK.AUTOMIC_SIEBEL.PUB.ACTION.INVOKE_SERVICE_METHOD = General description = This generic invoke function invokes a businessmethod of a business-service from siebel using the java api of siebel and returns an error code and a message. If output properties are specified, these shall be printed on the report to be used in a custom action. = Inputs = * Siebel Username: The Siebel user to connect. * Siebel Password: The Password to connect with the Siebel user. * Object Manager: The Objectmanagers to connect with the Databean to check if Siebel is running. (No Spaces!!) * Server Url: siebel Server host * Siebel Enterprise: Enterprise that the databean should connect to. * Port: port Siebel is listening on. * Business Service: The Business service to call. * Method Name: Name of the Method to call. * Input Properties: Comma-separated list of input properties for that method * Input Values: Comma-separated list of input values according to the properties * Output Properties: Comma-separated list of output properties that will be printed onto the report = Behavior = (see general description) = Outputs = * Return code is 0 if success * Return code is 4 if not success. = Rollback = (none) = Logging = (none) = Example = (none)

SCRIPT.MSCRI: :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SIEBEL.PRV.INCLUDE.SET_SIEBEL_PROPERTIES :JCL_CONCAT_CHAR "?" java -jar "&$AGENT_RESOURCES_CLIENT#/siebeltool.jar" siebel InvokeServiceMethod ? -h &UC4RB_SIEBEL_SERVER_URL# ? -pt &UC4RB_SIEBEL_PORT# ? -e &UC4RB_SIEBEL_ENTERPRISE# ? -su "&UC4RB_SIEBEL_USER#" ? -sp "&UC4RB_SIEBEL_PASSWORD#" ? -om "&UC4RB_SIEBEL_OBJECT_MANAGER#" ? -s "&SIEBEL_BUSINESS_SERVICE#" ? -m "&SIEBEL_BUSINESS_METHOD#" ? -i "&SIEBEL_IN_PROPS#" ? -v "&SIEBEL_IN_VALUES#" ? -o "&SIEBEL_OUT_PROPS#" ? -ll "&UC4_LOGLEVEL#" &SIEBEL_PROPERTIES# :JCL_CONCAT_CHAR

:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Siebel Server Url" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_SIEBEL_SERVER_URL#
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Siebel Server Port" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_SIEBEL_PORT#
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Siebel Enterprise" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_SIEBEL_ENTERPRISE#
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Object Manager" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_SIEBEL_OBJECT_MANAGER#
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Siebel Username" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_SIEBEL_USER#
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Business Service" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &SIEBEL_BUSINESS_SERVICE#
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Business Method" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &SIEBEL_BUSINESS_METHOD#
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Input Properties" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &SIEBEL_IN_PROPS#
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Input Values" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &SIEBEL_IN_VALUES#
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Output Properties" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &SIEBEL_OUT_PROPS#

:INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SIEBEL.PRV.INCLUDE.ATTACH_RESOURCES :DEFINE &STRING_ARR#, string, 30
:INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_HEADER_PARAM_VALIDATION :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SIEBEL.PRV.INCLUDE.INVOKE_SERVICE_METHOD_LOGGING_PARAM :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_HEADER_EXECUTION !Begin my code ! <Begin of sudo script> :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.SUDOERS_HEADER :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.CHANGE_FOLDER_TO_AGENT_BIN :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.CHECK_RETURN_CODE_UNIX_SHELL :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SIEBEL.PRV.INCLUDE.SET_SIEBEL_PROPERTIES
:JCL_CONCAT_CHAR "?" java -jar "&SIEBEL_TOOL_JAR#" siebel InvokeServiceMethod ? -h &UC4RB_SIEBEL_SERVER_URL# ? -pt &UC4RB_SIEBEL_PORT# ? -e &UC4RB_SIEBEL_ENTERPRISE# ? -su "&UC4RB_SIEBEL_USER#" ? -sp "&UC4RB_SIEBEL_PASSWORD#" ? -om "&UC4RB_SIEBEL_OBJECT_MANAGER#" ? -s "&SIEBEL_BUSINESS_SERVICE#" ? -m "&SIEBEL_BUSINESS_METHOD#" ? -i "&SIEBEL_IN_PROPS#" ? -v "&SIEBEL_IN_VALUES#" ? -o "&SIEBEL_OUT_PROPS#" ? -ll "&UC4_LOGLEVEL#" &SIEBEL_PROPERTIES# :JCL_CONCAT_CHAR
:INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.CHECK_RETURN_CODE_UNIX_SHELL :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.SUDOERS_FOOTER ! <End of sudo script> !End my code

POST_SCRIPT.OSCRI: :INCLUDE PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.SCAN_OUTPUT_VARIABLES

SCRIPT.MSCRI:
:INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SIEBEL.PRV.INCLUDE.ATTACH_RESOURCES :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.POWERSHELL_UTILITY
:INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_HEADER_PARAM_VALIDATION :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SIEBEL.PRV.INCLUDE.INVOKE_SERVICE_METHOD_LOGGING_PARAM :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_HEADER_EXECUTION !Begin my code :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SIEBEL.PRV.INCLUDE.SET_SIEBEL_PROPERTIES
:INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.CHANGE_FOLDER_TO_AGENT_BIN :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.CHECK_RETURN_CODE_WINDOWS_POWERSHELL :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.ESCAPE_WINDOWS_CHARS "UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING" = "SIEBEL_IN_PROPS" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.ESCAPE_WINDOWS_CHARS "UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING" = "SIEBEL_IN_VALUES" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.ESCAPE_WINDOWS_CHARS "UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING" = "SIEBEL_OUT_PROPS"
!Make Here String for optional parameters to avoid two double quotes "" problem in Powershell Command $inputs = @' "&SIEBEL_IN_PROPS#" '@
$values = @' "&SIEBEL_IN_VALUES#" '@
$outputs = @' "&SIEBEL_OUT_PROPS#" '@
$loglevel = @' "&UC4_LOGLEVEL#" '@
:INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SIEBEL.PRV.INCLUDE.SET_SIEBEL_PROPERTIES :JCL_CONCAT_CHAR "?" java -jar "&SIEBEL_TOOL_JAR#" siebel InvokeServiceMethod ? -h &UC4RB_SIEBEL_SERVER_URL# ? -pt &UC4RB_SIEBEL_PORT# ? -e &UC4RB_SIEBEL_ENTERPRISE# ? -su "&UC4RB_SIEBEL_USER#" ? -sp "&UC4RB_SIEBEL_PASSWORD#" ? -om "&UC4RB_SIEBEL_OBJECT_MANAGER#" ? -s "&SIEBEL_BUSINESS_SERVICE#" ? -m "&SIEBEL_BUSINESS_METHOD#" ? -i $inputs ? -v $values ? -o $outputs ? -ll $loglevel &SIEBEL_PROPERTIES# :JCL_CONCAT_CHAR :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.CHECK_RETURN_CODE_WINDOWS_POWERSHELL __uc_return(0) !End my code

POST_SCRIPT.OSCRI: :INCLUDE PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.SCAN_OUTPUT_VARIABLES

DOCU_Docu.DOC: = RB name = PCK.AUTOMIC_SIEBEL.PUB.ACTION.RENAME_REPOSITORY = General description = Rename the existing repository in order to create a backup on the target environment. = Inputs = * Siebel Server Url: The name of the siebel Server. * Siebel Port: The port Siebel is listening on. * Siebel Enterprise: The Enterprise that the databean should connect to. * Siebel Username: The Siebel user to connect. * Siebel Password: The Password to connect with the Siebel user. * Object Manager: The Objectmanagers to connect with the Databean to check if Siebel is running. (No Spaces!!) * Business component: The Business Component that is affected * Business object: The Business Object that is affected * Current repository name: Current name of the object to be renamed * New repository name: New repository name = Behavior = (see general description) = Outputs = * Return code is 0 if success * Return code is 1 if not success. = Rollback = (none) = Logging = (none) = Example = (none)

SCRIPT.MSCRI: :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SIEBEL.PRV.INCLUDE.SET_SIEBEL_PROPERTIES :JCL_CONCAT_CHAR "?" java -jar "&SIEBEL_TOOL_JAR#" siebel RenameRepository ? -h &UC4RB_SIEBEL_SERVER_URL# ? -pt &UC4RB_SIEBEL_PORT# ? -e &UC4RB_SIEBEL_ENTERPRISE# ? -su "&UC4RB_SIEBEL_USER#" ? -sp "&UC4RB_SIEBEL_PASSWORD#" ? -om "&UC4RB_SIEBEL_OBJECT_MANAGER#" ? -bc "&UC4RB_SIEBEL_BUSINESS_COMP#" ? -bo "&UC4RB_SIEBEL_BUSINESS_OBJECT#" ? -on "&UC4RB_SIEBEL_OBJ_OLDNAME#" ? -nn "&UC4RB_SIEBEL_OBJ_NEWNAME#" &SIEBEL_PROPERTIES# :JCL_CONCAT_CHAR

:DEFINE &STRING_ARR#, string, 30 :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SIEBEL.PRV.INCLUDE.ATTACH_RESOURCES

DOCU_Docu.DOC:
= RB name = PCK.AUTOMIC_SIEBEL.PUB.ACTION.RESTART_COMPONENT
= General Description = This Action runs on the Siebel Server. First stops the siebel server, then starts it again. At least the action checks if Siebel is available.
= Inputs = * Siebel Gateway Server Address: The Siebel gateway server address * Siebel Port: The port Siebel is listening on. * Siebel Server root directory: The Siebel server root directory * Siebel Enterprise name: The Enterprise that the databean should connect to. * Siebel Server environment script: The full path of the siebel environment script. * Siebel Username: The Siebel user to connect. * Siebel Password: The Password to connect with the Siebeluser. * Siebel Servers: Comma separated list siebel servers which will be stopped (ALL for all servers) * Object Managers: The Objectmanagers to connect with the Databean to check if Siebel is running. (No Spaces!!) * Maximum reties: The maximum retries before the action reaches an error state. * Delay time: The delay between the retries in seconds. * Encoding: The Encoding, that is used for Siebel
= Behavior = (see general description)
= Outputs = * Return code is 0 if success. * Return code is 1 if not success.
= Rollback =
= Logging =
= Example =

SCRIPT.MSCRI: : SET &UC4RB_SIEBEL_WAIT_TIME# = &UC4RB_SIEBEL_EXP_TIME#*60 : PUBLISH &UC4RB_SIEBEL_WAIT_TIME#, , "TOP"

DOCU_Docu.DOC:
= RB name = PCK.AUTOMIC_SIEBEL.PUB.ACTION.SEND_MESSAGE
= General description = This Action is designed to Inform the User via a popup or in the Information Area of the Siebel System. We can put a Message in, the message is then displayed in the information area or via Pop up.
= Inputs = * Message Body: The Message to display * Message Type: The type of the message. * Expiration Time in Minutes: The amount of time in minutes before the message expires * Server Url: siebel Server host * Port: port Siebel is listening on. * Siebel Enterprise: Enterprise that the databean should connect to. * Siebel Username: The Siebel user to connect. * Siebel Password: The Password to connect with the Siebel user. * Object Manager: The Objectmanagers to connect with the Databean to check if Siebel is running. (No Spaces!!)
= Behavior = This Action is designed to Inform the User via a popup or in the Information Area of the Siebel System. We can put a Message in, the message is then displayed in the information area or via Pop up. Java Implementation Business Object: Broadcast Message Business Component: Broadcast Message Fields : Type : Normal / High / Urgent / Urgent with Alert --> Please note that these values could be different according the language installed All : Y Expiration Date/Time: The time for the message to be expired Body : The Message itself
= Outputs = * Return code is 0 if success * Return code is 1 if not success.
= Rollback = (none)
= Logging = (none)
= Example = (none)

SCRIPT.MSCRI: :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SIEBEL.PRV.INCLUDE.SET_SIEBEL_PROPERTIES :JCL_CONCAT_CHAR "?" java -jar "&SIEBEL_TOOL_JAR#" siebel SendMessage ? -h &UC4RB_SIEBEL_SERVER_URL# ? -pt &UC4RB_SIEBEL_PORT# ? -e &UC4RB_SIEBEL_ENTERPRISE# ? -su "&UC4RB_SIEBEL_USER#" ? -sp "&UC4RB_SIEBEL_PASSWORD#" ? -om &UC4RB_SIEBEL_OBJECT_MANAGER# ? -type "&UC4RB_SIEBEL_MESSAGE_TYPE#" ? -body "&UC4RB_SIEBEL_MESSAGE_BODY#" ? -expr &UC4RB_SIEBEL_EXP_TIME# &SIEBEL_PROPERTIES# :JCL_CONCAT_CHAR

:DEFINE &STRING_ARR#, string, 30 :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SIEBEL.PRV.INCLUDE.ATTACH_RESOURCES
:INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_HEADER_PARAM_VALIDATION
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Message Body" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_SIEBEL_MESSAGE_BODY#
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Message Type" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_SIEBEL_MESSAGE_TYPE#
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Expiration Time in Minutes" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_SIEBEL_EXP_TIME#
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Server Url" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_SIEBEL_SERVER_URL#
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Port" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_SIEBEL_PORT#
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Siebel Enterprise" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_SIEBEL_ENTERPRISE#
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Siebel Username" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_SIEBEL_USER#
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Siebel Password" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_SIEBEL_PASSWORD#
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Object Manager" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_SIEBEL_OBJECT_MANAGER#
!Begin my code :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_HEADER_EXECUTION
! <Begin of sudo script> :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.SUDOERS_HEADER
:INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.CHANGE_FOLDER_TO_AGENT_BIN :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.CHECK_RETURN_CODE_UNIX_SHELL :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SIEBEL.PRV.INCLUDE.SEND_MESSAGE :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.CHECK_RETURN_CODE_UNIX_SHELL
:INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.SUDOERS_FOOTER ! <End of sudo script> !End my code

:INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SIEBEL.PRV.INCLUDE.ATTACH_RESOURCES @echo off :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_HEADER_PARAM_VALIDATION
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Message Body" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_SIEBEL_MESSAGE_BODY#

:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Expiration Time in Minutes" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_SIEBEL_EXP_TIME#
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Server Url" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_SIEBEL_SERVER_URL#
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Port" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_SIEBEL_PORT#
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Siebel Enterprise" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_SIEBEL_ENTERPRISE#

:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Siebel Password" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_SIEBEL_PASSWORD#
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Object Manager" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_SIEBEL_OBJECT_MANAGER# !Begin my code :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_HEADER_EXECUTION

PROMPTSETDATA.DATAEDITOR: <PRPTS ontop="1"><PRPTBOX><UC4RB_SIEBEL_MESSAGE_BODYs.00 haslist="0" msgnr="-1" msginsert="" altview="0" promptname="UC4RB_SIEBEL_MESSAGE_BODY#" ReadFromTable="OPSE">The system will shut down in a few minutes. Please save your works and log out!</UC4RB_SIEBEL_MESSAGE_BODYs.00><UC4RB_SIEBEL_MESSAGE_TYPEs.00 haslist="0" msgnr="-1" msginsert="" altview="0" promptname="UC4RB_SIEBEL_MESSAGE_TYPE#" ReadFromTable="OPSE">Normal</UC4RB_SIEBEL_MESSAGE_TYPEs.00><UC4RB_SIEBEL_EXP_TIMEs.00 haslist="0" msgnr="-1" msginsert="" altview="0" promptname="UC4RB_SIEBEL_EXP_TIME#" ReadFromTable="OPSE">3</UC4RB_SIEBEL_EXP_TIMEs.00><UC4RB_SIEBEL_SERVER_URLs.00 haslist="0" msgnr="-1" msginsert="" altview="0" promptname="UC4RB_SIEBEL_SERVER_URL#" ReadFromTable="OPSE">&ENV#?SIEBEL_URL</UC4RB_SIEBEL_SERVER_URLs.00><UC4RB_SIEBEL_PORTs.00 haslist="0" msgnr="-1" msginsert="" altview="0" promptname="UC4RB_SIEBEL_PORT#" ReadFromTable="OPSE">2321</UC4RB_SIEBEL_PORTs.00><UC4RB_SIEBEL_ENTERPRISEs.00 haslist="0" msgnr="-1" msginsert="" altview="0" promptname="UC4RB_SIEBEL_ENTERPRISE#" ReadFromTable="OPSE">&ENV#?SIEBEL_ENTRPR_SERVER</UC4RB_SIEBEL_ENTERPRISEs.00><UC4RB_SIEBEL_USERs.00 haslist="0" msgnr="-1" msginsert="" altview="0" promptname="UC4RB_SIEBEL_USER#" ReadFromTable="OPSE"></UC4RB_SIEBEL_USERs.00><UC4RB_SIEBEL_PASSWORDs.00 haslist="0" msgnr="-1" msginsert="" altview="0" promptname="UC4RB_SIEBEL_PASSWORD#" ReadFromTable="OPSE">--10</UC4RB_SIEBEL_PASSWORDs.00><UC4RB_SIEBEL_OBJECT_MANAGERs.00 haslist="0" msgnr="-1" msginsert="" altview="0" promptname="UC4RB_SIEBEL_OBJECT_MANAGER#" ReadFromTable="OPSE">&ENV#?SIEBEL_OBJECT_MANAGERS</UC4RB_SIEBEL_OBJECT_MANAGERs.00></PRPTBOX></PRPTS>

SCRIPT.MSCRI:
:SET &HND# = PREP_PROCESS_PROMPTSET(&PROMPTSET#) :PROCESS &HND# : SET &VAR# = GET_PROCESS_LINE(&HND#, 1) : SET &VAR_VALUE# = GET_SCRIPT_VAR(&VAR#) ! DEBUG START ! : PRINT "VAR = &VAR#" ! : PRINT "VAR_VALUE = &VAR_VALUE#" ! DEBUG END : SET &POS# = STR_FIND(&VAR_VALUE#, "?") : IF &POS# > 3 : SET &END_CONFIG_VARA_NAME# = &POS# - 1 : SET &CONFIG_VARA# = STR_CUT(&VAR_VALUE#, 1, &END_CONFIG_VARA_NAME#)
: SET &EXIST# = GET_OBJECT_TYPE("&CONFIG_VARA#") : IF &EXIST# <> 20223 : SET &START_CONFIG_VARA_KEY# = &POS# + 1 : SET &CONFIG_VARA_KEY# = STR_CUT(&VAR_VALUE#, &START_CONFIG_VARA_KEY#) ! Get value from configuration objects : SET &HND2#=PREP_PROCESS_VAR(&CONFIG_VARA#) : PROCESS &HND2# : SET &KEY# = GET_PROCESS_LINE(&HND2#, 1) : SET &K# = "&CONFIG_VARA_KEY#" : SET &V# = "" : SET &C# = "/" : SET &P# = STR_FIND(&CONFIG_VARA_KEY#, "/") : IF &P# EQ "0" : SET &P#=STR_FIND(&CONFIG_VARA_KEY#, "\") : SET &C# = "\" : ENDIF : IF &P# NE "0" : SET &PK# = &P# - 1 : SET &PV# = &P# + 1 : SET &K# = STR_CUT(&CONFIG_VARA_KEY#, 1, &PK#) : SET &V# = STR_CUT(&CONFIG_VARA_KEY#, &PV#) : ENDIF : IF &KEY# EQ &K# : SET &VALUE# = GET_PROCESS_LINE(&HND2#, 2) : IF &V# NE "" : SET &VALUE# = STR_CAT(&VALUE#, &C#) : SET &VALUE# = STR_CAT(&VALUE#, &V#) : ENDIF : SET_SCRIPT_VAR &VAR# = &VALUE# : P "&VAR# = &VALUE#" : ENDIF : ENDPROCESS : CLOSE_PROCESS &HND2# : ENDIF : ENDIF :ENDPROCESS :CLOSE_PROCESS &HND#

:ATTACH_RES "PCK.AUTOMIC_SIEBEL.PRV.STORE", "SIEBELTOOL.JAR", C, N :ATTACH_RES "PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PRV.STORE", "SHAREDTOOL.JAR", C, N
:SET &SIEBEL_TOOL_JAR# = STR_CAT(&$AGENT_RESOURCES_CLIENT#, "siebeltool.jar") :SET &SHARED_TOOL_JAR# = STR_CAT(&$AGENT_RESOURCES_CLIENT#, "sharedtool.jar")

HEADER.Title: Look up Environment Object & Configuration in a PromptSet

SCRIPT.MSCRI:
!INPUT &ENV_TITLE# !INPUT &UC4_PROMPTSET_NAME# !: PRINT "ENV_TITLE = &ENV_TITLE#" !: PRINT "UC4_PROMPTSET_NAME = &UC4_PROMPTSET_NAME#"
:IF &UC4_PROMPTSET_NAME# = "" : PRINT "ERROR: Variable UC4_PROMPTSET_NAME# is blank." : EXIT 4 :ENDIF
: SET &ENV# = "" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SIEBEL.PRV.INCLUDE.LOOKUP_ENV_OBJECT "ENV_OBJECT_NAME" = "ENV"
:IF &ENV# = "" : PRINT "ERROR: Environment Object &ENV_TITLE# is not found." : EXIT 4 :ENDIF
:SET &EXIST# = GET_OBJECT_TYPE("&ENV#") :IF &EXIST# = 20223 : PRINT "ERROR: Environment Object &ENV_TITLE# is not found." : EXIT 4 :ENDIF
: PRINT "Environment Object Name: &ENV#" : PUBLISH &ENV#
! Publish special variables defined in PCK.AUTOMIC_SIEBEL.PRV.VARA.ENV_PUBLISH_VARIABLES ! from configuration object : PRINT "Lookup special values in PCK.AUTOMIC_SIEBEL.PRV.VARA.ENV_PUBLISH_VARIABLES" : SET &HND3#=PREP_PROCESS_VAR(&ENV#) : PROCESS &HND3# : SET &KEY# = GET_PROCESS_LINE(&HND3#,1) : SET &variable_to_publish# = GET_VAR("PCK.AUTOMIC_SIEBEL.PRV.VARA.ENV_PUBLISH_VARIABLES", &KEY#, 1): : IF "&variable_to_publish#" <> "" : SET &VALUE# = GET_PROCESS_LINE(&HND3#,2) : PRINT "Found config entry &KEY#=&VALUE#" : PUB &VALUE#,"&variable_to_publish#", WORKFLOW : ENDIF : ENDPROCESS : CLOSE_PROCESS &HND3#
!Find the prompt set :PRINT "Lookup agent & login selected in the promptset &UC4_PROMPTSET_NAME#" :SET &SUFFIX# = " (From Environment)" :SET &HND# = PREP_PROCESS_PROMPTSET(&UC4_PROMPTSET_NAME#) :PROCESS &HND# : SET &VAR# = GET_PROCESS_LINE(&HND#,1) : SET &VAR_VALUE# = GET_SCRIPT_VAR(&VAR#) !: PRINT "VAR = &VAR#" !: PRINT "VAR_VALUE = &VAR_VALUE#" ! If the input value contains SUFFIX : IF "Y" = STR_MATCH("&VAR_VALUE#", "*&SUFFIX#") ! Get value from configuration object : SET &HND2#=PREP_PROCESS_VAR(&ENV#) : PROCESS &HND2# : SET &KEY# = GET_PROCESS_LINE(&HND2#,1) : IF "&VAR_VALUE#" = "&KEY#&SUFFIX#" : SET &VALUE# = GET_PROCESS_LINE(&HND2#,2) : PRINT "Found config entry &KEY#=&VALUE#" : SET_SCRIPT_VAR &VAR# = &VALUE# : PUB &VALUE#,"&VAR#", WORKFLOW : ENDIF : ENDPROCESS : CLOSE_PROCESS &HND2# : ENDIF :ENDPROCESS :CLOSE_PROCESS &HND#

HEADER.Title: Look up Environment Object by its Title

SCRIPT.MSCRI: !OUTPUT &ENV_OBJECT_NAME# : SET &MASTER_CONFIG# = "PCK.AUTOMIC_SIEBEL.PRV.VARA.CONFIGURATION_OBJECTS" : SET &ENV_OBJECT_NAME# = "" : SET &ENV_OBJECT_TITLE# = &ENV_TITLE# ! Look up Config Vara name by its title : SET &HND2#=PREP_PROCESS_VAR(&MASTER_CONFIG#) : PROCESS &HND2# : SET &TITLE# = GET_PROCESS_LINE(&HND2#,2) : IF &TITLE# EQ &ENV_OBJECT_TITLE# : SET &ENV_OBJECT_NAME# = GET_PROCESS_LINE(&HND2#,1) : PRINT "Found configuration object &ENV_OBJECT_NAME#" : ENDIF : ENDPROCESS : CLOSE_PROCESS &HND2#

:SET &SIEBEL_PROPERTIES# = "" :IF &UC4RB_SIEBEL_TXT_TIMEOUT# <> "" : SET &SIEBEL_PROPERTIES# = STR_CAT(&SIEBEL_PROPERTIES#, " -tt &UC4RB_SIEBEL_TXT_TIMEOUT#") :ENDIF :IF &UC4RB_SIEBEL_SESSION_TIMEOUT# <> "" : SET &SIEBEL_PROPERTIES# = STR_CAT(&SIEBEL_PROPERTIES#, " -st &UC4RB_SIEBEL_SESSION_TIMEOUT#") :ENDIF :IF &UC4RB_SIEBEL_NUM_RETRY# <> "" : SET &SIEBEL_PROPERTIES# = STR_CAT(&SIEBEL_PROPERTIES#, " -re &UC4RB_SIEBEL_NUM_RETRY#") :ENDIF

SCRIPT.MSCRI:
!get the agent OS type :SET &AGENT# = GET_SCRIPT_VAR("ENV_SIEBEL_SERVER_AGENT#")
:IF &AGENT# <> "" : PRINT "JOB: setting agent to &AGENT#" :ELSE ! : SET &AGENT# = GET_ATT(HOST) : PRINT "JOB: agent is preconfigured to &AGENT#" :ENDIF
:PSET &UC4RB_AGENT_OS# = GET_VAR('UC_HOST_JCL_VAR', &AGENT#) :PRINT "WORKFLOW: &AGENT# agent runs on &UC4RB_AGENT_OS#"
:PUBLISH &UC4RB_AGENT_OS#, , "TOP"

XHEADER.Title: Look up Environment Object & Configuration in a PromptSet

SCRIPT.MSCRI: :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SIEBEL.PRV.INCLUDE.LOOKUP_ENV_CONFIGURATION

XHEADER.Title: Append an "And" condition to a search spec

SCRIPT.MSCRI: !Input: &SEARCH_CONDITION# E.g: "[Name] LIKE" !Input: &SEARCH_VALUE# E.g: "My Object Name *" :IF "&SEARCH_VALUE#" <> "" : IF "&SEARCH_CONDITION#" <> "" : IF "&UC4_SIEBEL_SEARCH_SPEC#" = "" : SET &UC4_SIEBEL_SEARCH_SPEC# = "&SEARCH_CONDITION# '&SEARCH_VALUE#'" : ELSE : SET &UC4_SIEBEL_SEARCH_SPEC# = "&UC4_SIEBEL_SEARCH_SPEC# AND &SEARCH_CONDITION# '&SEARCH_VALUE#'" : ENDIF : PRINT "Search spec is now: &UC4_SIEBEL_SEARCH_SPEC#" : PUBLISH &UC4_SIEBEL_SEARCH_SPEC#, ,"WORKFLOW" : ENDIF :ENDIF

XHEADER.Title: Append an "Or" condition to a search spec

SCRIPT.MSCRI: !Input: &UC4_SIEBEL_SEARCH_SPEC# !Input: &SEARCH_CONDITION# E.g: "[Name] LIKE" !Input: &SEARCH_VALUE# E.g: "My Object Name *" :IF "&SEARCH_VALUE#" <> "" : IF "&SEARCH_CONDITION#" <> "" : IF "&UC4_SIEBEL_SEARCH_SPEC#" = "" : SET &UC4_SIEBEL_SEARCH_SPEC# = "&SEARCH_CONDITION# '&SEARCH_VALUE#'" : ELSE : SET &UC4_SIEBEL_SEARCH_SPEC# = "&UC4_SIEBEL_SEARCH_SPEC# OR &SEARCH_CONDITION# '&SEARCH_VALUE#'" : ENDIF : PRINT "Search spec is now: &UC4_SIEBEL_SEARCH_SPEC#" : PUBLISH &UC4_SIEBEL_SEARCH_SPEC#,,"WORKFLOW" : ENDIF :ENDIF

HEADER.Title: Agent List including dedicated agents of a Siebel Environment

Login List including dedicated logins of a Siebel Environment

DOCU_Docu.DOC:
= RB name = PCK.AUTOMIC_SIEBEL.PUB.ACTION.SHUTDOWN_SERVER_OR_CLUSTER_WEBLOGIC
= General description = Gracefully shuts down a running server instance or a cluster. The shutdown command waits for all the in-process work to be completed before shutting down the server or cluster.
= Inputs = * Host: IP or hostname of the Administration Server * Port: Port number used to connect to the Administration Server * Username: Username used to authenticate with WebLogic * Password: Password used to authenticate with WebLogic * Servers/Clusters: Name of the server(s) or cluster(s). Multiple Names can be given using ',' as seperator * Type: Server or cluster. Specifies if a server or cluster should be started * Ignore Sessions: Boolean value specifying whether WLST should drop all HTTP sessions immediately or wait for HTTP sessions to complete or timeout while shutting down. * Timeout (sec): Time (in seconds) that WLST waits for subsystems to complete in-process work and suspend themselves before shutting down the server. This argument defaults to 0 seconds, indicating that there is no timeout. * Force: Boolean value specifying whether WLST should terminate a server instance or a cluster without waiting for the active sessions to complete. This argument defaults to No, indicating that all active sessions must complete before shutdown. * Actions Temp Directory: Path to a temporary directory which shall be used for the creation of temporary scripts for WebLogic Actions. * Connection Protocol: Select connection protocol to connect WLST to server * Security options: Used this security option if above connection protocol is security (t3s, https, iiops).
= Behavior = (see general description)
= Outputs = * Return code is 0 if success * Return code is 1 if not success.
= Rollback = (none)
= Logging = (none)
= Example = (none)

SCRIPT.MSCRI:
:INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SIEBEL.PRV.INCLUDE.ATTACH_RESOURCES :DEFINE &STRING_ARR#,string,100 :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_HEADER_PARAM_VALIDATION
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Host" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_WEBLOGIC_HOST#
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Port" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_WEBLOGIC_PORT#
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Username" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_WEBLOGIC_USERNAME#
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Password" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_WEBLOGIC_PASSWORD#
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Servers/Clusters" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_WEBLOGIC_STOP_NAME#
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Type" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_WEBLOGIC_STOP_TYPE#
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Ignore Sessions" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_WEBLOGIC_IGNORE_SESS#
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Timeout (sec)" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_WEBLOGIC_TIMEOUT#
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Force" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_WEBLOGIC_FORCE#
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Actions Temp Directory" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_WEBLOGIC_TEMP_DIRECTORY#
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Connection Protocol" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_WEBLOGIC_USE_PROTOCOL#
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Security options" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_WEBLOGIC_USE_SECURITY#
:INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.SUDOERS_HEADER :IF &UC4RB_WEBLOGIC_TEMP_DIRECTORY# NE "" : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.NORMALIZE_PATH "UC4RB_CONVERTED_STRING" = "UC4RB_WEBLOGIC_TEMP_DIRECTORY"
: SET &UC4RB_CHECKME# = &UC4RB_WEBLOGIC_TEMP_DIRECTORY# : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.CHECK_UNIX_SHELL_FILE_EXISTS if [ "$ISFILE" -eq "1" ] ; then : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Actions Temp Directory" : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_ERROR# = "&UC4RB_WEBLOGIC_TEMP_DIRECTORY# is a file" : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_ERROR_PARAMETER exit 1 fi if [ "$EXIST" -eq "0" ] ; then mkdir -p "&UC4RB_WEBLOGIC_TEMP_DIRECTORY#" : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.CHECK_RETURN_CODE_UNIX_SHELL fi :ENDIF
:INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_HEADER_EXECUTION
!Begin my code :IF &UC4RB_WEBLOGIC_TEMP_DIRECTORY# EQ "" : SET &UC4RB_WEBLOGIC_TEMP_DIRECTORY# = GET_VAR('UC_EX_PATH_TEMP', &AGENT#) :ENDIF :SET &FILENAME# = "&UC4RB_WEBLOGIC_TEMP_DIRECTORY#/shutdown_server_or_cluster&$RUNID#.py" :SET &HOST_PORT# = STR_CAT("&UC4RB_WEBLOGIC_USE_PROTOCOL#://", "&UC4RB_WEBLOGIC_HOST#:&UC4RB_WEBLOGIC_PORT#")
echo " connect(sys.argv[1].strip(),sys.argv[2].strip(),'&HOST_PORT#'.strip()) import sys, string, os, os.path, time,traceback,shutil " >> "&FILENAME#"
:INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SIEBEL.PRV.INCLUDE.FNS4UNIX
echo " try: servers_arr = rf_prep_svrs('&UC4RB_WEBLOGIC_STOP_NAME#') sbean = '' if '&UC4RB_WEBLOGIC_STOP_TYPE#' == 'Server': sbean = 'Server' else: sbean = 'Cluster'
for server in servers_arr: if checkResourceExists(server,sbean) == false: raise '&UC4RB_WEBLOGIC_STOP_TYPE#: ' + server + ' does not exist. Aborting ...'
for server in servers_arr: if '&UC4RB_WEBLOGIC_STOP_TYPE#' == 'Server': domainRuntime() serverRuntime = getMBean( '/ServerRuntimes/' + server ) if serverRuntime == None: raise 'Server: ' + server + ' is NOT running. Aborting ...'
else: print 'Printing state of the cluster:' serverConfig() cd('/Clusters/'+server) servers_in_cluster = cmo.getServers() all_stopped = 'true' for server1 in servers_in_cluster: domainRuntime() serverRuntime = getMBean( '/ServerRuntimes/' + server1.getName() ) if serverRuntime == None: print 'Server: ' + server1.getName() + ' is NOT running in cluster: ' + server else: print 'Server: ' + server1.getName() + ' is running in cluster: ' + server all_stopped = 'false' if all_stopped == 'true': raise 'All servers in the cluster: ' + server + ' are NOT running. Aborting ...'
:PRINT "Ignore session = &UC4RB_WEBLOGIC_IGNORE_SESS#" :IF STR_LC (&UC4RB_WEBLOGIC_IGNORE_SESS#) = "yes" ignore = 'true' :ELSE ignore = 'false' :ENDIF
:PRINT "Force shutdown = &UC4RB_WEBLOGIC_FORCE#" :IF STR_LC (&UC4RB_WEBLOGIC_FORCE#)= "yes" force = 'true' :ELSE force = 'false' :ENDIF
for server in servers_arr: if '&UC4RB_WEBLOGIC_STOP_TYPE#' == 'Server': shutdown(server,'Server',ignore,&UC4RB_WEBLOGIC_TIMEOUT#,force, block='true') else: shutdown(server,'Cluster',ignore,&UC4RB_WEBLOGIC_TIMEOUT#,force, block='true') finally: disconnect('true')
" >> "&FILENAME#" !Finish creating python script file
:SET &UC4RB_ENCRYPTED_PASSWORD_TMP# = "&UC4RB_WEBLOGIC_PASSWORD#" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.DECRYPT_PASSWORD
:IF &UC4RB_WEBLOGIC_USE_PROTOCOL# = "t3s" OR "https" OR "iiops" : SET &UC4RB_WEBLOGIC_CMD# = 'java &UC4RB_WEBLOGIC_USE_SECURITY# weblogic.WLST "&FILENAME#" &UC4RB_WEBLOGIC_USERNAME# $UC4_DECRYPTED_PWD' :ELSE : SET &UC4RB_WEBLOGIC_CMD# = 'java weblogic.WLST "&FILENAME#" &UC4RB_WEBLOGIC_USERNAME# $UC4_DECRYPTED_PWD' :ENDIF
source /etc/profile . $WL_HOME/server/bin/setWLSEnv.sh &UC4RB_WEBLOGIC_CMD# OUT=$?
!clean up the &FILENAME# file rm "&FILENAME#"
if [ "$OUT" -gt "0" ] ; then exit $OUT; fi :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.SUDOERS_FOOTER !End my code

:IF &UC4RB_WEBLOGIC_TEMP_DIRECTORY# NE "" : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.NORMALIZE_PATH "UC4RB_CONVERTED_STRING" = "UC4RB_WEBLOGIC_TEMP_DIRECTORY"

if %errors% GTR 0 ( set retcode=%errors% goto :retcode ) :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_HEADER_EXECUTION !Begin my code
:IF &UC4RB_WEBLOGIC_TEMP_DIRECTORY# EQ "" : SET &UC4RB_WEBLOGIC_TEMP_DIRECTORY# = GET_VAR('UC_EX_PATH_TEMP', &AGENT#) :ENDIF :SET &FILENAME# = "&UC4RB_WEBLOGIC_TEMP_DIRECTORY#\shutdown_server_or_cluster&$RUNID#.py" :SET &HOST_PORT# = STR_CAT("&UC4RB_WEBLOGIC_USE_PROTOCOL#://", "&UC4RB_WEBLOGIC_HOST#:&UC4RB_WEBLOGIC_PORT#")
! Create jython script file echo connect(sys.argv[1].strip(),sys.argv[2].strip(),'&HOST_PORT#'.strip()) > "&FILENAME#" echo import sys, string, os, os.path, time,traceback,shutil >> "&FILENAME#"
:INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SIEBEL.PRV.INCLUDE.FNS4WINDOWS
echo try: >> "&FILENAME#" echo servers_arr = rf_prep_svrs('&UC4RB_WEBLOGIC_STOP_NAME#') >> "&FILENAME#"
echo. >> "&FILENAME#" echo sbean = '' >> "&FILENAME#" echo if '&UC4RB_WEBLOGIC_STOP_TYPE#' == 'Server': >> "&FILENAME#" echo sbean = 'Server' >> "&FILENAME#" echo else: >> "&FILENAME#" echo sbean = 'Cluster' >> "&FILENAME#"
echo. >> "&FILENAME#" echo for server in servers_arr: >> "&FILENAME#" echo if checkResourceExists(server,sbean) == false: >> "&FILENAME#" echo raise '&UC4RB_WEBLOGIC_STOP_TYPE#: ' + server + ' does not exist. Aborting ...' >> "&FILENAME#"
echo. >> "&FILENAME#" echo for server in servers_arr: >> "&FILENAME#" echo if '&UC4RB_WEBLOGIC_STOP_TYPE#' == 'Server': >> "&FILENAME#" echo domainRuntime() >> "&FILENAME#" echo serverRuntime = getMBean( '/ServerRuntimes/' + server ) >> "&FILENAME#" echo if serverRuntime == None: >> "&FILENAME#" echo raise 'Server: ' + server + ' is NOT running. Aborting ...' >> "&FILENAME#"
echo. >> "&FILENAME#" echo else: >> "&FILENAME#" echo print 'Printing state of the cluster: ' >> "&FILENAME#" echo serverConfig() >> "&FILENAME#" echo cd('/Clusters/'+server) >> "&FILENAME#" echo servers_in_cluster = cmo.getServers() >> "&FILENAME#" echo all_stopped = 'true' >> "&FILENAME#" echo for server1 in servers_in_cluster: >> "&FILENAME#" echo domainRuntime() >> "&FILENAME#" echo serverRuntime = getMBean('/ServerRuntimes/' + server1.getName()) >> "&FILENAME#" echo if serverRuntime == None: >> "&FILENAME#" echo print 'Server: ' + server1.getName() + ' is NOT running in cluster: ' + server >> "&FILENAME#" echo else: >> "&FILENAME#" echo print 'Server: ' + server1.getName() + ' is running in cluster: ' + server >> "&FILENAME#" echo all_stopped = 'false' >> "&FILENAME#"
echo. >> "&FILENAME#" echo if all_stopped == 'true': >> "&FILENAME#" echo raise 'All servers in the cluster: ' + server + ' are NOT running. Aborting ...' >> "&FILENAME#"
:PRINT "Ignore session = &UC4RB_WEBLOGIC_IGNORE_SESS#" :IF STR_LC (&UC4RB_WEBLOGIC_IGNORE_SESS#) = "yes" echo ignore = 'true' >> "&FILENAME#" :ELSE echo ignore = 'false' >> "&FILENAME#" :ENDIF
:PRINT "Force shutdown = &UC4RB_WEBLOGIC_FORCE#" :IF STR_LC (&UC4RB_WEBLOGIC_FORCE#)= "yes" echo force = 'true' >> "&FILENAME#" :ELSE echo force = 'false' >> "&FILENAME#" :ENDIF
echo. >> "&FILENAME#" echo for server in servers_arr: >> "&FILENAME#" echo if '&UC4RB_WEBLOGIC_STOP_TYPE#' == 'Server': >> "&FILENAME#" echo shutdown(server,'Server',ignore,&UC4RB_WEBLOGIC_TIMEOUT#,force, block='true') >> "&FILENAME#" echo else: >> "&FILENAME#" echo shutdown(server,'Cluster',ignore,&UC4RB_WEBLOGIC_TIMEOUT#,force, block='true') >> "&FILENAME#"
echo. >> "&FILENAME#" echo finally: >> "&FILENAME#" echo disconnect('true') >> "&FILENAME#" !Finish creating python script file
:SET &UC4RB_ENCRYPTED_PASSWORD_TMP# = "&UC4RB_WEBLOGIC_PASSWORD#" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.DECRYPT_PASSWORD
:IF &UC4RB_WEBLOGIC_USE_PROTOCOL# = "t3s" OR "https" OR "iiops" : SET &UC4RB_WEBLOGIC_CMD# = 'java &UC4RB_WEBLOGIC_USE_SECURITY# weblogic.WLST "&FILENAME#" &UC4RB_WEBLOGIC_USERNAME# %UC4_DECRYPTED_PWD% ' :ELSE : SET &UC4RB_WEBLOGIC_CMD# = 'java weblogic.WLST "&FILENAME#" &UC4RB_WEBLOGIC_USERNAME# %UC4_DECRYPTED_PWD% ' :ENDIF
call %WL_HOME%\server\bin\setWLSEnv.cmd call &UC4RB_WEBLOGIC_CMD# set retcode=%ERRORLEVEL%
!clean up the &FILENAME# file del "&FILENAME#"
@if NOT %retcode% == 0 goto :retcode
!End my code

DOCU_Docu.DOC:
= RB name = PCK.AUTOMIC_SIEBEL.PUB.ACTION.START
= General Description = This Action to start all Siebel Server in Siebel System. For Windows it can be that there is no start-script - in this case siebel is installed as a service and the appropriate service must be started. Starting Siebel by executing command via the CLI. With Unix user have to initialize the Siebel Environment first. This must be done inside the same Job as the execution of the Start-Script, since the JOB context is destroyed upon the finishing of each job.
= Inputs = * Siebel Environment Script Directory: The directory contains Siebel Environment Script. * Siebel Environment Script file : Siebel Environment Script file name. * List of Siebel Windows service: Comma-separated list of Windows Siebel Server Service that will be started.
= Behavior = (see general description)
= Outputs = * Return code is 0 if success. * Return code is 1 if not success.
= Rollback = = Logging = = Example = Example usage: @Windows: Parameters List Siebel Server Service = siebsrvr_SBA_81_siebel01, siebsrvr_SBA_81_siebel02
@Unix: The directory Siebel Environment Script = /opt/siebel/nas_rey Siebel Environment Script File name = siebel_basic.env

SCRIPT.MSCRI:
:INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SIEBEL.PRV.INCLUDE.ATTACH_RESOURCES @echo off :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_HEADER_PARAM_VALIDATION
:DEFINE &STRING_ARR#, string, 30 :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.NORMALIZE_PATH "UC4RB_CONVERTED_STRING" = "UC4RB_SIEBEL_SERVER_ROOT"
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Siebel Server Root Directory" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_SIEBEL_SERVER_ROOT#
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Siebel Gateway Server Address" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_SIEBEL_GATEWAY_SERVER#
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Siebel Enterprise Name" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_SIEBEL_ENTRPR_SERVER#
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Siebel Servers" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_SIEBEL_SERVERS#
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Siebel Server Administrator Username" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_SIEBEL_USERNAME#
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Siebel start timeout(s)" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_SIEBEL_START_TIMEOUT#
set /a errors=0 > nul
! Check if Siebel Tools directory exists :SET &UC4RB_CHECKME# = &UC4RB_SIEBEL_SERVER_ROOT# :INCLUDE PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.CHECK_WINDOWS_CONSOLE_FILE_EXISTS
if %ISDIR% == 0 ( : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Siebel Server Root Directory" : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_ERROR# = "&UC4RB_SIEBEL_SERVER_ROOT# is not a directory " : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_ERROR_PARAMETER set /a errors=2 > nul )
if %errors% GTR 0 ( set retcode=%errors% goto :retcode )
:INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_HEADER_EXECUTION
cd /d "&UC4RB_SIEBEL_SERVER_ROOT#\BIN" :SET &UC4RB_ENCRYPTED_PASSWORD_TMP#="&UC4RB_SIEBEL_PASSWORD#" :INCLUDE PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.DECRYPT_PASSWORD
:DEFINE &ARRAY#, string, 20 :FILL &ARRAY#[] = STR_SPLIT(&UC4RB_SIEBEL_SERVERS#, ",") :SET &LEN# = LENGTH(&ARRAY#[], SIZE)
! Check if servers exist :SET &VAR# = 1 :WHILE &VAR# LE &LEN# : SET &COMMAND# = 'srvrmgr /g "&UC4RB_SIEBEL_GATEWAY_SERVER#" /e "&UC4RB_SIEBEL_ENTRPR_SERVER#" ' : SET &COMMAND# = STR_CAT(&COMMAND#,'/u "&UC4RB_SIEBEL_USERNAME#" /p "%UC4_DECRYPTED_PWD%"') echo INFO: Check if server &ARRAY#[&VAR#] exists ... &COMMAND# /c "list server show SBLSRVR_NAME" | findstr /RC:"^&ARRAY#[&VAR#] " > nul @set retcode=%errorlevel% @if NOT %errorlevel% == 0 ( &COMMAND# /c "list server show SBLSRVR_NAME" echo ERROR: Server &ARRAY#[&VAR#] does not exist or input values are incorrect. Aborting ... goto :retcode ) : SET &VAR# = &VAR# + 1 :ENDWHILE
set time=0 :loop set fail_count=0
if %time% GEQ &UC4RB_SIEBEL_START_TIMEOUT# ( echo INFO: Servers are not running after &UC4RB_SIEBEL_START_TIMEOUT# seconds set retcode=1 goto :retcode ) ping 1.1.1.1 -n 1 -w 3000 > nul :SET &VAR# = 1 :WHILE &VAR# LE &LEN# : SET &COMMAND# = 'srvrmgr /g "&UC4RB_SIEBEL_GATEWAY_SERVER#" /e "&UC4RB_SIEBEL_ENTRPR_SERVER#" ' : SET &COMMAND# = STR_CAT(&COMMAND#,'/u "&UC4RB_SIEBEL_USERNAME#" /p "%UC4_DECRYPTED_PWD%"')
&COMMAND# /c "list server &ARRAY#[&VAR#] show SBLSRVR_STATE" | findstr /RC:"^Running" > nul set /a "fail_count+=%errorlevel%" : SET &VAR# = &VAR# + 1 :ENDWHILE
if not %fail_count% == 0 ( set /a "time+=3" goto :loop )
echo INFO: All servers are in Running state.

:INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SIEBEL.PRV.INCLUDE.ATTACH_RESOURCES :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_HEADER_PARAM_VALIDATION
:DEFINE &STRING_ARR#, string, 30 :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.NORMALIZE_PATH "UC4RB_CONVERTED_STRING" = "UC4RB_SIEBEL_SERVER_ROOT" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.NORMALIZE_PATH "UC4RB_CONVERTED_STRING" = "UC4RB_SIEBEL_ENV_SCRIPT_DIR"
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Siebel Server Root Directory" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_SIEBEL_SERVER_ROOT#
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Unix Environment Script Directory" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_SIEBEL_ENV_SCRIPT_DIR#
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Unix Environment Script File" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_SIEBEL_ENV_SCRIPT#
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Siebel Gateway Server Address" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_SIEBEL_GATEWAY_SERVER#
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Siebel Enterprise Name" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_SIEBEL_ENTRPR_SERVER#
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Siebel Servers" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_SIEBEL_SERVERS#
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Siebel Server Administrator Username" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_SIEBEL_USERNAME#
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Siebel start timeout(s)" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_SIEBEL_START_TIMEOUT# :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.SUDOERS_HEADER errors=0
! Check if Siebel Server Root directory exists :SET &UC4RB_CHECKME# = &UC4RB_SIEBEL_SERVER_ROOT# :INCLUDE PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.CHECK_UNIX_SHELL_FILE_EXISTS
if [ $ISDIR -eq 0 ] then :SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Siebel Server Root Directory" :SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_ERROR# = "&UC4RB_SIEBEL_SERVER_ROOT# is not a directory " :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_ERROR_PARAMETER errors=2 fi
! Check if Unix environment script directory exist :SET &UC4RB_CHECKME# = "&UC4RB_SIEBEL_ENV_SCRIPT_DIR#/&UC4RB_SIEBEL_ENV_SCRIPT#" :INCLUDE PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.CHECK_UNIX_SHELL_FILE_EXISTS if [ $ISFILE -eq 0 ] ; then : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Unix environment script directory/Unix environment script file" : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_ERROR# = "The env file doesn't exist" : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_ERROR_PARAMETER errors=1 fi
if [ $errors -gt 0 ] then exit $errors fi
:INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_HEADER_EXECUTION
cd "&UC4RB_SIEBEL_SERVER_ROOT#/bin" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.CHECK_RETURN_CODE_UNIX_SHELL
:SET &UC4RB_ENCRYPTED_PASSWORD_TMP#="&UC4RB_SIEBEL_PASSWORD#" :INCLUDE PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.DECRYPT_PASSWORD
:DEFINE &ARRAY#, string, 20 :FILL &ARRAY#[] = STR_SPLIT(&UC4RB_SIEBEL_SERVERS#, ",") :SET &LEN# = LENGTH(&ARRAY#[], SIZE)
! Call env script echo "Call env script &UC4RB_SIEBEL_ENV_SCRIPT_DIR#/&UC4RB_SIEBEL_ENV_SCRIPT#" . "&UC4RB_SIEBEL_ENV_SCRIPT_DIR#/&UC4RB_SIEBEL_ENV_SCRIPT#" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.CHECK_RETURN_CODE_UNIX_SHELL
! Check if servers exist :SET &VAR# = 1 :WHILE &VAR# LE &LEN# : SET &COMMAND# = 'srvrmgr /g "&UC4RB_SIEBEL_GATEWAY_SERVER#" /e "&UC4RB_SIEBEL_ENTRPR_SERVER#" ' : SET &COMMAND# = STR_CAT(&COMMAND#, '/u "&UC4RB_SIEBEL_USERNAME#" /p "$UC4_DECRYPTED_PWD"') echo INFO: Check if server &ARRAY#[&VAR#] exists ... &COMMAND# /c "list server show SBLSRVR_NAME" | grep "^&ARRAY#[&VAR#] " > /dev/null retcode=$? if [ $retcode -ne 0 ] then &COMMAND# /c "list server show SBLSRVR_NAME" echo ERROR: Server &ARRAY#[&VAR#] does not exist or input values are incorrect. Aborting ... exit $retcode fi : SET &VAR# = &VAR# + 1 :ENDWHILE
time=0 while [ $time -le "&UC4RB_SIEBEL_START_TIMEOUT#" ] do fail_count=0 :SET &VAR# = 1 :WHILE &VAR# LE &LEN# : SET &COMMAND# = 'srvrmgr /g "&UC4RB_SIEBEL_GATEWAY_SERVER#" /e "&UC4RB_SIEBEL_ENTRPR_SERVER#" ' : SET &COMMAND# = STR_CAT(&COMMAND#, '/u "&UC4RB_SIEBEL_USERNAME#" /p "$UC4_DECRYPTED_PWD"') &COMMAND# /c "list server &ARRAY#[&VAR#] show SBLSRVR_STATE" | grep "^Running" > /dev/null ret=$? if [ $ret -ne 0 ] then fail_count=$(( fail_count + 1 )) fi : SET &VAR# = &VAR# + 1 :ENDWHILE if [ $fail_count -eq 0 ] then break; fi time=$(( $time + 5 )) sleep 5 done
if [ $time -gt "&UC4RB_SIEBEL_START_TIMEOUT#" ] then echo INFO: Servers are not running after &UC4RB_SIEBEL_START_TIMEOUT# seconds exit 1 fi
echo INFO: All servers are in Running state. :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.SUDOERS_FOOTER

:INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SIEBEL.PRV.INCLUDE.ATTACH_RESOURCES :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_HEADER_PARAM_VALIDATION
:DEFINE &STRING_ARR#, string, 30 :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.NORMALIZE_PATH "UC4RB_CONVERTED_STRING" = "UC4RB_SIEBEL_ENV_SCRIPT_DIR" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.NORMALIZE_PATH "UC4RB_CONVERTED_STRING" = "UC4RB_SIEBEL_SERVICES"
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Siebel Environment Script Directory" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_SIEBEL_ENV_SCRIPT_DIR#
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Siebel Environment Script File" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_SIEBEL_ENV_SCRIPT#
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Siebel start script" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_SIEBEL_SERVICES# ! apply sudo :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.SUDOERS_HEADER :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_HEADER_EXECUTION :IF &UC4RB_SIEBEL_ENV_SCRIPT_DIR# NE "" : IF &UC4RB_SIEBEL_ENV_SCRIPT# NE "" . "&UC4RB_SIEBEL_ENV_SCRIPT_DIR#/&UC4RB_SIEBEL_ENV_SCRIPT#" : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.CHECK_RETURN_CODE_UNIX_SHELL : ENDIF :ENDIF
&UC4RB_SIEBEL_SERVICES# :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.CHECK_RETURN_CODE_UNIX_SHELL ! apply sudo :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.SUDOERS_FOOTER

:INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SIEBEL.PRV.INCLUDE.ATTACH_RESOURCES :IF &UC4RB_SIEBEL_SERVICES# = '' : PRINT ERROR: List of Siebel Windows services is required : EXIT 1 :ENDIF
@echo off setlocal enabledelayedexpansion
:INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_HEADER_PARAM_VALIDATION
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "List of Windows Siebel Server Service" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_SIEBEL_SERVICES#
:INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_HEADER_EXECUTION
! splits list of Windows services :DEFINE &ARRAY#, string, 20 :FILL &ARRAY#[] = STR_SPLIT(&UC4RB_SIEBEL_SERVICES#, ",") :SET &VAR# = 1 :SET &LEN# = LENGTH(&ARRAY#[], SIZE)
set /a total=&LEN# set fail_count=0 :WHILE &VAR# LE &LEN# echo INFO: Starting Windows Service &ARRAY#[&VAR#].. ! calls net start <service_name> for each Windows service net start "&ARRAY#[&VAR#]" if not %errorlevel% == 0 ( set /a "fail_count+=1" ) : SET &VAR# = &VAR# + 1 :ENDWHILE
if %fail_count% gtr 0 ( echo INFO: %fail_count% services failed to start echo INFO: Action finished with error set retcode=1 goto :retcode ) else ( echo INFO: Successfully started all Siebel services )

DOCU_Docu.DOC:
= RB name = PCK.AUTOMIC_SIEBEL.PUB.ACTION.START_COMPONENT
= General Description = This Action runs on the Siebel Server. This Action is used to start Siebel components. For starting Siebel you have to do some command via the CLI. With Unix you have to initialize the Siebel Environment first. This must be done inside the same Job as the execution of the Start-Script, since the JOB context is destroyed upon the finishing of each job.
= Inputs = * Siebel Environment Script: The full path of the siebel environment script. * Siebel Server Root Directory: The Siebel server root directory * Siebel Gateway Server Address: The Siebel gateway server address * Siebel Administrator username: * Siebel Administrator password: * Siebel Enterprise Name: The Siebel Enterprise name (defaults to siebel) * Siebel Servers To Start : Comma separated list siebel servers which will be started (ALL for all servers)
= Behavior = (see general description)
= Outputs = * Return code is 0 if success. * Return code is 1 if not success.
= Rollback =
= Logging =
= Example =

SCRIPT.MSCRI:
:INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SIEBEL.PRV.INCLUDE.ATTACH_RESOURCES :DEFINE &STRING_ARR#, string, 30 :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_HEADER_PARAM_VALIDATION
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Siebel Server Root Directory" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_SIEBEL_SERVER_ROOT#
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Siebel Gateway Server Address" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_SIEBEL_GATEWAY_SERVER#
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Siebel Server Administrator Username" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_SIEBEL_USERNAME#
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Siebel Enterprise Name" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_SIEBEL_ENTRPR_SERVER#
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Siebel Server" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_SIEBEL_SERVER#
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Object managers" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_SIEBEL_OBJECT_MANAGERS#
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Siebel Environment Script directory" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_SIEBEL_ENV_SCRIPT_DIR#
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Siebel Environment Script file name" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_SIEBEL_ENV_SCRIPT#
:SET &UC4RB_SIEBEL_ENV_SCRIPT_PATH# = "&UC4RB_SIEBEL_ENV_SCRIPT_DIR#/&UC4RB_SIEBEL_ENV_SCRIPT#" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.SUDOERS_HEADER error=0
! Validate siebel environment script :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.CHECK_UNIX_SHELL_FILE_EXISTS "&UC4RB_CHECKME#" = "&UC4RB_SIEBEL_ENV_SCRIPT_PATH#" if [ "$ISFILE" -eq "0" ] ; then echo "ERROR[Siebel Environment Script file]: &UC4RB_SIEBEL_ENV_SCRIPT_PATH# is not a valid file" error=1 fi
! Validate siebel server root :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.CHECK_UNIX_SHELL_FILE_EXISTS "&UC4RB_CHECKME#" = "&UC4RB_SIEBEL_SERVER_ROOT#" if [ "$ISDIR" -eq "0" ] ; then echo "ERROR[Siebel Server root]: &UC4RB_SIEBEL_SERVER_ROOT# is not a valid directory" error=2 fi
if [ "$error" -gt "0" ] ; then exit $error fi
! Prepare temp directory :SET &UC4RB_TEMP_DIRECTORY# = "" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.DISCOVER_TEMP_DIRECTORY.UNIX :SET &TMP_INPUT# = "&UC4RB_TEMP_DIRECTORY#/input.txt.&$RUNID#"
!*********************************************************************** :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_HEADER_EXECUTION
source "&UC4RB_SIEBEL_ENV_SCRIPT_PATH#" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.CHECK_RETURN_CODE_UNIX_SHELL
cd "&UC4RB_SIEBEL_SERVER_ROOT#/bin"
:SET &UC4RB_ENCRYPTED_PASSWORD_TMP#="&UC4RB_SIEBEL_PASSWORD#" :INCLUDE PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.DECRYPT_PASSWORD :SET &COMMAND# = './srvrmgr /g "&UC4RB_SIEBEL_GATEWAY_SERVER#" /u "&UC4RB_SIEBEL_USERNAME#" /p $UC4_DECRYPTED_PWD /s "&UC4RB_SIEBEL_SERVER#"' :IF &UC4RB_SIEBEL_ENTRPR_SERVER# NE "" : SET &COMMAND# = STR_CAT(&COMMAND#, ' /e "&UC4RB_SIEBEL_ENTRPR_SERVER#"') :ENDIF
output=`&COMMAND# /c "list appserver &UC4RB_SIEBEL_SERVER# show SBLSRVR_NAME,SBLSRVR_STATE"`
!Check if appserver exists echo "Checking server &UC4RB_SIEBEL_SERVER# state ..."
echo "$output" | grep "^&UC4RB_SIEBEL_SERVER# " RC=$? if [ "$RC" -gt "0" ] ; then echo "$output" exit $RC; fi
:IF &UC4RB_SIEBEL_OBJECT_MANAGERS# EQ "" echo $output | grep "^&UC4RB_SIEBEL_SERVER# " | grep " Running" > /dev/null RC=$? if [ "$RC" -gt "0" ] ; then echo "Server &UC4RB_SIEBEL_SERVER# is NOT running. Starting ..." output=`&COMMAND# /c "startup appserver &UC4RB_SIEBEL_SERVER#" 2>&1` echo "$output" echo "$output" | grep "^SBL-" > /dev/null if [ "$?" -eq "0" ] ; then exit 1 fi fi
:ELSE output=`&COMMAND# /c "list components show CC_ALIAS,CP_DISP_RUN_STATE"`
: DEFINE &ARRAY#, string, 20 : FILL &ARRAY#[] = STR_SPLIT(&UC4RB_SIEBEL_OBJECT_MANAGERS#, ",") : SET &VAR# = 1 : SET &LEN# = LENGTH(&ARRAY#[], SIZE) : WHILE &VAR# LE &LEN# : SET &COMP# = STR_TRIM(&ARRAY#[&VAR#]) echo "Checking component &COMP# state ..."
! Check if component exists echo "$output" | grep "^&COMP#" RC=$? if [ "$RC" -gt "0" ] ; then echo "Component &COMP# does not exist in server &UC4RB_SIEBEL_SERVER#. Exiting ..." exit 1 fi
! Check if component is already running echo "$output" | grep "^&COMP#" | egrep -e " Online| Running" > /dev/null RC=$? if [ "$RC" -eq "0" ] ; then echo "Component &COMP# is already running. Skipping ..." else echo "startup component &COMP#" >> "&TEMP#" fi : SET &VAR# = &VAR# + 1 : ENDWHILE
if [ -f "&TEMP#" ] ; then echo output=`&COMMAND# /b /i "&TEMP#" 2>&1` rm "&TEMP#" echo "$output" echo "$output" | grep "^SBL-" > /dev/null RC=$? if [ "$RC" -eq "0" ] ; then exit 1 fi fi
:ENDIF
! supply sudo :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.SUDOERS_FOOTER

:INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SIEBEL.PRV.INCLUDE.ATTACH_RESOURCES @echo off
:INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_HEADER_PARAM_VALIDATION
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Siebel Server Root Directory" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_SIEBEL_SERVER_ROOT#
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Siebel Gateway Server Address" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_SIEBEL_GATEWAY_SERVER#
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Siebel Server Administrator Username" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_SIEBEL_USERNAME#
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Siebel Enterprise Name" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_SIEBEL_ENTRPR_SERVER#
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Siebel Server" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_SIEBEL_SERVER#
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Object managers" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_SIEBEL_OBJECT_MANAGERS#
set /a errors=0 > nul
! Check if Siebel directory exists :SET &UC4RB_CHECKME# = &UC4RB_SIEBEL_SERVER_ROOT# :INCLUDE PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.CHECK_WINDOWS_CONSOLE_FILE_EXISTS
if %EXIST% == 0 ( : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Siebel Server Root Directory" : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_ERROR# = "Directory &UC4RB_SIEBEL_SERVER_ROOT# does not exist" : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_ERROR_PARAMETER set /a errors=1 > nul ) else ( if %ISDIR% == 0 ( : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Siebel Server Root Directory" : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_ERROR# = "&UC4RB_SIEBEL_SERVER_ROOT# exists but is not a directory " : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_ERROR_PARAMETER set /a errors=2 > nul ) ) if %errors% GTR 0 ( set retcode=%errors% goto :retcode )
! Prepare temp directory :SET &UC4RB_TEMP_DIRECTORY# = "" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.DISCOVER_TEMP_DIRECTORY.WINDOWS :SET &TEMP# = &UC4RB_TEMP_DIRECTORY#\temp_&$RUNID#.txt
!*********************************************************************** :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_HEADER_EXECUTION
cd /d "&UC4RB_SIEBEL_SERVER_ROOT#\BIN"
:SET &UC4RB_ENCRYPTED_PASSWORD_TMP#="&UC4RB_SIEBEL_PASSWORD#" :INCLUDE PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.DECRYPT_PASSWORD :SET &COMMAND# = '.\srvrmgr /g "&UC4RB_SIEBEL_GATEWAY_SERVER#" /u "&UC4RB_SIEBEL_USERNAME#" /p %UC4_DECRYPTED_PWD% /s "&UC4RB_SIEBEL_SERVER#"' :IF &UC4RB_SIEBEL_ENTRPR_SERVER# NE "" : SET &COMMAND# = STR_CAT(&COMMAND#, ' /e "&UC4RB_SIEBEL_ENTRPR_SERVER#"') :ENDIF
setlocal EnableDelayedExpansion &COMMAND# /c "list appserver &UC4RB_SIEBEL_SERVER# show SBLSRVR_NAME,SBLSRVR_STATE" > "&TEMP#" 2>&1
!Check if appserver exists echo Checking server &UC4RB_SIEBEL_SERVER# state ...
type "&TEMP#" | findstr /B "&UC4RB_SIEBEL_SERVER#" set retcode=%errorlevel% if not %retcode% == 0 ( type "&TEMP#" del "&TEMP#" goto :retcode )
echo. :IF &UC4RB_SIEBEL_OBJECT_MANAGERS# EQ "" ! Check if appserver is running. Start appserver if not already running type "&TEMP#" | findstr /B "&UC4RB_SIEBEL_SERVER#" | findstr " Running" > nul set retcode=%errorlevel% set start_ok=1 if not %retcode% == 0 ( echo Server &UC4RB_SIEBEL_SERVER# is NOT running. Starting ... &COMMAND# /c "startup appserver &UC4RB_SIEBEL_SERVER#" 2> "&TEMP#" type "&TEMP#" | findstr /B "SBL-" set start_ok=%errorlevel% )
! Check for errors when starting appserver if %start_ok% == 0 ( set retcode = 1 del "&TEMP#" goto :retcode ) :ELSE &COMMAND# /c "list components show CC_ALIAS,CP_DISP_RUN_STATE" > "&TEMP#"
: DEFINE &ARRAY#, string, 20 : FILL &ARRAY#[] = STR_SPLIT(&UC4RB_SIEBEL_OBJECT_MANAGERS#, ",") : SET &VAR# = 1 : SET &LEN# = LENGTH(&ARRAY#[], SIZE) : WHILE &VAR# LE &LEN# : SET &COMP# = STR_TRIM(&ARRAY#[&VAR#]) echo Checking component &COMP# state ... ! Check if component exists type "&TEMP#" | findstr /B "&COMP#" set retcode=%errorlevel% if not %errorlevel% == 0 ( echo Component &COMP# does not exist in server &UC4RB_SIEBEL_SERVER#. Exiting ... del "&TEMP#" goto :retcode ) ! Check if component is already running type "&TEMP#" | findstr "&COMP#" | findstr "Online Running" > nul if %errorlevel% == 0 ( echo Component &COMP# is already running. Skipping ... ) else ( echo startup component &COMP# >> "&TEMP#_" ) : SET &VAR# = &VAR# + 1 : ENDWHILE
echo. set start_ok=1 if exist "&TEMP#_" ( &COMMAND# /b /i "&TEMP#_" 2> "&TEMP#" del "&TEMP#_" type "&TEMP#" | findstr /B "SBL-" set start_ok=%errorlevel% ) if %start_ok% == 0 ( set retcode = 1 del "&TEMP#" goto :retcode ) :ENDIF
del "&TEMP#"

PROMPTSETDATA.DATAEDITOR: <PRPTS ontop="1"><PRPTBOX><UC4RB_SIEBEL_ENV_SCRIPT_DIRs.00 haslist="0" msgnr="-1" msginsert="" altview="0" promptname="UC4RB_SIEBEL_ENV_SCRIPT_DIR#" ReadFromTable="OPSE">&ENV#?UNIX_SIEBEL_ENV_SCRIPT_DIR</UC4RB_SIEBEL_ENV_SCRIPT_DIRs.00><UC4RB_SIEBEL_ENV_SCRIPTs.00 haslist="0" msgnr="-1" msginsert="" altview="0" promptname="UC4RB_SIEBEL_ENV_SCRIPT#" ReadFromTable="OPSE">&ENV#?UNIX_SIEBEL_ENV_SCRIPT</UC4RB_SIEBEL_ENV_SCRIPTs.00><UC4RB_SIEBEL_SERVER_ROOTs.00 haslist="0" msgnr="-1" msginsert="" altview="0" promptname="UC4RB_SIEBEL_SERVER_ROOT#" ReadFromTable="OPSE">&ENV#?SIEBEL_SERVER_ROOT</UC4RB_SIEBEL_SERVER_ROOTs.00><UC4RB_SIEBEL_GATEWAY_SERVERs.00 haslist="0" msgnr="-1" msginsert="" altview="0" promptname="UC4RB_SIEBEL_GATEWAY_SERVER#" ReadFromTable="OPSE">&ENV#?SIEBEL_GATEWAY_SERVER</UC4RB_SIEBEL_GATEWAY_SERVERs.00><UC4RB_SIEBEL_USERNAMEs.00 haslist="0" msgnr="-1" msginsert="" altview="0" promptname="UC4RB_SIEBEL_USERNAME#" ReadFromTable="OPSE"></UC4RB_SIEBEL_USERNAMEs.00><UC4RB_SIEBEL_PASSWORDs.00 haslist="0" msgnr="-1" msginsert="" altview="0" promptname="UC4RB_SIEBEL_PASSWORD#" ReadFromTable="OPSE">--10</UC4RB_SIEBEL_PASSWORDs.00><UC4RB_SIEBEL_ENTRPR_SERVERs.00 haslist="0" msgnr="-1" msginsert="" altview="0" promptname="UC4RB_SIEBEL_ENTRPR_SERVER#" ReadFromTable="OPSE">&ENV#?SIEBEL_ENTRPR_SERVER</UC4RB_SIEBEL_ENTRPR_SERVERs.00><UC4RB_SIEBEL_SERVERs.00 haslist="0" msgnr="-1" msginsert="" altview="0" promptname="UC4RB_SIEBEL_SERVER#" ReadFromTable="OPSE"></UC4RB_SIEBEL_SERVERs.00><UC4RB_SIEBEL_OBJECT_MANAGERSs.00 haslist="0" msgnr="-1" msginsert="" altview="0" promptname="UC4RB_SIEBEL_OBJECT_MANAGERS#" ReadFromTable="OPSE"></UC4RB_SIEBEL_OBJECT_MANAGERSs.00></PRPTBOX></PRPTS>

DOCU_Docu.DOC: = RB name = Action name: PCK.AUTOMIC_SIEBEL.PUB.ACTION.START_IIS = General description = This function allows the IIS service to be started. IIS version checking is not required for this function. = Inputs = = Behavior = (see general description) = Outputs = * Return code is 0 if success. * Return code is 1 if not success. = Rollback = (none) = Logging = (none) = Example = (none)

SCRIPT.MSCRI:
:INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SIEBEL.PRV.INCLUDE.ATTACH_RESOURCES @echo off setlocal enabledelayedexpansion
:INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_HEADER_PARAM_VALIDATION
! Check IIS control command line utility exists if not exist "%SYSTEMROOT%\system32\iisreset.exe" ( : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "IIS control command line utility" : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_ERROR# = "iisreset.exe does not exist" : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_ERROR_PARAMETER set retcode=1 goto :retcode )
:INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.CHANGE_FOLDER_TO_AGENT_BIN
:INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_HEADER_EXECUTION ! Start the IIS service %SYSTEMROOT%\system32\iisreset.exe /START :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.CHECK_RETURN_CODE_WINDOWS_CONSOLE ! Display the status %SYSTEMROOT%\system32\iisreset.exe /STATUS :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.CHECK_RETURN_CODE_WINDOWS_CONSOLE

DOCU_Docu.DOC:
= RB name = PCK.AUTOMIC_SIEBEL.PUB.ACTION.START_IPLANET
= General description = Starts iPlanet using the startup scriptÂprovided by the serverÂor starting a preconfigured Windows service/Unix deamon.Â
= Inputs = * Start mode: If 'script' the runbook function starts SunOne using the a script found in UC4RB_HOME_DIR# with the name of UC4RB_SERVICE_FILE_NAME# If 'service', it is assumed, that the Windows service/Unix deamon is preconfigured and the runbook function starts the service/deamon. * Service names/Script Filenames: When 'service' is chosen: For Windows: names of the services, separated by commas For Unix: script with full path in your init.d folder to call (e.g.: /etc/init.d/sunone) When 'script' is chosen: For Windows and Unix the full path of the script must be specified, separated by commas (E.g: C:\Program Files\Oracle\WebServer7\https-vwgaraiis01.arademo.local\bin\startserv.bat, C:\Program Files\Oracle\WebServer7\admin-server\bin\startserv.bat) = Behavior = (see general description)
= Outputs = * Return code is 0 if success, iPlanet server(s) are started. * Return code is 1 if not success.
= Rollback = (none)
= Logging = (none)
= Example = (none)

SCRIPT.MSCRI:
:INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SIEBEL.PRV.INCLUDE.ATTACH_RESOURCES :DEFINE &STRING_ARR#, string, 30 :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_HEADER_PARAM_VALIDATION
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Start mode" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_START_MODE#
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Service name/Script Filename" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_SERVICE_FILE_NAME#
:INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_HEADER_EXECUTION
!Begin my code :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.SUDOERS_HEADER :DEFINE &ARRAY#, string, 20 :FILL &ARRAY#[] = STR_SPLIT(&UC4RB_SERVICE_FILE_NAME#, ",") :SET &LEN# = LENGTH(&ARRAY#[], SIZE) :SET &VAR# = 1
:WHILE &VAR# LE &LEN# : SET &SCRIPT# = STR_TRIM(&ARRAY#[&VAR#])
: IF &UC4RB_START_MODE# = "script" echo "Running script: &SCRIPT#" "&SCRIPT#" : ELSE echo INFO: Run service: &SCRIPT# "&SCRIPT#" start : ENDIF
: INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.CHECK_RETURN_CODE_UNIX_SHELL : SET &VAR# = &VAR# + 1 :ENDWHILE :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.SUDOERS_FOOTER !End my code

:INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SIEBEL.PRV.INCLUDE.ATTACH_RESOURCES @echo off
:INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_HEADER_PARAM_VALIDATION
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Start mode" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_START_MODE#
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Service name/Script Filename" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_SERVICE_FILE_NAME#
:INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_HEADER_EXECUTION
!Begin my code :DEFINE &ARRAY#, string, 20 :FILL &ARRAY#[] = STR_SPLIT(&UC4RB_SERVICE_FILE_NAME#, ",") :SET &LEN# = LENGTH(&ARRAY#[], SIZE) :SET &VAR# = 1
@echo off
:WHILE &VAR# LE &LEN# : SET &SCRIPT# = STR_TRIM(&ARRAY#[&VAR#])
: IF &UC4RB_START_MODE# = "script" echo INFO: Run script: &SCRIPT# call "&SCRIPT#" : ELSE echo INFO: Run service: &SCRIPT# net start "&SCRIPT#" : ENDIF
: INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.CHECK_RETURN_CODE_WINDOWS_CONSOLE : SET &VAR# = &VAR# + 1 :ENDWHILE !End my code
