DOCU_Docu.DOC:
= RB name = PCK.AUTOMIC_SIEBEL.PUB.ACTION.START_SERVER_OR_CLUSTER_WEBLOGIC = General description = Starts a Managed Server instance or a cluster using a Node Manager. WLST must be connected to the Administration Server and the Node Manager must be running. = Inputs = * Host: IP or hostname of the Administration Server * Port: Port number used to connect to the Administration Server * Username: Username used to authenticate with WebLogic * Password: Password used to authenticate with WebLogic * Servers/Clusters: Name of the server(s) or cluster(s). Multiple Names can be given using ',' as seperator * Type: Server or cluster. Specifies if a server of cluster should be started * Actions Temp Directory: Path to a temporary directory which shall be used for the creation of temporary scripts for WebLogic Actions. * Connection Protocol: Select connection protocol to connect WLST to server * Security options: Used this security option if above connection protocol is security (t3s, https, iiops).
= Behavior = (see general description) = Outputs = * Return code is 0 if success * Return code is 1 if not success. = Rollback = (none) = Logging = (none) = Example = (none)

SCRIPT.MSCRI:
echo. >> "&FILENAME#" echo def rf_trim_comma(str): >> "&FILENAME#" echo if str[:1] == ',': >> "&FILENAME#" echo str = str[1:len(str)] >> "&FILENAME#"
echo. >> "&FILENAME#" echo if str[len(str)-1:] == ',': >> "&FILENAME#" echo str = str[:len(str)-1] >> "&FILENAME#"
echo. >> "&FILENAME#" echo return str >> "&FILENAME#"
echo. >> "&FILENAME#"
echo. >> "&FILENAME#" echo def rf_prep_str(val): >> "&FILENAME#" echo if val == None: >> "&FILENAME#" echo return None >> "&FILENAME#"
echo. >> "&FILENAME#" echo i = len(val) >> "&FILENAME#" echo if i == 0: >> "&FILENAME#" echo return None >> "&FILENAME#"
echo. >> "&FILENAME#" echo retval = val.strip() >> "&FILENAME#" echo retval = rf_trim_comma(retval) >> "&FILENAME#"
echo. >> "&FILENAME#" echo j = len(retval) >> "&FILENAME#"
echo. >> "&FILENAME#" echo if i != j: >> "&FILENAME#" echo retval = rf_prep_str(retval) >> "&FILENAME#"
echo. >> "&FILENAME#" echo return retval >> "&FILENAME#"
echo. >> "&FILENAME#"
echo. >> "&FILENAME#" echo def rf_prep_svrs_nodes(str1, str2): >> "&FILENAME#" echo arr1 = rf_prep_svrs(str1) >> "&FILENAME#" echo arr2 = rf_prep_svrs(str2) >> "&FILENAME#"
echo. >> "&FILENAME#" echo if len(arr1) != len(arr2): >> "&FILENAME#" echo raise 'Unequal no. of elements in each string array' >> "&FILENAME#" echo else: >> "&FILENAME#" echo retarr = [] >> "&FILENAME#" echo for item1, item2 in zip(arr1, arr2): >> "&FILENAME#" echo #node_server = {\nodename\: item2.strip(), \servername\: item1.strip()} >> "&FILENAME#" echo node_server = {'nodename': item2.strip(), 'servername': item1.strip()} >> "&FILENAME#" echo retarr.append(node_server) >> "&FILENAME#" echo return retarr >> "&FILENAME#"
echo. >> "&FILENAME#" echo def rf_prep_svrs(str1): >> "&FILENAME#" echo if str1 == None: >> "&FILENAME#" echo return None >> "&FILENAME#" echo if len(str1) == 0: >> "&FILENAME#" echo return None >> "&FILENAME#" echo. >> "&FILENAME#" echo str1 = rf_prep_str(str1) >> "&FILENAME#" echo if str1 == None: >> "&FILENAME#" echo return [] >> "&FILENAME#" echo arr1 = str1.split(','); >> "&FILENAME#" echo. >> "&FILENAME#" echo retarr = [] >> "&FILENAME#" echo for item1 in arr1: >> "&FILENAME#" echo if len(item1.strip()) ^> 0: >> "&FILENAME#" echo retarr.append(item1.strip()) >> "&FILENAME#" echo. >> "&FILENAME#" echo return retarr >> "&FILENAME#" echo. >> "&FILENAME#" echo def to_t_f(str): >> "&FILENAME#" echo if str.lower() == 'yes' or str.lower() =='true': >> "&FILENAME#" echo str = 'true' >> "&FILENAME#" echo elif str.lower() == 'no' or str.lower() =='false': >> "&FILENAME#" echo str ='false' >> "&FILENAME#" echo # return original value if not Yes or No echo return str >> "&FILENAME#" echo. >> "&FILENAME#"
echo. >> "&FILENAME#" echo def byte_array_to_string(arr): >> "&FILENAME#" echo str = '' >> "&FILENAME#" echo for b in arr: >> "&FILENAME#" echo str += chr(b) >> "&FILENAME#" echo return str >> "&FILENAME#" echo. >> "&FILENAME#"
echo. >> "&FILENAME#" echo def writeReport(m,filePath): >> "&FILENAME#" echo report_file = open(filePath,'w') >> "&FILENAME#" echo for list in m.items(): >> "&FILENAME#" echo str = "%%s#%%s\n" %% (list[0],list[1]) >> "&FILENAME#" echo report_file.write( str ) >> "&FILENAME#" echo report_file.close() >> "&FILENAME#" echo. >> "&FILENAME#"
echo. >> "&FILENAME#" echo def checkResourceExists(name, type): >> "&FILENAME#" echo if getMBean('/' + type + 's/' + name ) is None: >> "&FILENAME#" echo return false >> "&FILENAME#" echo else: >> "&FILENAME#" echo return true >> "&FILENAME#" echo. >> "&FILENAME#"
echo. >> "&FILENAME#" echo def checkAppExists(name): >> "&FILENAME#" echo found = false >> "&FILENAME#" echo try: >> "&FILENAME#" echo cd('/') >> "&FILENAME#" echo for app in cmo.getAppDeployments(): >> "&FILENAME#" echo appName = app.getName() >> "&FILENAME#" echo cd('/AppDeployments/' + appName) >> "&FILENAME#" echo applicationName = get('ApplicationName') >> "&FILENAME#" echo if applicationName == name: >> "&FILENAME#" echo found = true >> "&FILENAME#" echo break >> "&FILENAME#" echo except Exception: >> "&FILENAME#" echo return found >> "&FILENAME#" echo return found >> "&FILENAME#" echo. >> "&FILENAME#"
echo. >> "&FILENAME#" echo def getAppMBean(name,version): >> "&FILENAME#" echo mb = None >> "&FILENAME#" echo try: >> "&FILENAME#" echo cd('/') >> "&FILENAME#" echo for app in cmo.getAppDeployments(): >> "&FILENAME#" echo appName = app.getName() >> "&FILENAME#" echo cd('/AppDeployments/' + appName) >> "&FILENAME#" echo applicationName = get('ApplicationName') >> "&FILENAME#" echo if applicationName == name: >> "&FILENAME#" echo if version == '': >> "&FILENAME#" echo mb = getMBean('/AppDeployments/' + appName) >> "&FILENAME#" echo break >> "&FILENAME#" echo else: >> "&FILENAME#" echo appVersion = get('VersionIdentifier') >> "&FILENAME#" echo if appVersion == version: >> "&FILENAME#" echo mb = getMBean('/AppDeployments/' + appName) >> "&FILENAME#" echo break >> "&FILENAME#" echo except Exception: >> "&FILENAME#" echo return mb >> "&FILENAME#" echo return mb >> "&FILENAME#" echo. >> "&FILENAME#"

:INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SIEBEL.PRV.INCLUDE.ATTACH_RESOURCES :DEFINE &STRING_ARR#, string, 30 :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_HEADER_PARAM_VALIDATION
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Host" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_WEBLOGIC_HOST# :SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Port" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_WEBLOGIC_PORT# :SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Username" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_WEBLOGIC_USERNAME# :SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Servers/Clusters" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_WEBLOGIC_START_NAME# :SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Type" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_WEBLOGIC_START_TYPE# :SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Actions Temp Directory" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_WEBLOGIC_TEMP_DIRECTORY# :SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Connection Protocol" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_WEBLOGIC_USE_PROTOCOL# :SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Security options" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_WEBLOGIC_USE_SECURITY#
! apply sudo :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.SUDOERS_HEADER :IF &UC4RB_WEBLOGIC_TEMP_DIRECTORY# NE "" : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.NORMALIZE_PATH "UC4RB_CONVERTED_STRING" = "UC4RB_WEBLOGIC_TEMP_DIRECTORY"
: SET &UC4RB_CHECKME# = &UC4RB_WEBLOGIC_TEMP_DIRECTORY# : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.CHECK_UNIX_SHELL_FILE_EXISTS if [ "$EXIST" -eq "0" ] ; then mkdir -p "&UC4RB_WEBLOGIC_TEMP_DIRECTORY#" : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.CHECK_RETURN_CODE_UNIX_SHELL elif [ "$ISFILE" -eq "1" ] ; then : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Actions Temp Directory" : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_ERROR# = "&UC4RB_WEBLOGIC_TEMP_DIRECTORY# is a file" : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_ERROR_PARAMETER exit 1 fi
:ENDIF
:INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_HEADER_EXECUTION
!Begin my code :IF &UC4RB_WEBLOGIC_TEMP_DIRECTORY# EQ "" : SET &UC4RB_WEBLOGIC_TEMP_DIRECTORY# = GET_VAR('UC_EX_PATH_TEMP', &AGENT#) :ENDIF :SET &FILENAME# = "&UC4RB_WEBLOGIC_TEMP_DIRECTORY#/start_server_or_cluster&$RUNID#.py" :SET &HOST_PORT# = STR_CAT("&UC4RB_WEBLOGIC_USE_PROTOCOL#://", "&UC4RB_WEBLOGIC_HOST#:&UC4RB_WEBLOGIC_PORT#")
echo " connect(sys.argv[1].strip(),sys.argv[2].strip(),'&HOST_PORT#'.strip()) import sys, string, os, os.path, time,traceback,shutil " >> "&FILENAME#"
:INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SIEBEL.PRV.INCLUDE.FNS4UNIX
echo " try: servers_arr = rf_prep_svrs('&UC4RB_WEBLOGIC_START_NAME#') sbean = '' if '&UC4RB_WEBLOGIC_START_TYPE#' == 'Server': sbean = 'Server' else: sbean = 'Cluster'
for server in servers_arr: if checkResourceExists(server,sbean) == false: raise '&UC4RB_WEBLOGIC_START_TYPE#: ' + server + ' does not exist. Aborting ...'
for server in servers_arr: if '&UC4RB_WEBLOGIC_START_TYPE#' == 'Server': domainRuntime() serverRuntime = getMBean( '/ServerRuntimes/' + server ) if serverRuntime != None: raise 'Server: ' + server + ' is already running. Aborting ...'
else: print 'Printing state of the cluster:' serverConfig() cd('/Clusters/'+server) servers_in_cluster = cmo.getServers() all_running = 'true' i = 0 for server1 in servers_in_cluster: domainRuntime() serverRuntime = getMBean( '/ServerRuntimes/' + server1.getName() ) if serverRuntime == None: print 'Server: ' + server1.getName() + ' is NOT running in cluster: ' + server all_running = 'false' else: print 'Server: ' + server1.getName() + ' is running in cluster: ' + server i = i + 1 if i == 0: raise 'No servers in the cluster: ' + server + '. Aborting ...' if all_running == 'true': raise 'All servers in the cluster: ' + server + ' are running. Aborting ...'
for server in servers_arr: if '&UC4RB_WEBLOGIC_START_TYPE#' == 'Server': start (server,'Server',block='true') else: start (server,'Cluster',block='true') finally: disconnect('true')
" >> "&FILENAME#" !Finish creating python script file
:SET &UC4RB_ENCRYPTED_PASSWORD_TMP# = "&UC4RB_WEBLOGIC_PASSWORD#" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.DECRYPT_PASSWORD
:IF &UC4RB_WEBLOGIC_USE_PROTOCOL# = "t3s" OR "https" OR "iiops" : SET &UC4RB_WEBLOGIC_CMD# = 'java &UC4RB_WEBLOGIC_USE_SECURITY# weblogic.WLST "&FILENAME#" &UC4RB_WEBLOGIC_USERNAME# $UC4_DECRYPTED_PWD' :ELSE : SET &UC4RB_WEBLOGIC_CMD# = 'java weblogic.WLST "&FILENAME#" &UC4RB_WEBLOGIC_USERNAME# $UC4_DECRYPTED_PWD' :ENDIF
source /etc/profile . $WL_HOME/server/bin/setWLSEnv.sh &UC4RB_WEBLOGIC_CMD# OUT=$?
!clean up the &FILENAME# file rm "&FILENAME#"
if [ "$OUT" -gt "0" ] ; then exit $OUT; fi :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.SUDOERS_FOOTER !End my code

:INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SIEBEL.PRV.INCLUDE.ATTACH_RESOURCES @echo off : DEFINE &STRING_ARR#,string,100 :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_HEADER_PARAM_VALIDATION
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Host" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_WEBLOGIC_HOST# :SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Port" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_WEBLOGIC_PORT# :SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Username" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_WEBLOGIC_USERNAME# :SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Servers/Clusters" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_WEBLOGIC_START_NAME# :SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Type" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_WEBLOGIC_START_TYPE# :SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Actions Temp Directory" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_WEBLOGIC_TEMP_DIRECTORY# :SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Connection Protocol" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_WEBLOGIC_USE_PROTOCOL# :SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Security options" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_WEBLOGIC_USE_SECURITY#
set /a errors=0 > nul
:IF &UC4RB_WEBLOGIC_TEMP_DIRECTORY# NE "" : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.NORMALIZE_PATH "UC4RB_CONVERTED_STRING" = "UC4RB_WEBLOGIC_TEMP_DIRECTORY"
: SET &UC4RB_CHECKME# = &UC4RB_WEBLOGIC_TEMP_DIRECTORY# : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.CHECK_WINDOWS_CONSOLE_FILE_EXISTS if %ISFILE% == 1 ( : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Actions Temp Directory" : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_ERROR# = "&UC4RB_WEBLOGIC_TEMP_DIRECTORY# is a file" : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_ERROR_PARAMETER set /a errors=1 > nul ) if %EXIST% == 0 ( md "&UC4RB_WEBLOGIC_TEMP_DIRECTORY#" ) : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.CHECK_RETURN_CODE_WINDOWS_CONSOLE :ENDIF
if %errors% GTR 0 ( set retcode=%errors% goto :retcode )
:INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_HEADER_EXECUTION
!Begin my code :IF &UC4RB_WEBLOGIC_TEMP_DIRECTORY# EQ "" : SET &UC4RB_WEBLOGIC_TEMP_DIRECTORY# = GET_VAR('UC_EX_PATH_TEMP', &AGENT#) :ENDIF :SET &FILENAME# = "&UC4RB_WEBLOGIC_TEMP_DIRECTORY#\start_server_or_cluster&$RUNID#.py" :SET &HOST_PORT# = STR_CAT("&UC4RB_WEBLOGIC_USE_PROTOCOL#://", "&UC4RB_WEBLOGIC_HOST#:&UC4RB_WEBLOGIC_PORT#")
! Create jython script file echo connect(sys.argv[1].strip(),sys.argv[2].strip(),'&HOST_PORT#'.strip()) > "&FILENAME#" echo import sys, string, os, os.path, time,traceback,shutil >> "&FILENAME#"
:INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SIEBEL.PRV.INCLUDE.FNS4WINDOWS
echo try: >> "&FILENAME#" echo servers_arr = rf_prep_svrs('&UC4RB_WEBLOGIC_START_NAME#') >> "&FILENAME#"
echo. >> "&FILENAME#" echo sbean = '' >> "&FILENAME#" echo if '&UC4RB_WEBLOGIC_START_TYPE#' == 'Server': >> "&FILENAME#" echo sbean = 'Server' >> "&FILENAME#" echo else: >> "&FILENAME#" echo sbean = 'Cluster' >> "&FILENAME#"
echo. >> "&FILENAME#" echo for server in servers_arr: >> "&FILENAME#" echo if checkResourceExists(server,sbean) == false: >> "&FILENAME#" echo raise '&UC4RB_WEBLOGIC_START_TYPE#: ' + server + ' does not exist. Aborting ...' >> "&FILENAME#"
echo. >> "&FILENAME#" echo for server in servers_arr: >> "&FILENAME#" echo if '&UC4RB_WEBLOGIC_START_TYPE#' == 'Server': >> "&FILENAME#" echo domainRuntime() >> "&FILENAME#" echo serverRuntime = getMBean( '/ServerRuntimes/' + server ) >> "&FILENAME#" echo if serverRuntime != None: >> "&FILENAME#" echo raise 'Server: ' + server + ' is already running. Aborting ...' >> "&FILENAME#"
echo. >> "&FILENAME#" echo else: >> "&FILENAME#" echo print 'Printing state of the cluster: ' >> "&FILENAME#" echo serverConfig() >> "&FILENAME#" echo cd('/Clusters/'+server) >> "&FILENAME#" echo servers_in_cluster = cmo.getServers() >> "&FILENAME#" echo all_running = 'true' >> "&FILENAME#" echo i = 0 >> "&FILENAME#" echo for server1 in servers_in_cluster: >> "&FILENAME#" echo domainRuntime() >> "&FILENAME#" echo serverRuntime = getMBean('/ServerRuntimes/' + server1.getName()) >> "&FILENAME#" echo if serverRuntime == None: >> "&FILENAME#" echo print 'Server: ' + server1.getName() + ' is NOT running in cluster: ' + server >> "&FILENAME#" echo all_running = 'false' >> "&FILENAME#" echo else: >> "&FILENAME#" echo print 'Server: ' + server1.getName() + ' is running in cluster: ' + server >> "&FILENAME#" echo i = i + 1 >> "&FILENAME#" echo. >> "&FILENAME#" echo if i == 0: >> "&FILENAME#" echo raise 'No server in the cluster: ' + server + '. Aborting ...' >> "&FILENAME#" echo if all_running == 'true': >> "&FILENAME#" echo raise 'All servers in the cluster: ' + server + ' are already running. Aborting ...' >> "&FILENAME#"
echo. >> "&FILENAME#" echo for server in servers_arr: >> "&FILENAME#" echo if '&UC4RB_WEBLOGIC_START_TYPE#' == 'Server': >> "&FILENAME#" echo start (server,'Server',block='true') >> "&FILENAME#" echo else: >> "&FILENAME#" echo start (server,'Cluster',block='true') >> "&FILENAME#"
echo. >> "&FILENAME#" echo finally: >> "&FILENAME#" echo disconnect('true') >> "&FILENAME#" !Finish creating python script file
:SET &UC4RB_ENCRYPTED_PASSWORD_TMP# = "&UC4RB_WEBLOGIC_PASSWORD#" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.DECRYPT_PASSWORD
:IF &UC4RB_WEBLOGIC_USE_PROTOCOL# = "t3s" OR "https" OR "iiops" : SET &UC4RB_WEBLOGIC_CMD# = 'java &UC4RB_WEBLOGIC_USE_SECURITY# weblogic.WLST "&FILENAME#" &UC4RB_WEBLOGIC_USERNAME# %UC4_DECRYPTED_PWD% ' :ELSE : SET &UC4RB_WEBLOGIC_CMD# = 'java weblogic.WLST "&FILENAME#" &UC4RB_WEBLOGIC_USERNAME# %UC4_DECRYPTED_PWD% ' :ENDIF
call %WL_HOME%\server\bin\setWLSEnv.cmd call &UC4RB_WEBLOGIC_CMD# set retcode=%ERRORLEVEL%
!clean up the &FILENAME# file del "&FILENAME#"
@if NOT %retcode% == 0 goto :retcode !End my code

DOCU_Docu.DOC:
= RB name = PCK.AUTOMIC_SIEBEL.PUB.ACTION.STOP
= General Description = This Action runs on the Siebel Server. For Windows it can be that there is no stop-script - in this case siebel is installed as a service and the appropriate service must be stopped.
This Action is used to stop Siebel. For stoping Siebel you have to do some command via the CLI. With Unix you have to initialize the Siebel Environment first. This must be done inside the same Job as the execution of the Stop-Script, since the JOB context is destroyed upon the finishing of each job.
= Inputs = * Siebel Environment Script Directory: The directory contains Siebel Environment Script. * Siebel Environment Script file : Siebel Environment Script file name. * List of Siebel Windows service: Comma-separated list of Windows Siebel Server Service that will be started.
= Behavior = (see general description)
= Outputs = * Return code is 0 if success. * Return code is 1 if not success.
= Rollback =
= Logging =
= Example = Example usage: @Windows: Parameters List Siebel Server Service = siebsrvr_SBA_81_siebel01, siebsrvr_SBA_81_siebel02 @Unix: The directory Siebel Environment Script = /opt/siebel/nas_rey Siebel Environment Script File name = siebel_basic.env

SCRIPT.MSCRI:
:INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SIEBEL.PRV.INCLUDE.ATTACH_RESOURCES :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_HEADER_PARAM_VALIDATION
:DEFINE &STRING_ARR#, string, 30 :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.NORMALIZE_PATH "UC4RB_CONVERTED_STRING" = "UC4RB_SIEBEL_ENV_SCRIPT_DIR" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.NORMALIZE_PATH "UC4RB_CONVERTED_STRING" = "UC4RB_SIEBEL_SERVICES"
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Siebel Environment Script Directory" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_SIEBEL_ENV_SCRIPT_DIR#
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Siebel Environment Script File" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_SIEBEL_ENV_SCRIPT#
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Siebel stop script" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_SIEBEL_SERVICES#
! supply sudo :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.SUDOERS_HEADER :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_HEADER_EXECUTION :IF &UC4RB_SIEBEL_ENV_SCRIPT_DIR# NE "" : IF &UC4RB_SIEBEL_ENV_SCRIPT# NE "" . "&UC4RB_SIEBEL_ENV_SCRIPT_DIR#/&UC4RB_SIEBEL_ENV_SCRIPT#" : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.CHECK_RETURN_CODE_UNIX_SHELL : ENDIF :ENDIF
&UC4RB_SIEBEL_SERVICES# :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.CHECK_RETURN_CODE_UNIX_SHELL ! supply sudo :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.SUDOERS_FOOTER

:INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SIEBEL.PRV.INCLUDE.ATTACH_RESOURCES :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.POWERSHELL_UTILITY :IF &UC4RB_SIEBEL_SERVICES# = '' : PRINT List of Siebel Windows services is required : EXIT 1 :ENDIF
:INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_HEADER_PARAM_VALIDATION
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "List of Siebel Server system services" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_SIEBEL_SERVICES#
:INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_HEADER_EXECUTION
! splits list of Windows services :DEFINE &ARRAY#, string, 20 :FILL &ARRAY#[] = STR_SPLIT(&UC4RB_SIEBEL_SERVICES#, ",") :SET &LEN# = LENGTH(&ARRAY#[], SIZE)
:INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.CHANGE_FOLDER_TO_AGENT_BIN
:SET &VAR# = 1 :WHILE &VAR# LE &LEN#
$service = Get-Service -Name "&ARRAY#[&VAR#]" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.CHECK_RETURN_CODE_WINDOWS_POWERSHELL if ( $service.Status -eq 'Running' ) { echo "Stopping service &ARRAY#[&VAR#]" $service.Stop() $service.WaitForStatus('Stopped') if ($service.Status -ne 'Stopped') { echo "Could not stop service &ARRAY#[&VAR#]" __uc_return( 1 ) } else { echo "Service &ARRAY#[&VAR#] stopped" }
} else { echo "Service &ARRAY#[&VAR#] already stopped" } :SET &VAR# = &VAR# + 1 :ENDWHILE
__uc_return( 0 )

PROMPTSETDATA.DATAEDITOR: <PRPTS ontop="1"><PRPTBOX><UC4RB_SIEBEL_ENV_SCRIPT_DIRs.00 haslist="0" msgnr="-1" msginsert="" altview="0" promptname="UC4RB_SIEBEL_ENV_SCRIPT_DIR#" ReadFromTable="OPSE">&ENV#?UNIX_SIEBEL_ENV_SCRIPT_DIR</UC4RB_SIEBEL_ENV_SCRIPT_DIRs.00><UC4RB_SIEBEL_ENV_SCRIPTs.00 haslist="0" msgnr="-1" msginsert="" altview="0" promptname="UC4RB_SIEBEL_ENV_SCRIPT#" ReadFromTable="OPSE">&ENV#?UNIX_SIEBEL_ENV_SCRIPT</UC4RB_SIEBEL_ENV_SCRIPTs.00><UC4RB_SIEBEL_SERVICESs.00 haslist="0" msgnr="-1" msginsert="" altview="0" promptname="UC4RB_SIEBEL_SERVICES#" ReadFromTable="OPSE">&ENV#?WIN_SIEBEL_SERVICES</UC4RB_SIEBEL_SERVICESs.00></PRPTBOX></PRPTS>

DOCU_Docu.DOC:
= RB name = PCK.AUTOMIC_SIEBEL.PUB.ACTION.STOP_COMPONENT
= General Description = This Action runs on the Siebel Server. This Action is used to stop specified Siebel Components. For stoping Siebel you have to do some command via the CLI. With Unix you have to initialize the Siebel Environment first. This must be done inside the same Job as the execution of the Stop-Script, since the JOB context is destroyed upon the finishing of each job.
= Inputs = * Siebel Environment Script: The full path of the siebel environment script. * Siebel Server Root Directory: The Siebel server root directory * Siebel Gateway Server Address: The Siebel gateway server address * Siebel Administrator username: * Siebel Administrator password: * Siebel Enterprise Name: The Siebel Enterprise name (defaults to siebel) * Siebel Servers To Stop: Comma separated list siebel servers which will be stopped (ALL for all servers)
= Behavior = (see general description)
= Outputs = * Return code is 0 if success. * Return code is 1 if not success.
= Rollback =
= Logging =
= Example =

SCRIPT.MSCRI:
:INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SIEBEL.PRV.INCLUDE.ATTACH_RESOURCES :DEFINE &STRING_ARR#, string, 30 :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_HEADER_PARAM_VALIDATION
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Siebel Server Root Directory" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_SIEBEL_SERVER_ROOT#
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Siebel Gateway Server Address" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_SIEBEL_GATEWAY_SERVER#
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Siebel Server Administrator Username" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_SIEBEL_USERNAME#
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Siebel Enterprise Name" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_SIEBEL_ENTRPR_SERVER#
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Siebel Server" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_SIEBEL_SERVER#
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Object managers" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_SIEBEL_OBJECT_MANAGERS#
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Siebel Environment Script directory" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_SIEBEL_ENV_SCRIPT_DIR#
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Siebel Environment Script file name" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_SIEBEL_ENV_SCRIPT#
:SET &UC4RB_SIEBEL_ENV_SCRIPT_PATH# = "&UC4RB_SIEBEL_ENV_SCRIPT_DIR#/&UC4RB_SIEBEL_ENV_SCRIPT#" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.SUDOERS_HEADER error=0
! Validate siebel environment script :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.CHECK_UNIX_SHELL_FILE_EXISTS "&UC4RB_CHECKME#" = "&UC4RB_SIEBEL_ENV_SCRIPT_PATH#" if [ "$ISFILE" -eq "0" ] ; then echo "ERROR[Siebel Environment Script file]: &UC4RB_SIEBEL_ENV_SCRIPT_PATH# is not a valid file" error=1 fi
! Validate siebel server root :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.CHECK_UNIX_SHELL_FILE_EXISTS "&UC4RB_CHECKME#" = "&UC4RB_SIEBEL_SERVER_ROOT#" if [ "$ISDIR" -eq "0" ] ; then echo "ERROR[Siebel Server root]: &UC4RB_SIEBEL_SERVER_ROOT# is not a valid directory" error=2 fi
if [ "$error" -gt "0" ] ; then exit $error fi
:INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_HEADER_EXECUTION
source "&UC4RB_SIEBEL_ENV_SCRIPT_PATH#" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.CHECK_RETURN_CODE_UNIX_SHELL
cd "&UC4RB_SIEBEL_SERVER_ROOT#/bin"
:SET &UC4RB_ENCRYPTED_PASSWORD_TMP#="&UC4RB_SIEBEL_PASSWORD#" :INCLUDE PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.DECRYPT_PASSWORD :SET &COMMAND# = './srvrmgr /g "&UC4RB_SIEBEL_GATEWAY_SERVER#" /u "&UC4RB_SIEBEL_USERNAME#" /p $UC4_DECRYPTED_PWD /s "&UC4RB_SIEBEL_SERVER#"' :IF &UC4RB_SIEBEL_ENTRPR_SERVER# NE "" : SET &COMMAND# = STR_CAT(&COMMAND#, ' /e "&UC4RB_SIEBEL_ENTRPR_SERVER#"') :ENDIF
output=`&COMMAND# /c "list appserver &UC4RB_SIEBEL_SERVER# show SBLSRVR_NAME,SBLSRVR_STATE"`
!Check if appserver exists echo "Checking server &UC4RB_SIEBEL_SERVER# state ..."
echo "$output" | grep "^&UC4RB_SIEBEL_SERVER#" RC=$? if [ "$RC" -gt "0" ] ; then echo "$output" exit $RC; fi
:IF &UC4RB_SIEBEL_OBJECT_MANAGERS# EQ "" echo "$output" | grep "^&UC4RB_SIEBEL_SERVER#" | grep Shutdown > /dev/null RC=$? if [ "$RC" -gt "0" ] ; then echo "Server &UC4RB_SIEBEL_SERVER# is running. Shutting down ..." output=`&COMMAND# /c "shutdown appserver &UC4RB_SIEBEL_SERVER#" 2>&1` echo "$output" echo "$output" | grep "^SBL-" > /dev/null if [ "$?" -eq "0" ] ; then exit 1 fi fi
:ELSE output=`&COMMAND# /c "list components show CC_ALIAS,CP_DISP_RUN_STATE"`
: DEFINE &ARRAY#, string, 20 : FILL &ARRAY#[] = STR_SPLIT(&UC4RB_SIEBEL_OBJECT_MANAGERS#, ",") : SET &VAR# = 1 : SET &LEN# = LENGTH(&ARRAY#[], SIZE) : WHILE &VAR# LE &LEN# : SET &COMP# = STR_TRIM(&ARRAY#[&VAR#]) echo "Checking component &COMP# state ..."
! Check if component exists echo "$output" | grep "^&COMP#" RC=$? if [ "$RC" -gt "0" ] ; then echo "Component &COMP# does not exist in server &UC4RB_SIEBEL_SERVER#. Exiting ..." exit 1 fi
! Check if component is already running echo "$output" | grep "^&COMP#" | grep Shutdown > /dev/null RC=$? if [ "$RC" -eq "0" ] ; then echo "Component &COMP# already shutdown. Skipping ..." else echo "shutdown component &COMP#" >> "&TEMP#" fi : SET &VAR# = &VAR# + 1 : ENDWHILE
if [ -f "&TEMP#" ] ; then echo output=`&COMMAND# /b /i "&TEMP#" 2>&1` rm "&TEMP#" echo "$output" | grep "^SBL-" RC=$? if [ "$RC" -eq "0" ] ; then exit 1 fi fi
:ENDIF
! supply sudo :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.SUDOERS_FOOTER

:INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SIEBEL.PRV.INCLUDE.ATTACH_RESOURCES @echo off
:INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_HEADER_PARAM_VALIDATION
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Siebel Server Root Directory" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_SIEBEL_SERVER_ROOT#
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Siebel Gateway Server Address" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_SIEBEL_GATEWAY_SERVER#
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Siebel Server Administrator Username" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_SIEBEL_USERNAME#
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Siebel Enterprise Name" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_SIEBEL_ENTRPR_SERVER#
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Siebel Server" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_SIEBEL_SERVER#
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Object managers" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_SIEBEL_OBJECT_MANAGERS#
set /a errors=0 > nul
! Check if server root directory exists :SET &UC4RB_CHECKME# = &UC4RB_SIEBEL_SERVER_ROOT# :INCLUDE PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.CHECK_WINDOWS_CONSOLE_FILE_EXISTS
if %EXIST% == 0 ( : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Siebel server root directory" : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_ERROR# = "Directory &UC4RB_SIEBEL_SERVER_ROOT# does not exist" : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_ERROR_PARAMETER set /a errors=1 > nul )
if %ISDIR% == 0 ( : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Siebel server root directory" : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_ERROR# = "&UC4RB_SIEBEL_SERVER_ROOT# is not a directory " : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_ERROR_PARAMETER set /a errors=2 > nul )
if %errors% GTR 0 ( set retcode=%errors% goto :retcode )
! Prepare temp directory :SET &UC4RB_TEMP_DIRECTORY# = "" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.DISCOVER_TEMP_DIRECTORY.WINDOWS :SET &TEMP# = &UC4RB_TEMP_DIRECTORY#\temp_&$RUNID#.txt
!*********************************************************************** :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_HEADER_EXECUTION
cd /d "&UC4RB_SIEBEL_SERVER_ROOT#\BIN"
:SET &UC4RB_ENCRYPTED_PASSWORD_TMP#="&UC4RB_SIEBEL_PASSWORD#" :INCLUDE PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.DECRYPT_PASSWORD :SET &COMMAND# = '.\srvrmgr /g "&UC4RB_SIEBEL_GATEWAY_SERVER#" /u "&UC4RB_SIEBEL_USERNAME#" /p %UC4_DECRYPTED_PWD% /s "&UC4RB_SIEBEL_SERVER#"' :IF &UC4RB_SIEBEL_ENTRPR_SERVER# NE "" : SET &COMMAND# = STR_CAT(&COMMAND#, ' /e "&UC4RB_SIEBEL_ENTRPR_SERVER#"') :ENDIF
&COMMAND# /c "list appserver &UC4RB_SIEBEL_SERVER# show SBLSRVR_NAME,SBLSRVR_STATE" > "&TEMP#" 2>&1
!Check if appserver exists echo Checking server &UC4RB_SIEBEL_SERVER# state ...
type "&TEMP#" | findstr /B &UC4RB_SIEBEL_SERVER# set retcode=%errorlevel% if not %retcode% == 0 ( type "&TEMP#" del "&TEMP#" goto :retcode )
echo. :IF &UC4RB_SIEBEL_OBJECT_MANAGERS# EQ "" ! Check if appserver already shutdown. Stop appserver otherwise type "&TEMP#" | findstr /B &UC4RB_SIEBEL_SERVER# | findstr " Shutdown" > nul set retcode=%errorlevel% set stop_ok=1 if not %retcode% == 0 ( echo Server &UC4RB_SIEBEL_SERVER# is NOT shutdown. Shutting down ... &COMMAND# /c "shutdown appserver &UC4RB_SIEBEL_SERVER#" 2> "&TEMP#" type "&TEMP#" | findstr /B "SBL-" set stop_ok=%errorlevel% )
! Check for errors when stopping appserver if %stop_ok% == 0 ( set retcode = 1 del "&TEMP#" goto :retcode ) :ELSE &COMMAND# /c "list components show CC_ALIAS,CP_DISP_RUN_STATE" > "&TEMP#"
: DEFINE &ARRAY#, string, 20 : FILL &ARRAY#[] = STR_SPLIT(&UC4RB_SIEBEL_OBJECT_MANAGERS#, ",") : SET &VAR# = 1 : SET &LEN# = LENGTH(&ARRAY#[], SIZE) : WHILE &VAR# LE &LEN# : SET &COMP# = STR_TRIM(&ARRAY#[&VAR#]) echo Checking component &COMP# state ... ! Check if component exists type "&TEMP#" | findstr /B &COMP# set retcode=%errorlevel% if not %errorlevel% == 0 ( echo Component &COMP# does not exist in server &UC4RB_SIEBEL_SERVER#. Exiting ... del "&TEMP#" goto :retcode ) ! Check if component is already running type "&TEMP#" | findstr &COMP# | findstr " Shutdown" > nul if %errorlevel% == 0 ( echo Component &COMP# already shutdown. Skipping ... ) else ( echo shutdown component &COMP# >> "&TEMP#_" ) : SET &VAR# = &VAR# + 1 : ENDWHILE
echo. set stop_ok=1 if exist "&TEMP#_" ( &COMMAND# /b /i "&TEMP#_" 2> "&TEMP#" del "&TEMP#_" type "&TEMP#" | findstr /B "SBL-" set stop_ok=%errorlevel% ) if %stop_ok% == 0 ( set retcode = 1 del "&TEMP#" goto :retcode ) :ENDIF
del "&TEMP#"

POST_SCRIPT.OSCRI:
:SET &HND# = PREP_PROCESS_REPORT(, , "REP", "*") :PROCESS &HND# : SET &output_line# = GET_PROCESS_LINE(&HND#, 1)
: SET &POS#=STR_FIND(&output_line#, "Error (") : IF &POS# GT 0 : MODIFY_STATE RETCODE = 1 : ENDIF
: SET &POS#=STR_FIND(&output_line#, "SBL-") : IF &POS# GT 0 : MODIFY_STATE RETCODE = 1 : ENDIF
:ENDPROCESS

DOCU_Docu.DOC: = RB name = Action name: PCK.AUTOMIC_SIEBEL.PUB.ACTION.STOP_IIS = General description = This function allows the IIS service to be stopped. IIS version checking is not required for this function. = Inputs = = Behavior = (see general description) = Outputs = * Return code is 0 if success. * Return code is 1 if not success. = Rollback = (none) = Logging = (none) = Example = (none)

SCRIPT.MSCRI:
:INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SIEBEL.PRV.INCLUDE.ATTACH_RESOURCES @echo off setlocal enabledelayedexpansion
:INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_HEADER_PARAM_VALIDATION
! Check IIS control command line utility exists if not exist "%SYSTEMROOT%\system32\iisreset.exe" ( : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "IIS control command line utility" : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_ERROR# = "iisreset.exe does not exist" : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_ERROR_PARAMETER set retcode=1 goto :retcode )
:INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.CHANGE_FOLDER_TO_AGENT_BIN
:INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_HEADER_EXECUTION ! Start the IIS service %SYSTEMROOT%\system32\iisreset.exe /STOP :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.CHECK_RETURN_CODE_WINDOWS_CONSOLE ! Display the status %SYSTEMROOT%\system32\iisreset.exe /STATUS :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.CHECK_RETURN_CODE_WINDOWS_CONSOLE

DOCU_Docu.DOC: Stops iPlanet using the shutdown scriptÂprovided by the serverÂor stopping a preconfigured Windows service/Unix deamon.ÂÂ

SCRIPT.MSCRI:
:INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SIEBEL.PRV.INCLUDE.ATTACH_RESOURCES :DEFINE &STRING_ARR#, string, 30 :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_HEADER_PARAM_VALIDATION
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Stop mode" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_STOP_MODE#
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Service name/Script Filename" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_SERVICE_FILE_NAME#
:INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_HEADER_EXECUTION ! apply sudo :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.SUDOERS_HEADER !Begin my code :DEFINE &ARRAY#, string, 20 :FILL &ARRAY#[] = STR_SPLIT(&UC4RB_SERVICE_FILE_NAME#, ",") :SET &LEN# = LENGTH(&ARRAY#[], SIZE) :SET &VAR# = 1
:WHILE &VAR# LE &LEN# : SET &SCRIPT# = STR_TRIM(&ARRAY#[&VAR#])
: IF &UC4RB_STOP_MODE# = "script" echo "Running script: &SCRIPT#" "&SCRIPT#" : ELSE echo INFO: Run service: &SCRIPT# "&SCRIPT#" stop : ENDIF
: INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.CHECK_RETURN_CODE_UNIX_SHELL : SET &VAR# = &VAR# + 1 :ENDWHILE ! apply sudo :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.SUDOERS_FOOTER !End my code

:INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SIEBEL.PRV.INCLUDE.ATTACH_RESOURCES @echo off :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_HEADER_PARAM_VALIDATION
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Stop mode" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_STOP_MODE#
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Service name/Script Filename" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_SERVICE_FILE_NAME#
:INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_HEADER_EXECUTION
!Begin my code :DEFINE &ARRAY#, string, 20 :FILL &ARRAY#[] = STR_SPLIT(&UC4RB_SERVICE_FILE_NAME#, ",") :SET &LEN# = LENGTH(&ARRAY#[], SIZE) :SET &VAR# = 1
@echo off
:WHILE &VAR# LE &LEN# : SET &SCRIPT# = STR_TRIM(&ARRAY#[&VAR#])
: IF &UC4RB_STOP_MODE# = "script" echo Run script: &SCRIPT# call "&SCRIPT#" : ELSE echo Run service: &SCRIPT# net stop "&SCRIPT#" : ENDIF
: INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.CHECK_RETURN_CODE_WINDOWS_CONSOLE : SET &VAR# = &VAR# + 1 :ENDWHILE !End my code

DOCU_Docu.DOC: = RB name = PCK.AUTOMIC_SIEBEL.PUB.ACTION.SYNC_SCHEMA = General description = Command: cd UC4RB_SIEBEL_SERVER_HOME_DIR/bin D:\sba81\siebsrvr\bin\ddlimp2.exe /U UC4RB_SIEBEL_DB_USER /P UC4RB_SIEBEL_DB_PASSWORD /C UC4RB_SIEBEL_ODBC_CON_NAME /F UC4RB_SIEBEL_DDL_FILE_PATH/UC4RB_SIEBEL_DDL_FILE_NAME /T Y /I N /A Y /G <THE NAME Of the siebel users role [SSE_ROLE]> /S <INDEX TS>:(DATA TS> /Q UC4RB_SIEBEL_SQL_FILENAME /L UC4RB_SIEBEL_LOG_FILE_PATH/UC4RB_SIEBEL_LOG_FILE_NAME /W <DB Encoding> = Inputs = * Siebel Server Directory: The installation or root directory for Siebel Server * DDL file path: The path of the ddl that to import * Log file path: The name of the log file * DB User: The User of the Siebel DB * DB Password: The password of the db user * ODBC Data Source: The ODBC system data source name that Siebel server uses to connect to the Siebel database on the RDBMS * SQL file path: SQL Filename. On the command line the option /Q should be used. * Encoding: Unicode/CodePage ( default: CP ) * Import Tables: Import Tables? * Drop Obsolete Tables: Drop obsolete tables * Drop Obsolete Columns: Drop obsolete columns * Dont Rebuild Tables: Do not rebuild tables * Import Indexes: Import Indexes? (Option /I) * Parallel Index Create: Parallel index create * Only Drop Obsolete Indexes: Only drop obsolete indexes * Tablespace: Tablespace (Option /S) * Stop On DDL Error: Stop on DDL error? * Merge With Existing Schema: Merge with existing schema? * Additive Schema Change Only: Additive schema change only? (Option /A) * Repository Module Filename: Repository Module Filename * Grantee For Tables: Grantee for tables (Option /G) = Behavior = (see general description) = Outputs = * Return code is 0 if success * Return code is 4 if not success. = Rollback = (none) = Logging = (none) = Example = D:\sba81\siebsrvr\bin\ddlimp2.exe /U siebel /P ***** /C "SSD default instance" /F D:\sba81\dbsrvr\oracle\applet.ddl /T Y /I N /A Y /G D:\sba81\siebsrvr\bin\ddlimp2.exe /U siebel /P ***** /C "SSD default instance" /F D:\sba81\dbsrvr\oracle\applet.ddl /T Y /I N /A Y /G SSE_ROLE /S siebel:Siebel /Q D:\sba81\siebsrvr\log\additive_gen\output/schema.additive.sql /L D:\s

SCRIPT.MSCRI:
:INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SIEBEL.PRV.INCLUDE.ATTACH_RESOURCES
:DEFINE &STRING_ARR#, string, 30
! Normalize file path :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.NORMALIZE_PATH "UC4RB_CONVERTED_STRING" = "UC4RB_SIEBEL_SERVER_ROOT" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.NORMALIZE_PATH "UC4RB_CONVERTED_STRING" = "UC4RB_SIEBEL_DDL_FILE_PATH" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.NORMALIZE_PATH "UC4RB_CONVERTED_STRING" = "UC4RB_SIEBEL_LOG_FILE_PATH" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.NORMALIZE_PATH "UC4RB_CONVERTED_STRING" = "UC4RB_SIEBEL_SQL_FILE_PATH" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.NORMALIZE_PATH "UC4RB_CONVERTED_STRING" = "UC4RB_SIEBEL_ENV_SCRIPT_DIR"
:INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_HEADER_PARAM_VALIDATION
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Siebel Server Directory" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_SIEBEL_SERVER_ROOT#
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "DDL file path" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_SIEBEL_DDL_FILE_PATH#
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Log file path" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_SIEBEL_LOG_FILE_PATH#
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "DB User" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_SIEBEL_DB_USER#
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "DB Password" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_SIEBEL_DB_PASSWORD#
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "ODBC Data Source" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_SIEBEL_DATA_SOURCE#
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "SQL file path" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_SIEBEL_SQL_FILE_PATH#
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Encoding" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_SIEBEL_ENCODING#
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Import Tables" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_SIEBEL_IMPORT_TABLES#
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Drop Obsolete Tables" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_SIEBEL_DROP_OBS_TABLES#
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Drop Obsolete Columns" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_SIEBEL_DROP_OBS_COLUMNS#
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Dont Rebuild Tables" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_SIEBEL_DONT_REBUILD#
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Import Indexes" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_SIEBEL_IMPORT_INDEXES#
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Parallel Index Create" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_SIEBEL_PAR_INDEX_CREATE#
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Only Drop Obsolete Indexes" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_SIEBEL_DROP_OBS_INDEXES#
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Tablespace" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_SIEBEL_TABLESPACE#
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Stop On DDL Error" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_SIEBEL_STOP_ON_ERR#
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Merge With Existing Schema" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_SIEBEL_MERGE_SCHEMA#
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Additive Schema Change Only" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_SIEBEL_ADD_CHANGE#
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Repository Module Filename" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_SIEBEL_REPO_FILE_NAME#
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Grantee For Tables" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_SIEBEL_GRANTEE#
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Siebel Environment Script directory" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_SIEBEL_ENV_SCRIPT_DIR#
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Siebel Environment Script file name" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_SIEBEL_ENV_SCRIPT#
! <Begin of sudo script> :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.SUDOERS_HEADER
:SET &UC4RB_SIEBEL_ENV_SCRIPT_PATH# = "&UC4RB_SIEBEL_ENV_SCRIPT_DIR#/&UC4RB_SIEBEL_ENV_SCRIPT#" errors=0
! Validate siebel environment script :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.CHECK_UNIX_SHELL_FILE_EXISTS "&UC4RB_CHECKME#" = "&UC4RB_SIEBEL_ENV_SCRIPT_PATH#" if [ "$ISFILE" -eq "0" ] ; then echo "ERROR[Siebel Environment Script file]: &UC4RB_SIEBEL_ENV_SCRIPT_PATH# is not a valid file" errors=1 fi
! Check if Siebel directory exists :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.CHECK_UNIX_SHELL_FILE_EXISTS "&UC4RB_CHECKME#" = "&UC4RB_SIEBEL_SERVER_ROOT#" if [ "$ISDIR" -eq "0" ] ; then echo "ERROR[Siebel Server Directory]: &UC4RB_SIEBEL_SERVER_ROOT# is not a valid directory" errors=2 fi
if [ "$errors" -gt "0" ] ; then exit $errors fi
! Begin my code
:SET &IMPORT_TABLES# = "N" :IF &UC4RB_SIEBEL_IMPORT_TABLES# EQ "Yes"
: SET &IMPORT_TABLES# = "Y"
: IF &UC4RB_SIEBEL_DROP_OBS_TABLES# EQ "Yes" : SET &IMPORT_TABLES# = STR_CAT(&IMPORT_TABLES#, "4") : ENDIF
: IF &UC4RB_SIEBEL_DROP_OBS_COLUMNS# EQ "Yes" : SET &IMPORT_TABLES# = STR_CAT(&IMPORT_TABLES#, "5") : ENDIF
: IF &UC4RB_SIEBEL_DONT_REBUILD# EQ "Yes" : SET &IMPORT_TABLES# = STR_CAT(&IMPORT_TABLES#, "6") : ENDIF
:ENDIF

DOCU_Docu.DOC: = RB name = PCK.AUTOMIC_SIEBEL.PUB.ACTION.TRANSFER_WF_DEPLOYMENT_PACKAGE = General description = Rename the existing repository in order to create a backup on the target environment. = Inputs = * Source Host: The host to copy the Archive from. * Source Directory: The Directory where the Deployment Package should be copied from. * Source Deployment Package Name: The Name of the source Deployment Package. * Target Directory: The Directory where the Deployment Package is copied into. * Target Deployment Package Name: The Name of the target Deployment Package. = Behavior = (see general description) = Outputs = * Return code is 0 if success * Return code is 1 if not success. = Rollback = (none) = Logging = (none) = Example = (none)

SCRIPT.MSCRI:
:INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SIEBEL.PRV.INCLUDE.ATTACH_RESOURCES :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_HEADER_PARAM_VALIDATION
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Source Host" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_SIEBEL_SOURCE_HOST#
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Source Directory" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_SIEBEL_SOURCE_DIR#
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Source Deployment Package Name" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_SIEBEL_SOURCE_PCK_NAME#
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Target Directory" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_SIEBEL_TARGET_DIR#
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Target Deployment Package Name" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_SIEBEL_TARGET_PCK_NAME#
errors=0
:IF &UC4RB_SIEBEL_SOURCE_HOST# = "" : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Source Host" : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_ERROR# = "Source Host must be specified" : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_ERROR_PARAMETER errors=1 :ENDIF
if [ $errors -gt 0 ] then exit $errors fi

:INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SIEBEL.PRV.INCLUDE.ATTACH_RESOURCES @echo off setlocal enabledelayedexpansion :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_HEADER_PARAM_VALIDATION
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Source Host" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_SIEBEL_SOURCE_HOST#
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Source Directory" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_SIEBEL_SOURCE_DIR#
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Source Deployment Package Name" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_SIEBEL_SOURCE_PCK_NAME#
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Target Directory" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_SIEBEL_TARGET_DIR#
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Target Deployment Package Name" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_SIEBEL_TARGET_PCK_NAME#
set /a errors=0 > nul
:IF &UC4RB_SIEBEL_SOURCE_HOST# = "" : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Source Host" : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_ERROR# = "Source Host must be specified" : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_ERROR_PARAMETER set /a errors=1 > nul :ENDIF
if %errors% GTR 0 ( set retcode=%errors% goto :retcode )

DOCU_Docu.DOC: = RB name = PCK.AUTOMIC_SIEBEL.PUB.UNDEPLOY_INTEGRATION_OBJECTS = General description = Integration Objects are java components that can contain additional functionality and need to be deployed/undeployed. = Inputs = * Siebel Url: The name of the siebel Server. * Siebel Port: The port Siebel is listening on. * Siebel Enterprise: The Enterprise that the databean should connect to. * Siebel Username: The Siebel user to connect. * Siebel Password: The Password to connect with the Siebel user. * Object Manager: The Objectmanagers to connect with the Databean to check if Siebel is running. (No Spaces!!) * Business component: The Business Component that is affected. Default: Repository Repository * Business object: The Business Object that is affected. Default: Repository Repository * Filter: comma separated list of Integration Objects not to be undeployed * Server Url: siebel Server host * Siebel Enterprise: Enterprise that the databean should connect to. * Port: port Siebel is listening on. = Behavior = (see general description) = Outputs = * Return code is 0 if success * Return code is 4 if not success. = Rollback = (none) = Logging = (none) = Example = (none)

SCRIPT.MSCRI:
:DEFINE &STRING_ARR#, string, 30 :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SIEBEL.PRV.INCLUDE.ATTACH_RESOURCES
:INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_HEADER_PARAM_VALIDATION
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Server Url" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_SIEBEL_SERVER_URL#
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Port" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_SIEBEL_PORT#
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Siebel Enterprise" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_SIEBEL_ENTERPRISE#
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Siebel Username" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_SIEBEL_USER#
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Object Manager" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_SIEBEL_OBJECT_MANAGER#
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Business object" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_SIEBEL_BUSINESS_OBJECT#
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Business component" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_SIEBEL_BUSINESS_COMP#
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Filter" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_SIEBEL_FILTER#
:INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SIEBEL.PRV.INCLUDE.SET_SIEBEL_PROPERTIES :SET &COMMAND# = "java -jar ""&SIEBEL_TOOL_JAR#"" siebel UndeployIntegrationObjects " :SET &COMMAND# = STR_CAT(&COMMAND#, ' -h &UC4RB_SIEBEL_SERVER_URL# -pt &UC4RB_SIEBEL_PORT#') :SET &COMMAND# = STR_CAT(&COMMAND#, ' -su &UC4RB_SIEBEL_USER# -sp &UC4RB_SIEBEL_PASSWORD#') :SET &COMMAND# = STR_CAT(&COMMAND#, ' -e "&UC4RB_SIEBEL_ENTERPRISE#" -om &UC4RB_SIEBEL_OBJECT_MANAGER#') :IF &UC4RB_SIEBEL_BUSINESS_OBJECT# NE "" : SET &COMMAND# = STR_CAT(&COMMAND#, ' -bo "&UC4RB_SIEBEL_BUSINESS_OBJECT#"') :ENDIF
:IF &UC4RB_SIEBEL_BUSINESS_COMP# NE "" : SET &COMMAND# = STR_CAT(&COMMAND#, ' -bc "&UC4RB_SIEBEL_BUSINESS_COMP#"') :ENDIF
:IF &UC4RB_SIEBEL_FILTER# NE "" : SET &COMMAND# = STR_CAT(&COMMAND#, ' -ft "&UC4RB_SIEBEL_FILTER#"') :ENDIF :SET &COMMAND# = STR_CAT(&COMMAND#, "&SIEBEL_PROPERTIES#")
:INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_HEADER_EXECUTION ! <Begin of sudo script> :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.SUDOERS_HEADER
:INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.CHANGE_FOLDER_TO_AGENT_BIN &COMMAND# :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.CHECK_RETURN_CODE_UNIX_SHELL
:INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.SUDOERS_FOOTER ! <End of sudo script>

:INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SIEBEL.PRV.INCLUDE.ATTACH_RESOURCES @echo off :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_HEADER_PARAM_VALIDATION
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Server Url" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_SIEBEL_SERVER_URL#
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Port" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_SIEBEL_PORT#
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Siebel Enterprise" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_SIEBEL_ENTERPRISE#
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Siebel Username" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_SIEBEL_USER#
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Object Manager" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_SIEBEL_OBJECT_MANAGER#
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Business object" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_SIEBEL_BUSINESS_OBJECT#
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Business component" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_SIEBEL_BUSINESS_COMP#
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Filter" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_SIEBEL_FILTER#
:INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SIEBEL.PRV.INCLUDE.SET_SIEBEL_PROPERTIES :SET &COMMAND# = "java -jar ""&SIEBEL_TOOL_JAR#"" siebel UndeployIntegrationObjects " :SET &COMMAND# = STR_CAT(&COMMAND#, ' -h &UC4RB_SIEBEL_SERVER_URL# -pt &UC4RB_SIEBEL_PORT#') :SET &COMMAND# = STR_CAT(&COMMAND#, ' -su &UC4RB_SIEBEL_USER# -sp &UC4RB_SIEBEL_PASSWORD#') :SET &COMMAND# = STR_CAT(&COMMAND#, ' -e "&UC4RB_SIEBEL_ENTERPRISE#" -om &UC4RB_SIEBEL_OBJECT_MANAGER#') :IF &UC4RB_SIEBEL_BUSINESS_OBJECT# NE "" : SET &COMMAND# = STR_CAT(&COMMAND#, ' -bo "&UC4RB_SIEBEL_BUSINESS_OBJECT#"') :ENDIF
:IF &UC4RB_SIEBEL_BUSINESS_COMP# NE "" : SET &COMMAND# = STR_CAT(&COMMAND#, ' -bc "&UC4RB_SIEBEL_BUSINESS_COMP#"') :ENDIF
:IF &UC4RB_SIEBEL_FILTER# NE "" : SET &COMMAND# = STR_CAT(&COMMAND#, ' -ft "&UC4RB_SIEBEL_FILTER#"') :ENDIF :SET &COMMAND# = STR_CAT(&COMMAND#, "&SIEBEL_PROPERTIES#")
!Begin my code :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_HEADER_EXECUTION
:INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.CHANGE_FOLDER_TO_AGENT_BIN &COMMAND# :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.CHECK_RETURN_CODE_WINDOWS_CONSOLE !End my code

DOCU_Docu.DOC: = RB name = PCK.AUTOMIC_SIEBEL.PUB.ACTION.UPDATE_BUSINESS_OBJECT = General description = This generic action updates a specified business object. The business objects to update are matched by the search specification and the field/value updates are applied to all matches. In case of an error during the update of one of the business objects, the action continues to update the rest of the matches but fails and reports the error. = Inputs = * Siebel Username: The Siebel user to connect. * Siebel Password: The Password to connect with the Siebel user. * Object Manager: The Objectmanagers to connect with the Databean to check if Siebel is running. (No Spaces!!) * Server Url: siebel Server host * Siebel Enterprise: Enterprise that the databean should connect to. * Port: port Siebel is listening on. * Business object: The Business Object that is affected. * Business component: The Business Component that is affected. * Search Specification: The search specification that Siebel uses to identify the business objects should be updated * Fields List: Comma-separated list of fields to update of the business object * Values List: Comma-separated list of values according to the fields = Behavior = (see general description) = Outputs = * Return code is 0 if success * Return code is 4 if not success. = Rollback = (none) = Logging = (none) = Example = (none)

SCRIPT.MSCRI: :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SIEBEL.PRV.INCLUDE.SET_SIEBEL_PROPERTIES :JCL_CONCAT_CHAR "?" java -jar "&$AGENT_RESOURCES_CLIENT#siebeltool.jar" siebel UpdateBusinessComponent ? -h &UC4RB_SIEBEL_SERVER_URL# ? -pt &UC4RB_SIEBEL_PORT# ? -e &UC4RB_SIEBEL_ENTERPRISE# ? -su "&UC4RB_SIEBEL_USER#" ? -sp "&UC4RB_SIEBEL_PASSWORD#" ? -om "&UC4RB_SIEBEL_OBJECT_MANAGER#" ? -bc "&SIEBEL_BUSINESS_COMPONENT#" ? -bo "&SIEBEL_BUSINESS_OBJECT#" ? -ss "&SIEBEL_SEARCH_SPEC#" ? -bf "&SIEBEL_BO_FIELDS#" ? -bv "&SIEBEL_BO_VALUES#" &SIEBEL_PROPERTIES# :JCL_CONCAT_CHAR

:INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SIEBEL.PRV.INCLUDE.ATTACH_RESOURCES :DEFINE &STRING_ARR#, string, 30
:INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_HEADER_PARAM_VALIDATION
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Siebel Server Url" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_SIEBEL_SERVER_URL#
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Siebel Port" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_SIEBEL_PORT#
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Siebel Enterprise" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_SIEBEL_ENTERPRISE#
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Siebel Username" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_SIEBEL_USER#
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Siebel Password" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_SIEBEL_PASSWORD#
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Object Manager" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_SIEBEL_OBJECT_MANAGER#
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Business Component" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &SIEBEL_BUSINESS_COMPONENT#
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Business Object" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &SIEBEL_BUSINESS_OBJECT#
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Search Specification" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &SIEBEL_SEARCH_SPEC#
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Fields List" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &SIEBEL_BO_FIELDS#
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Values List" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &SIEBEL_BO_VALUES#
:INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_HEADER_EXECUTION !Begin my code ! <Begin of sudo script> :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.SUDOERS_HEADER
:INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.CHANGE_FOLDER_TO_AGENT_BIN :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.CHECK_RETURN_CODE_UNIX_SHELL :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SIEBEL.PRV.INCLUDE.UPDATE_BUSINESS_COMPONENT :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.CHECK_RETURN_CODE_UNIX_SHELL
:INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.SUDOERS_FOOTER ! <End of sudo script>
:INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.CHECK_RETURN_CODE_UNIX_SHELL !End my code

row.Name: SIEBEL_CFG_DATA_SOURCE
row.Value1: Datasource ( as in .cfg file ) that Siebel Tools connect to

row.Name: SIEBEL_CLIENT_ROOT
row.Value1: The Siebel client directory

row.Name: SIEBEL_ENTRPR_SERVER
row.Value1: The Siebel Enterprise name

row.Name: SIEBEL_GATEWAY_SERVER
row.Value1: The Siebel gateway server address

row.Name: SIEBEL_GATEWAY_SERVER_AGENT
row.Value1: The agent object used by the discovery tool to detect the Gateway Server settings

row.Name: SIEBEL_GATEWAY_SERVER_LOGIN
row.Value1: The login object used by the discovery tool to detect the Gateway Server settings

row.Name: SIEBEL_LANGUAGES
row.Value1: Comma separated list of the installed languages

row.Name: SIEBEL_OBJECT_MANAGERS
row.Value1: Comma separated list of Siebel Object Managers

row.Name: SIEBEL_ODBC_DATA_SOURCE
row.Value1: The ODBC system data source name that Siebel server uses to connect to the Siebel database on the RDBMS

row.Name: SIEBEL_PORT
row.Value1: The port number belongs to the SCBroker component

row.Name: SIEBEL_REPOSITORY_NAME
row.Value1: The name of the Siebel Repository

row.Name: SIEBEL_RETRY_NUMBER
row.Value1: Number of open session retries. Siebel will try to open a new session after a session is expired

row.Name: SIEBEL_ROOT
row.Value1: The Siebel home directory

row.Name: SIEBEL_SCRIPT_CFG_FILE
row.Value1: Siebel client config file name

row.Name: SIEBEL_SERVERS
row.Value1: Comma separated list Siebel servers

row.Name: SIEBEL_SERVER_AGENT
row.Value1: The agent object used by the discovery tool to detect the Siebel Server settings

row.Name: SIEBEL_SERVER_LOGIN
row.Value1: The login object used by the discovery tool to detect the Siebel Server settings

row.Name: SIEBEL_SERVER_ROOT
row.Value1: The Siebel server root directory

row.Name: SIEBEL_SESSION_TIMEOUT
row.Value1: Transaction timeout (in seconds) on the client side. A session define time of user's inactivity

row.Name: SIEBEL_SRF_FILE
row.Value1: The Siebel SRF file

row.Name: SIEBEL_TABLE_OWNER
row.Value1: The Siebel Database Table Owner

row.Name: SIEBEL_TOOLS_AGENT
row.Value1: The agent object used by the discovery tool to detect the Siebel Tools settings

row.Name: SIEBEL_TOOLS_CONFIG_FILE
row.Value1: The name of the config file of the Siebel tools

row.Name: SIEBEL_TOOLS_LOGIN
row.Value1: The login object used by the discovery tool to detect the Siebel Tools settings

row.Name: SIEBEL_TOOLS_ROOT
row.Value1: The installation or root directory for Siebel Tools

row.Name: SIEBEL_TXT_TIMEOUT
row.Value1: Transaction timeout (in milliseconds). A Siebel transaction is a series of user actions on a Siebel application

row.Name: SIEBEL_URL
row.Value1: Hostname/IP address of the Siebel machine

row.Name: SIEBEL_WEBSERVER_AGENT
row.Value1: The agent object used by the discovery tool to detect the Webserver settings

row.Name: SIEBEL_WEBSERVER_LOGIN
row.Value1: The login object used by the discovery tool to detect the Webserver settings

row.Name: SIEBEL_WS_PUB_DIR
row.Value1: Siebel web server public directory

row.Name: UNIX_SIEBEL_ENV_SCRIPT
row.Value1: The file name of the Environment Script. (Unix only). Default: siebenv.sh

row.Name: UNIX_SIEBEL_ENV_SCRIPT_DIR
row.Value1: The directory where the Siebel Environment script is placed. (Unix only)

row.Name: WIN_SIEBEL_SERVICES
row.Value1: Comma-separated list of Windows Siebel Server Services
